deskripsi:
@HOM Platinum Gowongan Hotel, located in Tugu Jogja, Yogyakarta, is a popular choice for travelers. Set 1 km from the excitement of the city, this 3-star hotel commands an excellent location and provides access to the city's biggest attractions. A haven of rest and relaxation, the hotel will offer total renewal just steps away from the city's numerous attractions such as Tugu Railway Station, Kartika Trekking, Tugu Yogyakarta.
Rooms at @Hom Platinum Gowongan are fitted with a flat-screen cable TV and en suite bathroom with free toiletries and shower facilities.
Malabar Restaurant serves Chinese and international dishes at the hotel.
 Guests can arrange airport transfers and car rentals through the hotel staff, laundry and ironing services are also available with additional charges.

deskripsi:
As a luxurious hotel in Malioboro area, Abdi Jogja boasts red design and features the exclusive building and a large parking area. Guests at this business can immediately feel the peaceful and comfortable atmosphere when they arrive in the hotel lobby and guest rooms. The interior of the guest rooms are dominated by natural wood with classic brown and cream walls. Green plants, artistic wall paintings, and the stunning view of Jogja City ensure a memorable stay. This air-conditioned hotel features an array of facilities such as a TV lounge, cafe and restaurant. Internet access, room service and laundry service are also offered. 
Abdi Jogja boasts three room categories, which are Suite Room, Deluxe Room and Superior. The rooms offer an en-suite bathroom with a shower, bath and hairdryer. A direct dial telephone, TV, an internet access, safe and minibar are also provided. Each room is furnished with tea and coffee making facilities, as well as air conditioning. Furthermore, for guests who choose Suite Room will be indulged by the stunning views of Mount Merapi. 
A breakfast buffet is served daily. To satisfy hotel guests who want to savor kinds of food and beverages, Abadi Jogja provides Merapi Coffee Shop features free hot spot internet access. 
Guests can take a refreshing dip in the outdoor swimming pool, or sunbath at the poolside. For those who want to pamper themselves, various body treatments are also offered at Kusuma Spa and Message.

deskripsi:
This property located near Palace of Yogyakarta. This villa features a garden, free self parking, and free WiFi in public areas. The villa features a kitchenette with a refrigerator and a stovetop, plus 2 bathrooms and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Guests can appreciate conveniences like a living room and a dining area, and other amenities include a patio and a rice cooker. Housekeeping is available on request. 
Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access.
Free self parking is available onsite.
 There is no front desk at this property. To make arrangements for check-in please contact the property at least 24 hours before arrival using the information on the booking confirmation.
Make yourself comfortable in this air-conditioned villa, featuring a kitchenette with a refrigerator and a stovetop. There's a private patio. A flat-screen television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include a separate sitting area and a rice cooker, and housekeeping is provided on request.

deskripsi:
This property located near History Museum of Antiquities Pleret. This guesthouse features a restaurant, an outdoor pool, and coffee/tea in a common area. Free breakfast (local cuisine), free WiFi in public areas, and free self parking are also provided. Other amenities include a refrigerator in a common area, free use of bicycles, and concierge services. All 6 rooms offer free WiFi, desks, and free toiletries. 
Pamper yourself with onsite massages or enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool. This guesthouse also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a television in a common area. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge).
Featured amenities include luggage storage, laundry facilities, and coffee/tea in a common area. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.
 Airport shuttle service is available on request during limited hours. Fees may apply. Contact the property in advance to make arrangements.
Make yourself at home in one of the 6 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.
At Ada Waktu Villa, enjoy a satisfying meal at the restaurant. A complimentary local cuisine breakfast is served daily from 6 AM to 10:30 AM.

deskripsi:
Adhisthana Hotel is situated in Prawirotaman area, a laidback neighbourhood in the Southern part of Yogyakarta; yet a lively tourist area lined with restaurants, bakeries, travel services and shops. It is only a few minutes away from the Royal Palace of Yogyakarta. Named after the ancient Sanskrit words for ‘blessing’, and literally a ‘site, position or residence’, it translates our vision to create a relaxed and tranquil base in an ambience of a private home from which to explore the Javanese heritage. The hotel is designed using local materials to create home-style Javanese ambience with decoration influenced by Chinese and European style to embrace the rich cultivation of Javanese history today.
There are many types of rooms available here. From Dormitory with bunk beds, to suite rooms. Each room equipped with dressing table, ensuite bathroom with hot cold-water shower, 32” LED TV with select international channels, Air-conditioner.
Occupying the front corner of the building, Lawas no. 613 welcomes everyone to sit down and have breakfast, lunch and dinner, or just to unwind after exploring the city in a relaxing atmosphere. Lawas no. 613 serves variety of Indonesian and international dishes made by local and fresh ingredients. Our kitchen doesn’t use preservatives and MSGs as we concern your health and well-being. Satisfy your appetite with our Indonesian selections that use our special grandmothers’ kitchen traditional recipes. 
The Living Room; As the centre point of the hotel, it is the melting pot for our guests to chill out and share their stories. The living room is styled to feel comfortable, just like at home. It is equipped with reading materials and games to keep our guests entertained. Just ask our friendly staffs, and they will be pleased to introduce you some interesting traditional games.

deskripsi:
Featuring traditional Javanese and Chinese design styles, Adya Nalendra Boutique boasts an array of utmost amenities to fulfill guests' needs. They will be welcomed friendly in a lobby with 24-hour reception service and lift access. Facilities offered at this air-conditioned conference hotel are with a hairdressing salon, restaurant, conference facilities, room and laundry services, as well as internet access. Guests arriving by car may leave their vehicle in the car park. Other amenities comprise currency exchange facility, doctor on call and WiFi in public area. 
The accommodation is divided into some categories, namely Superior Room, Classical Javanese Deluxe Room, Classical Chinese Deluxe Room, Classical Deluxe Room, Executive Suite and Executive Suite with classical Javanese setting. Each room features an en-suite bathroom with shower, bathtub and hairdryer. In-room amenities include a direct dial telephone, satellite TV, WiFi internet access, a minibar, fridge and individually regulated air conditioning units. 
Breakfast is served each morning, and for guests who want to have tasty food and fresh beverages available 24-hour restaurant. 
Guests can enjoy a work-out in an aerobics session.

deskripsi: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Depok, Agrapana Guest House promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. All the necessary facilities, including Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, family room, shared lounge/TV area, shared kitchen, are at hand. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer internet access – wireless (complimentary), air conditioning, desk, television, satellite/cable TV to ensure a restful night. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including garden. Agrapana Guest House combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Yogyakarta unforgettable.

deskripsi:
Agung Inn is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Yogyakarta Region, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay. Agung Inn is equipped with a capacity of 3 cars parking area located at the front. Laundry facilities, a 24-hour front desk, Wi-Fi in public areas, and tour/ticket assistance are available at this guesthouse.
The hotel has 7 rooms which are equipped with a king size bed, air conditioning, LCD TV, desk, Wifi, and a private bathroom with hot shower. 
A complimentary breakfast is served by the hotel.

deskripsi:
Placed close with popular landmarks such as Bank Indonesia and Titik 0 Kilometer Yogyakarta, guests of Hotel Agung Mas can easily experience some of Yogyakarta Region's most well known attractions. Additionally, at the hotel you can find many facilities and services such as free Wi-Fi, dry cleaning and laundry service, 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. 
The rooms offer air conditioning, TV, and getting online is possible, as free Wi-Fi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease. 
Guests can enjoy free breakfast and an on-site restaurant during their stay. Hotel Agung Mas Hotel also features room service. If you want to look around, you'll find several dining options nearby like Bedhot Resto, Phuket Resto Cokroaminoto, Yamie Panda Chapter HOS Cokroaminoto and etc.

The rooms offer air conditioning, TV, and getting online is possible, as free Wi-Fi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease. 
Guests can enjoy free breakfast and an on-site restaurant during their stay. Hotel Agung Mas Hotel also features room service. If you want to look around, you'll find several dining options nearby like Bedhot Resto, Phuket Resto Cokroaminoto, Yamie Panda Chapter HOS Cokroaminoto and etc.

deskripsi:
Airlangga hotel was bulit in 1969 - 1970's . It was the pioneer of hotel industry in Prawirotaman area, later on this location known as Kampung Bule.
Airlangga Hotel have 40 rooms categorized into 3 kind of room which are Deluxe, Ambassador and Family. We have 18 rooms of Deluxe, 15 rooms of Ambassador and 4 rooms of Family. All of rooms are facilitated with air conditioner, hot and cold water, tv and antique Indonesian furniture. Each rooms is equipped with; wardrobe, wash hand basin, private bath room, shower, hot water, bath tub, television, telephone, fan and air conditioning.
location is close to city center,tourists can rent a motor bike from the store next door and cruising around the city with an affordable price. There are plenty of restaurant and bars close to the hotel as the hotel provide its own restaurant and pubs for our guests. Unlike other hotel close to Malioboro we offer more quite and relax situation, perfect for tourist who want to get away from their daily routines and stresses. Also we offer you a great environment, with our friendly staff, wifi free connection, lots of sun shine for foreigner who wanted to just sun bathing and relax on side of swimming pool. Furthermore, our hotel is close to ATM center, so the tourist won't be worried if they run out of cash. 
Directions, How to get thereHotel Airlangga is located on Jalan Prawirotaman No. 6-8, Yogyakarta. It is about 20 minutes driving from the airport and about 10 minutes from the city, and about 30 minutes from the beach.

deskripsi:
This property located near Jogja Bay. Along with a water park (surcharge), this smoke-free hotel has a restaurant and a conference center. Free WiFi in public areas and free self parking are also provided. Additionally, 24-hour room service, a meeting room, and concierge services are onsite. All 11 individually decorated rooms feature free WiFi and 24-hour room service. For a bit of entertainment, guests will find flat-screen TVs with cable channels, and other amenities include premium bedding and coffee makers. 
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a water park (surcharge) or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services.
Featured amenities include express check-in, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and a meeting room. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite.
 
Make yourself at home in one of the 11 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and coffee/tea makers.
Satisfy your appetite for lunch or dinner at the hotel's restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. A complimentary breakfast is included.

deskripsi:
Aloha Hotel Yogyakarta is one of the best option when you are at Yogyakarta whether on business trip or leisure. Just a 5-minute drive from the vibrant Malioboro Street, this accommodation is surrounded by many dining optionsa and shopping places. At the hotel you can find staff at the 24-hour front desk, they can arrange airport transfers, area shuttles and car rentals for guests' travel needs. Laundry service is also offered.
 All rooms are fitted with a flat-screen cable TV, while a shower and toiletries are available in the private bathroom. There's a seating area in the second floor terrace.

deskripsi:
Featuring home to the twin marvels of Borobudur and Prambanan, Jogyakarta is a thriving cultural center, where Java's ancient traditions are preserved. These and many more attractions have made Jogya a magnet for visitors from all over the world. This city hotel, due to its fantastic location, is a great base from which to explore the area. Guests are welcomed in a Lobby Lounge with a 24-hour check-out service and a hotel safe. It boasts an array of amenities offered to its guests at this air-conditioned establishment including conference facilities and wireless internet access. They can also take advantage of the room and laundry services. Besides, for those arriving by car can park their vehicles in a parking area, and for business guests will be indulged by fully-equipped meeting rooms. 
Amaris Diponegoro boasts comfortable and clean rooms by merging into ultra stylish design and an array of amenities like cutting-edge LCD TV sets. They all are fitted with a direct dial telephone and a private bathroom with a shower. WiFi internet access, a safe, a minibar and individually regulated air conditioning are also provided. Other in-room amenities include safe deposit box in each room. 
Guests are served breakfast each morning, and a set menu for lunch and dinner. 
Guests can soak in an indoor swimming pool while rejuvenating their body and mind, or sunbath at the poolside.

deskripsi:
Stop at Amata Borobudur Resort to discover the wonders of Magelang. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience.
All guest rooms in the guest house are equipped with a kettle. With a private bathroom fitted with free toiletries, rooms at Amata Borobudur Resort also boast free WiFi, while selected rooms also offer a mountain view. The units at the accommodation have air conditioning and a desk.
A continental breakfast is available every morning at the property.
To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as outdoor pool, pool (kids), garden.
Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service are just some of the facilities on offer. Speaking English and Indonesian at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area.

deskripsi:
As the oldest hotel since 1960s during the colonial period and the first hotel built on Dagen Street, Ameera Boutique Hotel boasts Javenese design style. Each floor offers a traditional theme and the picture gallery, as well as having a motto "Sendhiko Dawuh" that means serving all guests' needs warmly. At the end of 2010 and initiated in 2011, Ameera Boutique Hotel with a beautiful and unique fabric with colorful palace, the comfortable lobby and corridors as well as bedroom and bathroom feature traditional batik ambiance. Besides, guests will be indulged by a various decoration of traditional ornament and greenery throughout the corridor. This hotel is furnished with airport transfer, meeting room and laundry service, as well as a car rental. 
Ameera Boutique Hotel boasts some room categories, namely Sido Asih, Sido Mukti, Sido Mulyo, Sido Dadi and Sido Luhur. Each room features air condition and a flat-screen TV. 
The hotel boasts two fine dining venues to tempt guests' taste buds, which are Waroeng Kopi that caters traditional breakfast and guanine Javanese coffee, as well as Kopi Yukk where guests can enjoy melody of Javanese Bossa Nova. 
Pamper themselves with spa treatments on-site spa center and rejuvenate guests' mind and body as well. For those who looking for Indonesia authentic souvenir made of clay can visit Waroeng Traditional.

The 1-star Andelis Homestay offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Yogyakarta. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. A 15-minute drive from Malioboro Street, Andelis Homestay houses bright rooms with private balconies overlooking the greenery.
Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. A fridge, flat-screen TV and a water dispenser are a standard across all air-conditioned rooms. Shower facilities and free bath amenities are provided in each en suite bathroom.
Smoking area, laundry service, tours, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas are there for guest's enjoyment. The homestay provides a shared living and dining area. Staff can assist with car rentals and laundry requests. In-room dining options are possible with room service.

deskripsi:
Arjuna Hotel Yogyakarta is a three star hotel located in the tourist area of Malioboro & the business district of Yogyakarta. Perfectly designed with a combination of modern and classical Javanese nuance and a wide range of facilities available, this hotel is ideal for a holiday retreat.Hotel Arjuna Yogyakarta has 72 rooms and the rooms, all tastefully decorated with all the modern conveniences that a traveller would require. The hotel also provides well-appointed meeting rooms to cater for business or private functions, each meeting room with free internet access, luggage storage and self-parking facilities.
The air-conditioned guestrooms are all equipped with a flat-screen TV and desk. En suite bathrooms come with hot-water showers.
Srikandi Coffee Shop and Taman Sari Pool Bar both serve Indonesian and local dishes. In-room dining is possible with room service.
 The complete list of recreational facilities is available at the hotel, including outdoor pool, massage, spa, pool (kids). 
The hotel provides the best in services and amenities. While lodging at this wonderful property, guests can enjoy safety deposit boxes, newspapers, smoking area, car park, business center.

deskripsi:
The Grove Express Hotel offer hip, convenient and minimalist personalized accommodation for the stylish yet thrifty traveler. With 24-hour reception, a friendly and helpful staff, and the absolute best price to stay in fresh and clean room interiors.
The hotel offers 40 rooms from twin to double bed, self air-conditioned rooms, free Wi-Fi, LCD TV, in-room cable TV, and shower with hot and cold water are available to keep you refreshed. Daily housekeeping service is available.
The hotel’s restaurant serves buffet, a la carte, or set menu dishes for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Café and lounge is also available serving light meals and refreshing beverages.

deskripsi:
Hotel is a perfect blend of luxury and natural beauty of Mount Merapi. As one of the best tourist destinations, @K Hotel pamper you with the best hotel facilities to enjoy the charm of Mount Merapi and the view of the city of Yogyakarta. Stay with us and experience the incredible view from @K Hotel Kaliurang.
Superior Suite; With an area of 25 square meters, equipped with Queen Bed (Double Bed), air conditioning, hot water, and various selection of TV channels as well as a variant of room service menu will further complement the comfort of your stay. Deluxe; With an area of 30 square meters, equipped with twin bed and King Bed (Double Bed), air conditioner, hot water, and various selection of TV channels as well as a variant of room service menu which complement the comfort of your stay. Deluxe rooms present you the breathtaking view of Yogyakarta City lights at night and the tranquil view of Plawangan hill from your balcony. Executive Suite; With an area of 35 square meters, equipped with two double bed, air conditioning, hot water, mini pantry, sofa and various selection of TV channels and also variants of room service menu that complements your comfort. Spacious Junior Suite room features views of Plawangan park and hill that can be enjoyed from the balcony of the room. Junior Suite; With an area of 30 square meters, equipped with double bed, air conditioning, hot water, mini pantry, and various selection of TV channels and also variants of room service menu which complement your comfort. Spacious Executive Suite room as Silent room brings you tranquility.
@K Hotel promises you an unforgettable culinary experience. We serve your culinary experience at selected restaurants, Sri Manganti Restaurant, Nirmala Terrace, and Amartha pool and bar.
The rooftop swimming pool is available for guest to use; surrounded by the enticing natural landscape of Yogyakarta. Children under 12 years old must be supervised by adults. We also have poolside bar.

deskripsi:
Atrium Premiere Hotel, a hotel located exactly in the heart of Yogyakarta, will surprise you with fresh, clean and high comfort place to stay. At Atrium Premiere Hotel, you will be greeted with a typical Javanese yet sincerest greeting from the talented staff. Atrium Premiere Hotel is striving to ensure guests feel welcomed, from the day of their arrival, during their stay, and upon their departure.
Atrium Premiere Hotel Yogyakarta provides 105 rooms and suites with 4 types of rooms: Superior, Deluxe, Junior Suite and Executive Suite. All rooms are equipped with 32” LCD flat screen TV with international TV channel, shower & bathroom amenities, coffee & tea making facilites, internet access, air conditioning, duvet & four pillows, bathtub & safe deposit box (for suite rooms). Offering city views, they have tiled flooring and colourful interiors. Guests can make use of the shower facilities and free toiletries in the en suite bathroom.
 Indonesian, Asian and Western cuisines are served at Plataran Restaurant. Alternatively, guests can enjoy their meals in the comfort of their rooms or have a drink at the on-site bar.
 Shuttle services and airport transfers can be arranged at an additional charge. Atrium Premier Hotel Yogyakarta also provides a business centre, safety deposit box and meeting/banquet facilities. Free Wi-Fi is accessible in public areas.

deskripsi:
Ayaartta Malioboro Hotel sets prominently in the city centre of Yogyakarta, features colonial entrance views of the main building. This accommodation is suitable for both business travelers and those seeking for vacation and leisure.
Ayaartta Malioboro hotel have a decorative expose wall and each comes with king-size beds, air-conditioner, complimentary Wi-Fi connection, LCD TV with international channels, mini-bar, and safety deposit box. Some spacious rooms are offering the view of the city. All linen in your rooms will always be freshly laundered.
Providing Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner, the friendly and warm atmosphere of In Bloom Restaurant will serve delightful Indonesian and Asian cuisine during guests stay. 
Hypnotized Bar is the pioneer in town, by showing a new style to enjoy a cup of coffee in the fresh and unique décor.
Tropical outdoor swimming pool and sport facilities will indulge you to impress your imagination. Relax and rejuvenate your body, mind and soul by enjoying traditional massage in guest’s room during the stay. Business Center is also available for free, 24 hours a day, to assist your business needs.

deskripsi:
Balai Melayu Museum Hotel is conveniently located in the popular Kota Gede area. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Offering rooms with a blend of contemporary and traditional Malay furnishings, this hotel houses dining options and features a complimentary airport transfer service and free Wi-Fi access.
Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. Fitted with a wardrobe, air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV and an attached bathroom with hot and cold shower facilities. Tea/coffee making facilities and a minibar are included.
Serae Wangi Café and Pandan Wangi Café serve Indonesian cuisine. In-room dining is available.
Staff at Balai Melayu’s reception can assist with car rental, laundry and ironing services. Free parking is provided. There's a library with thousands of Malay books, as well as departments that collect various Malay artifacts such as traditional weapons, tepak sirih (slap betel), agriculture equipment and fishing, musical instruments, and many others.

deskripsi: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Kota Baru, Balirejo Guest House promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Car park, Wi-Fi in public areas, room service, facilities for disabled guests, family room are there for guest's enjoyment. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as desk, television, separate shower and tub, satellite/cable TV, kitchenware. Take a break from a long day and make use of hot tub, outdoor pool. Balirejo Guest House combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Yogyakarta unforgettable.

deskripsi:
This property located near Borobudur Temple. This smoke-free bed & breakfast features a restaurant, 24-hour room service, and tour/ticket assistance. Free breakfast (local cuisine), free WiFi in public areas, and free self parking are also provided. Additionally, wedding services, a garden, and a picnic area are onsite. All 11 soundproofed rooms feature free WiFi and 24-hour room service. For a bit of entertainment, LED TVs come with cable channels, and guests will also find electric kettles and free bottled water. 
Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access. Additional features at this bed & breakfast include wedding services, tour/ticket assistance, and a picnic area.
The front desk is staffed during limited hours. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.
 
The front desk is open daily from 10:00 AM - 10:00 PM. 
If you are planning to arrive after 10:00 PM please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation. 24-hour airport shuttle service is available on request. Fees may apply. Contact the property in advance to make arrangements.
Make yourself at home in one of the 11 air-conditioned rooms featuring LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and slippers. Conveniences include desks and electric kettles, and housekeeping is provided daily.
Satisfy your appetite for lunch or dinner at the bed & breakfast's restaurant, BALKONDES WANUREJO, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. A complimentary local cuisine breakfast is served daily from 7:00 AM to 10:00 AM.

deskripsi:
If you're looking for a valuable accommodation in your business trip, come here at Bandara Asri Yogyakarta, it's just a 5-minute drive to Adisucipto Airport. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas, the 24-hour front desk can arrange for car rentals and an airport transfer at a charge, and laundry service are the features at our hotel. 
We have several types of room for guests, start from Standard, Deluxe, Superior, and Executive room. Hotel Bandara Asri offers air-conditioned rooms, TV, telephone, and free toiletries. Certain rooms come with a tea/coffee maker and a bathroom with hot and cold water shower. 
The on site restaurant, Mini Resto serves Indonesian food. You may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Hotel Bandara Asri, including Tengkleng Gajah, Sapto Hoedojo Restaurant, Bakso Idolaku and many more.

deskripsi:
A perfect abode to drain off a hectic day, Hotel Batik Yogyakarta is a complete business hotel designed to make your stay as relaxing and chic as possible. The pace, the mood, the style packed in this hotel, making this hotel is the place to be - where the heart of the traveler can find its own space. Yet, Hotel Batik Yogyakarta is only within walking distance to the vibrant and world-famous Malioboro Street.
Batik Yogyakarta Hotel offers various room types. Each room is fitted with Air Conditioner, TV, telephone, and hot/cold water shower. Laundry service is available upon request.
Sidomukti Restaurant serves European, Chinese, and Indonesian cuisine. You could enjoy the fresh air and traditional atmosphere while you relax or discuss your business. Each guest will also receive daily Indonesian or continental buffet breakfast.
A swimming pool is available in this hotel. Guests can also take the car rental service to tour around Yogyakarta.
facility:

deskripsi:
Bifa hotel is located in a strategic street at the south of Yogyakarta, it is about 10 minutes from airport, and it is close to Kotagede, the Capital of the Ancient Mataram Palace, as the centre of silver crafts market having international quality. The interior design of the hotel is designed suitably with the nuance of antique Javanesse furnitures and other antique things in order to increase the uniqueness of the hotel.
The rooms feature air conditioning, cable TV, wardrobe, seating area and an en suite bathroom featuring hot and cold shower facility and free toiletries. Fresh towels and linen are also included. Guests can enjoy views of the garden from the room.
 For meals, the restaurant serves Indonesian dishes. Room service is also available.
 The hotel provides a 24-hour front desk where the friendly staff can assist guests with laundry and dry cleaning requests.

deskripsi:
Designed for both business and leisure travel, Blue Safir Hotel is ideally situated in Yogyakarta City Center; one of the city's most popular locales. With its location just from the city center and from the airport, this 1-star hotel attracts numerous travelers each year. Blue Safir Hotel combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Yogyakarta unforgettable. 
Hotel accommodations have been carefully appointed to the highest degree of comfort and convenience. Blue Safir Hotel is an ideal place of stay for travelers seeking charm, comfort and convenience in Yogyakarta.
In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless (complimentary), air conditioning, desk, mini bar. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay.
To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as massage, garden. 
Offering hotel guests superior services and a broad range of amenities, Blue Safir Hotel is committed to ensuring that your stay is as comfortable as possible. A selection of top-class facilities such as 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, gift/souvenir shop, taxi service can be enjoyed at the hotel.

deskripsi:
Brongto Hotel is one of the three-star hotels in Yogyakarta. Unlike other hotels, Brongto hotel was a mansion of a nobleman that is well maintained up to now. This is a very unique fact and almost no other such a mansion, even in Indonesia. Brongto hotel was built on a land of around 2 hectares that is located in the south part of Sultan Palace. In the past, this area was the dwelling place for the noblemen of Yogyakarta Kingdom so that the Javanese nuance is still prominent. The architecture of Brongto hotel is keeping the origin, namely an old mansion of Brongtodiningratan nobleman. The shape of huge regol or gate that is painted green as the characteristic of Yogyakarta Kingdom is kept original. Most of the rooms are in the form of bungalows with private terrace and beautiful garden. Each room is equipped with furniture and lamps with the characteristics of Jogja. All these originality makes Brongto hotel so special that many foreign tourists from Europe, especially Germany and Netherlands enjoy staying here. In order to improve the service quality and comfort, Brongto hotel has extended the building for some new rooms and a swimming pool for children and adults. This is done in response to increasing demand from companies, schools and universities that are interested in using Brongto hotel to hold some events. Brongto hotel has very wide parking area that accommodates some big coaches and private cars.
Brongto hotel has 2 suite rooms, 24 deluxe rooms, 36 standard rooms, and 1 family room named Madukoro. Most of the rooms are bungalows with personal terrace and beautiful garden. Each room is equipped with furniture and lamps of special characteristic of Jogja. Most of the rooms are in the form of bungalows with private terrace and beautiful garden. Each room is equipped with furniture and lamps with the characteristics of Jogja. All these originality makes Brongto hotel so special that many foreign tourists from Europe, especially Germany and Netherlands enjoy staying here.

deskripsi:
Burza Hotel Yogyakarta is a three star Hotel in Yogyakarta with classical and modern ambience for you to enjoy. Strategically located at Jogokaryan street, Burza Hotel has easy access to famous places in Yogyakarta. Friendly welcoming service, great food and relaxing warm ambience makes it perfect place to stay.
The ever pleasant Burza Hotel Yogyakarta provides 100 classical traditional well-designed room of pure comfort. Our guestrooms are equipped with state art amenities including; 42’ LED TV with 20 channels of world wide programs, Air Conditioning, IDD telephone line, Coffee & tea making facilities, Hot & cold shower, Wifi connection, Magnetical card key.
Guests may find satisfying authentic Javanese and Indonesian food at the Poenokawan Restaurant. Or taste the sweet fresh baked pastries at The Chocolate Lounge. 
The hotel provides swimming pool and meeting facilities.

deskripsi:
Built in 2010, Cakra Kembang Hotel offers superior facilities and comprises a total of 65 rooms. The hotel's philosophy confirms a commitment to give utmost services and a focus on hospitality. The property offers amenities including guests shops, meeting facilities, a restaurant and 24-hour room service (for an additional fee). Furthermore, this hotel is also furnished with further facilities including a lobby, a 24-hour check-out service, a hotel safe, Free WiFi hotspot access and a laundry service, as well as dry cleaning. Besides, to fulfill guests' needs, it boasts further amenities, such as mini mart, travel agent, 24 hours doctor on call, taxi and car rental, as well as business center. 
The accommodation is divided into four categories, which are Business Room, Superior Room, Deluxe Room and Executive Room. All the well-appointed guest rooms at this hotel is fitted with a private bathroom with a shower/bathtub. They features an International Direct Dial (IDD) telephone, a satellite TV/ cable TV, internet access, a safe and a minibar, as well as a refrigerator. Furthermore, individually regulated air conditioning as well as tea and coffee maker are provided in all accommodation as standard. 
Breakfast is served to the guests each morning, and a set menu can be chosen for lunch and dinner. In addition, Srikandi Joglo Restaurant is offered to tempt guests' taste buds. 
This hotel features an outdoor swimming pool for guests who want to soak or sunbath at the poolside and a children's swimming area provided as well. Besides, a gym is offered for guests who want enjoy a work-out to keep their body in shape and to keep their health at Onto Seno Fitness Center. Guests can also pamper themselves with a massage and spa treatment.

deskripsi:
This property located near Jogja Bay. This smoke-free hotel features a full-service spa, a restaurant, and an outdoor pool. Free WiFi in public areas is provided, as well as free self parking, a free area shuttle, and a free manager's reception. Additionally, a bar/lounge, a swim-up bar, and 2 coffee shops/cafés are onsite. All 70 rooms provide conveniences like refrigerators and coffee makers, plus free WiFi and LCD TVs with cable channels. Guests will also find 24-hour room service, free bottled water, and in-room massages. 
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool and a spa tub. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and complimentary babysitting/childcare. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the complimentary area shuttle.
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-in, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Depok? This hotel has facilities measuring 689 square feet (64 square meters), including a conference center. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available on request) and a train station pick-up service.
Airport shuttle service is available on request from 7:00 AM to 4:00 PM. Fees may apply. Contact the property in advance to make arrangements.
Make yourself at home in one of the 70 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and slippers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.
Enjoy international cuisine at Joglo Bougenville, a poolside restaurant which features a garden view. You can also stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Mingle with other guests at the complimentary reception, held daily. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6:00 AM to 10:00 AM for a fee.
 Nearby Attractions

Cantya Hotel offers carefully-decorated and designed rooms, to spoil the guests with comfort. Each room is fitted with LCD TV, AC, hot/cold water shower, Wi-Fi, and private balcony.
Kedai Kopi Insana is suitable for gathering with family, friends and relatives, serving light snacks and refreshing drinks.

With an affordable rate, this accommodation is suitable for both business travelers and those seeking for vacation and leisure.
This accommodation offers clean and modern rooms and suites, along with thoughtfully designed amenities. Each unit is specifically designed to make your staying experience enjoyable and unforgettable.

A complimentary continental breakfast is served in this accommodation.

deskripsi:
This property located near TransMart Studio Mini. This hotel features a restaurant, an outdoor pool, and a fitness center. Free self parking, a free airport shuttle, and a free manager's reception are also provided. Other amenities include 24-hour room service, concierge services, and dry cleaning. All 127 rooms offer free WiFi, 24-hour room service, and LCD TVs with cable channels. Guests will also find electric kettles, free bottled water, and hair dryers. 
Don't miss out on recreational opportunities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. This hotel also features concierge services and shopping on site.
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. This hotel has 2 meeting rooms available for events. A roundtrip airport shuttle is complimentary (available 24 hours).
 24-hour airport shuttle service is available on request. Fees may apply. Contact the property in advance to get details.
Make yourself at home in one of the 127 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and electric kettles.
Satisfy your appetite for lunch or dinner at D'Arang, a restaurant which specializes in local cuisine, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Mingle with other guests at the complimentary reception, held daily. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6 AM to 10 AM for a fee.

Located in Prawirotaman, Hotel Cristalit is a perfect starting point from which to explore Yogyakarta. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. 
All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with non smoking rooms, television, internet access – wireless (complimentary), desk, shower.
All the necessary facilities, including bicycle rental, safety deposit boxes, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, laundry service, are at hand. 
Access to the hotel's garden will further enhance your satisfying stay. Hotel Cristalit combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Yogyakarta unforgettable.

The rooms at Crystal Lotus Hotel are all modernly designed with touches of the traditional Batik patterns decorations. The rooms are also air-conditioned and comes with a flat screen cable TV, a safety deposit box, a seating area, a minibar, and a balcony overlooking the pool, city and mountain views. There is also an en suite bathroom featuring bath or shower facility with slippers, and free toiletries.
As for dining options, the on-site Crystal Lotus Restaurant serves Indonesian and Western dishes and the Crystal Lotus Café serves light snacks and beverages.
Crystal Lotus Hotel Yogyakarta by Prabu offers an outdoor swimming pool, kids corner, spa and wellness centre and fitness centre.

deskripsi:
D Kayon Hotel Demangan Yogyakarta is a stylish 2-star hotel that provides cozy rooms and top-notch services for any travelers visiting the city. With affordable rate, the hotel is accentuated by modern contemporary design and located strategically in the heart of Yogyakarta, making it convenient for any guests who are looking to explore the city and have a comfortable stay.
Air conditioned rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV, desk and complimentary bottled water. En suite bathroom features a shower, slippers and free toiletries.
Coffee Shop Teras located on-site serves a selection of Indonesian and Oriental cuisine. Guests may also order food from the room service. Additionally various dining options can be found in Solo Street located within a 5-minute walk. A mini-market also can be found 5 minutes' stroll from the property.
Staff at D Kayon Hotel Demangan Yogyakarta can help with laundry, dry cleaning and ironing services at additional fee.

deskripsi:
d'Omah Hotel Yogyakarta is located in the village of Tembi in rural Java - but only twenty minutes from the centre of this bustling artistic city governed by a Sultan.Tembi was just a typical Javanese village until Indonesia's handicraft guru Warwick Purser decided to move there and establish the design, production and export facilities of his company Out of Asia.
Rooms at D'omah Yogya Hotel built in Javanese houses that have been restored and decorated with unique artwork. This hotel has rooms with two type: superior and deluxe, and garden villa. All rooms equipped with air conditioner, flat-screen TV with international channels, free internet services, and private terrace. DVD player is also provided when needed.
Looking straight onto a panoramic views of rice fields, d'Omah Hotel Restaurant reknowned for its Asian fusion menu. Not only that, this restaurant also provided Indonesia and Western choice of menu, even diet menu which is served on-request. Cocktail bar also offered by d'Omah with a reasonable prices. In-room dining is also available
Besides 3 outdoor swimming pool, this hotel also offering spa and fitness centre facilities, and yoga practice which can be used by the guests. d'Omah Yogyakarta Hotel also combining gallery and meeting hall which can be used for reception, business meeting, and the other activities.

deskripsi:
Hotel Dafam Fortuna Malioboro Yogyakarta is a three-star hotel in Yogyakarta, managed by Dafam Hotels. A well-designated location combined with appealing facilities makes the hotel a worthy place to stay while visiting Yogyakarta. Hotel Dafam Fortuna Malioboro Yogyakarta offers a very easy access to the city's most famous shopping area. Offering superior service and numerous facilities for the guests, Hotel Dafam Fortuna Malioboro committed to ensure the most convenient stay at the hotel. 
Hotel Dafam Fortuna Malioboro Yogyakarta offers 100 stylish, bright, and contemporary rooms, consist of 89 Deluxe Rooms, 10 Executive Rooms and 1 Fortuna Suite Rooms. Twin bed or single beds are both available. All rooms equipped with LCD TV with cable channels, keycard censor, free broadband and Wi-Fi internet access, in-room safe, coffee and tea maker, individual air conditioning control, and free toiletries. A suite adds direct pool access and a separate living area.
“Fortune Restaurant” at the lobby of the hotel provides a vast range of authentic Indonesian food and modern Western and Asian delights as well. “Ginger Lounge” can be a great place to spend the evening with cocktails, tasty snacks, and mouthwatering desserts. “Lotus Sunken Pool Bar” also opens close to swimming pool, offering light snacks and refreshing, healthy drinks.
You cannot resist the rooftop swimming pool, the perfect place for either heavy swimming or taking a getaway from the tiring day. A chic spa and massage can be your alternative as well.

deskripsi:
Dafam Fortuna Seturan Yogyakarta offering comfortable stay and ambience of Yogyakarta with 109 rooms and 2 suites, an outdoor swimming pool equipped with pool bar, restaurant, dynamic sky lounge and bar. High speed internet access to stay connected plus meeting rooms and conferences facilities accommodate up to 150 person for both business and leisure traveler.
There are three types of room, Superior, Deluxe and Suite. The standard equipment at each rooms including; LED/LCD TV (with international channel), Coffee/Tea Maker, In-Room Safe, Balcony/Terrace, Wifi Internet Access, Toiletries, Bathrobes, Bath tub. 
Helios Restaurant serves a fine selection of intercontinental dishes, while guests can enjoy the cool rooftop atmosphere at F'Sky Lounge. Light snacks and refreshing beverages can be enjoyed at Khione Lounge. Alternatively, meals can be ordered from the 24-hour room service.
The hotel is a 5-minute drive from Ambarrukmo Plaza, a 10-minute drive from Malioboro Street and a 15-minute drive from Keraton Ngayogyakarta Hadiningrat. This hotel also has an outdoor swimming pool for guests to use.

deskripsi:
Set in a prime location of Yogyakarta, Dalem Agung Palagan 99 Hotel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Dry cleaning, newspapers, salon, shops, elevator are there for guest's enjoyment. 
The hotel features 35 beautifully appointed guest rooms, many of which include television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), coffee/tea maker, hairdryer, telephone, minibar, seating area, whirlpool bathtub, and non smoking rooms. 
Room service is available for 24 hour. 
The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include golf course (within 3 km), games room, pool (kids), spa, outdoor pool. Further service from the hotel including 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, express check-in/check-out.

deskripsi:
De Hostel offering comfortable accommodation with the traditional welcoming Javanese hospitality that makes it a real home away from home. It is located in “International Village” of Yogyakarta, in the center of Prawirotaman area.The main building is a period piece Prawirotaman residence, a classical 1950s tropical house. The Prawirotaman Area about 3 kilometers from the city center, a very strategic area in the heart of Javanese culture, close to the Sultan’s Palace, Water Castle, Batik Center, Traditional Market, Malioboro, Kotagede and Performing Arts of Ramayana Ballet.
 Surrounded by tropical greenery, De Hostel features air-conditioned or non-air conditioned rooms, with a Javanese-style terrace. Each room is elegantly furnished and equipped with practical amenities. Tea/coffee maker is available in the guestroom. 
 Breakfast is served every morning, room service is available at this property.
De Hostel is close with area in the lined with art shops, souvenir shops, cafes, restaurants, convenience stores, money changers, ATMs, car and motorcycle rentals bookstores and other stores catering to the needs of the foreign tourist. At the hostel, you can see a beautiful green that has become its main attraction, offering an overwhelming temptation for guests to take a refreshing plunge in the warmth of the bright Yogya sunshine.

deskripsi:
De LAXSTON HOTEL by Quin’s is modern and stylish three-star hotel in the area, offering 71 well-designed and sophisticated guest rooms and suites, 4 functional meeting rooms and Ballroom that can accommodate up to 200 guests. The hotel is strategically located at the heart of Yogyakarta, a beautiful city with rich cultural, social, and historical traditions. The hotel offers various facilities and amenities, reflecting the hospitality of the people of Yogyakarta.
De Laxston Hotel offers 71 rooms, with twin beds or double bed, in four different room sizes: Superior, Deluxe, Executive, and Suite Room (ranging between 20-35 m2). Each room includes breakfast for 2 person, free access to swimming pool, coffee and tea maker, national telephone call, 32” cable TV, AC, hot and cold water bathroom, free high speed WiFi, and 24 hours room service. 
“De Royale restaurant” serves Indonesian, Asian, and Western food all day long, where you can relax and enjoy innovative cuisine and calm atmosphere.
A swimming pool is available for all guests. Functional rooms and a ballroom are also available for your private events and business meeting needs.

deskripsi:
Surrounded by tropical greenery, Delta Homestay features air-conditioned rooms with Javanese-style terraces. Guests can make use of the outdoor swimming pool and free Wi-Fi access. The vibrant Malioboro Street is 10 minutes’ drive away from the property.
Decorated with brown tones and artworks, all rooms are fitted with fresh linen and tiled flooring. Garden views can be enjoyed from the private terrace. Each room has a private bathroom with hot shower facilities and free bath amenities.
Breakfast is served daily in the hotel’s dining area, which is situated near the garden. 
Ticket service and car rentals are available for guests who wish to explore the area.
Airport transfers can be arranged at a charge. Free parking spaces are provided on site. Other on-site conveniences include laundry, ironing and room services.

deskripsi:
Built in 2011, Dermaga Keluarga Hotel is a distinct addition to Yogyakarta and a smart choice for travelers. The hotel lies 1 km from the city center and provides accessibility to important town facilities. Visitors to the hotel can take pleasure in touring the city's top attractions: Ludira Husada Tama Hospital, Bakpia Pathuk 25, Taman Sari Yogya The Water Castle.
 Air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV with cable and satellite channels and a personal safe. Tea/coffee making facilities are included. Private bathrooms come with hot shower facilities.
 Featuring a naval theme, Dermaga Restaurant is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner, serving local Indonesian delights. In-room dining is possible.
Guests can arrange for a city tour at the travel desk, or head to the 24-hour front desk for assistance with ticketing, luggage storage or airport shuttle services. Complimentary private parking is available.

deskripsi:

namahotel: D Salvatore Art and Boutique Hotel
deskripsi:
This property located near TransMart Studio Mini. Along with a restaurant, this smoke-free hotel has an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Free WiFi in public areas and free valet parking are also provided. Other amenities include a coffee shop/café, coffee/tea in a common area, and a business center. All 96 rooms offer free WiFi and free wired Internet, plus minibars and LED TVs with cable channels. Room service, coffee makers, and free bottled water are among the other amenities available to guests. 
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.
Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, a business center, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free valet parking is available onsite.
 Make yourself at home in one of the 96 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LED televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Conveniences include safes and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily.
For lunch or dinner, stop by D'Salvatore, a restaurant that specializes in international cuisine. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/café, and room service (during limited hours) is provided.

deskripsi:
D’Senopati Malioboro Grand Hotel Yogyakarta is a luxurious 3 star hotel with affordable price in prestigious and heritage ambience. The hotel is strategically located in attractive destination of Yogyakarta. A giant frame history of Yogyakarta especially of Prince Panembahan Senopati story will be showcased in Lobby area.
D’Senopati Malioboro Grand Hotel Yogyakarta offers an extra ordinary twin bed room. There will be two queen size bed provided for each twin bed room type. Facilities including Free hi-speed Wi-Fi access, 32 inch LCD TV, In-Room deposit box, Coffee or Tea making facilities, In-room fridge, Individual AC controller, Writing desk, and en-suite bathroom with standing shower.
Enjoy a delicious Indonesian and international favorite dishes at Ayodhya Resto and Cafe, serving for all day.
The accommodation comes with an outdoor swimming pool.

deskripsi:
As a pioneering boutique hotel with naturally tranquil compound, adopting the concept of Javanese 'dusun', Dusun Jogja Village Inn is situated many stones away from the ever busy Malioboro street, yet it is still within reach of many city's highlights. To fulfill guests' needs, this hotel boasts amenities including laundry, safe deposit box, business center, free internet corner and WiFi in public area. Other amenities comprise business center and meeting room that can accommodate up to 50 people, as well as a car rental. 
Accommodation units are designed in such naturally tranquil compound, adopting the concept of Javanese 'dusun'. All rooms boast air conditioner, television and an International Direct Dial (IDD) telephone, as well as a private veranda or balcony overlooking the lush garden. Many walls in the rooms are plastered with summery, tropical colors with old-style tiles matching the antique-looking wooden furniture and decoration. 
Joglo Restaurant situated in lush tropical garden serves Javanese, Indonesian and International cuisines. 
Guests can pamper themselves at spa offering any treatments from massage to facial and body scrub. In addition, for those who want to soak can visit the outdoor swimming pool or sunbath at the poolside, whilst for those who want to enjoy a work-out can visit gym/ fitness center.

deskripsi:
Duta Garden Hotel is one of the three hotels united in Java Bali Accommodation. Situated in a strategic area of Timuran Village (Prawirotaman Area) that is well known internationally, Duta Garden Hotel managed by one of the lodging pioneers has been experienced in giving services to tourists from different countries. Its existence for more than a decade and its success to go through economy crisis proves that Duta Garden Hotel services are the best. Duta Garden Hotel provides you more than just bedrooms, but also beautiful, comfortable and clean atmosphere. The living room is designed in characteristic Yogyakarta style furnished with wooden chairs and ethnic ornaments. Guests can enjoy cool and comfortable rooms in tropical area as well as the bedrooms that are of tropical style. All are combined into compilation of Yogyakarta beauty a la Duta Garden Hotel. Welcome, we are ready to fulfill your expectation. This hotel is furnished with meeting rooms that can accommodate up to 25 people, telecommunication facilities for domestic and international, laundry service, tour information and safe deposit box. 
The hotel boasts some room categories, namely Single with Fan, Double with Fan, Single with AC and Double with AC. These cool and comfortable rooms are decorated in tropical style. Each room features garden view and comfortable terrace, as well as a private bathroom with shower/ bathtub. Other in-room amenities comprise direct dial telephone, safe and individually air conditioning. 
The property serves continental breakfast and à la carte lunch and dinner on request.
The property boasts an outdoor swimming pool with sunbathing bench and waterfall.

deskripsi:
This property located near Gembira Loka Zoo. 2 restaurants, a full-service spa, and an outdoor pool are available at this hotel. Free WiFi in public areas and free self parking are also provided. Additionally, a fitness center, a spa tub, and a steam room are onsite. All 189 rooms feature thoughtful touches like bathrobes and slippers, plus free WiFi and LED TVs with satellite channels. Balconies, room service, and free bottled water are among the other amenities available to guests. 
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages and body treatments. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a steam room. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.
Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. This hotel has 20 meeting rooms available for events. Free self parking is available onsite.
Make yourself at home in one of the 189 air-conditioned rooms featuring LED televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have designer toiletries and hair dryers.
Enjoy Halal dishes at Verandah Alfresco, one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6:00 AM to 10:00 AM for a fee.

deskripsi:
This new property is a cozy, bright and clean hotel. Its interiors have been designed in modern and minimalist style. All the comfortable guest rooms are complete with all the necessary facilities. Quiet and elegant, they allow the guests to rest in a truly relaxing ambience.
The 26 air-conditioned guestrooms at ECLIPSE Hotel include minibars and coffee/tea makers. Guests can use the in-room complimentary wireless high-speed Internet access. Rooms are equipped with flat-screen TVs with satellite channels. All accommodations provide desks and phones. Bathrooms offer showers with rainfall showerheads, and slippers. All units feature refrigerators and complimentary bottled water. In addition, housekeeping is offered daily and amenities available on request include hair dryers.
 The hotel offers a restaurant. A complimentary breakfast is served each morning. 
 Whether you're a fitness enthusiast or are just looking for a way to unwind after a hard day, you will be entertained by top-class recreational facilities such as outdoor pool. 
 Wireless Internet access is complimentary in public areas. Additional amenities include an outdoor pool, tour/ticket assistance, and laundry facilities.

deskripsi:
EDU Hostel is the first hostel of its type in all of Indonesia that modern and centrally located in downtown Jogja, catering to travelers who want to be in the center of it all. Truly experience the culture of Indonesia while staying near the famous shopping strip Malioboro Street. 
EDU's selection of private and dormitory-style rooms will provide what you need. Air conditioning and en-suite bathrooms set us a step above many other hostels, and spacious common areas and a huge rooftop help make us truly unique.
The hotel's recreational facilities, which include pool (kids), outdoor pool are designed for escape and relaxation.
Guests can watch TV in the shared lounge or surf internet at the computer corner. There is also a laundry service.

Farmhouse Jogja is a homestay that invites guests to experience living at home with family with agriculture nuance with 3 key elements of rural feel, simple and natural nuance. Today there are many fun elements of decoration that bring the look of a warm, simple and intelligent farmhouse to almost any home. And that's what we want to share. That is expected to bring a happiness to the family when staying in jogja

deskripsi:
favehotel Malioboro is a brand new hotel with traditional batik design concept, a distinct addition to Yogyakarta and a smart choice for travelers. Favehotel offers a fresh traditional design and affordable price with a fun atmosphere, fresh attitude and friendly services.
The ambiance of Favehotel Kotabaru is reflected in 75 unique and fresh guestrooms. Each room is fitted with 32” LED cable TV, double or twin bedding with 100% cotton bed sheets and duvets, writing desk with universal power outlet, AC, in-room safe deposit box, IDD telephone, free Wi-Fi, and en-suite bathroom with shower.
Breakfast is available daily at the hotel's restaurant.

deskripsi:
Forriz Hotel Yogyakarta offers accommodations in the special city of Yogyakarta. The hotel offers the best experience and good impression of an accommodation to complete your nice vacation or business trip.
This hotel has 4 comfortable room types: Superior, Deluxe, Suite, and Forriz Suite. Each room featured king-size or twin beds and equipped with the best interior and material design. 
All rooms are fitted with air-conditioner, flat-screen TV with satellite channels, free Wi-Fi in all areas, writing table, and coffee and tea making facilities. Each room comes with a private bathroom, slippers, and free toiletries.
Pawon Sari Restaurant and Galuh Makmur Lounge offers the best taste of hotel’s cuisine and culinary with the good quality, serving Indonesian and international dishes. Room service is available upon request.
You can also enjoy the hotel’s outdoor swimming pool with cozy place to share moments and happiness with your beloved family, couple, or friends. Other facilities include spa and massage service, and fitness center.

namahotel: Front One Resort Wisma Aji Yogjakarta
deskripsi:
This property located near Maguwoharjo Stadium. Along with a restaurant, this hotel has an outdoor pool and concierge services. Free WiFi in public areas and free self parking are also provided. Additionally, a 24-hour front desk and a garden are onsite. All 44 rooms offer free WiFi, room service, and flat-screen TVs with cable channels. Free bottled water, safes, and showers are among the other amenities that guests will find. 
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk and an elevator. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite.
Make yourself at home in one of the 44 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms with showers are provided. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.
Satisfy your appetite for lunch or dinner at the hotel's restaurant, Wisma Aji, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Local cuisine breakfasts are available daily from 6 AM to 10 AM for a fee.

This property located near Ullen Sentalu Museum. Along with dry cleaning, this guesthouse has laundry facilities and tour/ticket assistance. Free WiFi in public areas and free self parking are also provided. Other amenities include a garden. All 2 rooms offer free WiFi, room service, and LCD TVs with satellite channels. Ironing boards, desks, and free toiletries are among the other amenities that guests will find. 
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.
 The front desk is open daily from 6 AM - 10 PM. 
If you are planning to arrive after 10 PM please contact the property at least 24 hours in advance using the information on the booking confirmation. 24-hour airport shuttle service is available. Fees may apply. Contact the property in advance to get details.
Make yourself at home in one of the 2 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. deskripsi:
At University Club Hotel UGM you'll be within just a 15-minute stroll of Museum Sasmitaloka Panglima Besar Jenderal Sudirman and Taman Pintar Science Park. 
All 71 rooms feature LED TVs with cable channels, and you can enjoy free WiFi, coffee/tea makers, and free bottled water. Nice touches include slippers and free toiletries. Room service and desks are also available. Upgraded rooms come with high ceilings, while suites offer living areas. Kids 11 and under stay in a parent’s room at no charge. Separate guesthouses are available.
The restaurant in here serves local and international cuisine and is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Other amenities an on site coffee shop/café. 
Sights within a 15-minute walk of this Central Yogyakarta hotel include Malioboro Street and Sonobudoyo Museum. A perfect location gives quick access to Affandi Museum, which is 2.7 km away. 
 Highlights at this hotel include Wi-fi in public areas, free self parking, and a 24-hour business centre. There's also the convenience of an airport shuttle.

deskripsi:
Strategically located in Yogyakarta, GAIA Cosmo Hotel offers accommodation with an outdoor pool and sun loungers. The property provides secured parking and free WiFi access throughout the premises.
Guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant, have refreshments at the coffee shop or enjoy a drink at the on-site bar. Alternatively, an array of eateries can be found within walking distance from the hotel. Guests who need assistance can contact the 24-hour front desk. The staff is ready to assist with luggage storage, valet parking and concierge services. Airport transfer can also be arranged at a surcharge.

deskripsi:
Gallery Prawirotaman Hotel welcomes you for your cultural and adventure journey in Jogjakarta, from the heart of its arts & cultural center, world renowned Prawirotaman Area. Gallery Prawirotaman combines luxurios facilities, genuine Jogjakarta's hospitality, and modern - dutch colonial architecture, to become your perfect sanctuary to pamper yourself and explore Jogjakarta. 
Gallery Prawirotaman offers a choice of 94 beautiful rooms, each with a balcony, comprising 20 superior rooms, 71 deluxe rooms, and 3 suite rooms, with glorious views of Mt Merapi, Thousand Mountain Ridge, or tranquil scenery of our swimming pools. 
With the expertise of our chef, Our vine restaurant serves you with local cuisine, as well as international cuisines such as European, Japanese, and Chinese. Our chef is also avaible to fulfill your requests. Sky Lounge and Art Gallery enables your to enjoy your coffee, or traditional drinks with the view of Mt. Merapi in the North, Thousand Mountain Ridge in the South, and our own & local artist art collections. Sky lounge and art gallery offers you arts collection to been seen, or to be brought home as your personal collection. 
To make you stay perfect, the hotel is completed with fitness center, sky lounge, adult and children swimming pools, ballroom and meeting rooms, and Vine restaurant. The hotel also offers Jogjakarta's arts and culture for your five senses with it's own and local artist arts & music collection, culinary, spa & massage, and classes for you to engage with the local culture. Our Fitness Center is equipped with standard gym equipment to keep you healthy during your stay. Spa: With the traditional local ingredients and gentle touch of our masseuse, Gallery Spa & Massage offer you spa and massage to complete your Jogjakarta's culture five senses experience. Pool; With the calm and tranquil atmosphere, our swimming pool area is your place to relax after your adventure in the city. The swimming pools consist of 8x17m adult pool and 8x8 children pool. The poolside is also completed with loungers for you to relax and enjoy the sun.

deskripsi:
This property located near Suroloyo Peak. Along with a restaurant, this smoke-free bed & breakfast has concierge services and dry cleaning. Free WiFi in public areas and free self parking are also provided. Other amenities include laundry facilities, a 24-hour front desk, and tour/ticket assistance. All 10 rooms offer room service, electric kettles, and LED TVs with satellite channels. Free bottled water, ceiling fans, and safes are among the other amenities that guests will find. Housekeeping is available on request. 
Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access. This bed & breakfast also features concierge services and a television in a common area.
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite.
 If you are planning to arrive after 11:00 PM please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation.
Make yourself at home in one of the 10 air-conditioned rooms featuring LED televisions. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and electric kettles, and housekeeping is provided on request.
Enjoy a satisfying meal at Balkondes Giritengah serving guests of Giritengah Hotel.

deskripsi:
Gloria Aamanda as the city hotel guarantees commitment to service and a focus on hospitality. It offers 62 well-equipped accommodation units, and Gloria Aamanda offers other hotel-wide amenities and services, such as a laundry service with dry cleaning (for an additional fee), 24-hour room service (for an additional fee), a restaurant and a lobby with 24-hour check-out service to make each guest's stay convenient and comfortable. 
The hotel boasts some room categories, namely Family plus Room, Family Room, Superior Double Room, Superior Twin Room and Standard Room. The comfortably designed rooms feature a direct dial telephone, TV, Internet access, a minibar and air conditioning, as well as an en suite bathroom with shower. 
Breakfast is served each morning, and guests may select their lunch and dinner from set menus. 
Guests may take a dip in the outdoor swimming pool.

This property located near Borobudur Temple. Along with a restaurant, this bed & breakfast has an outdoor pool and concierge services. Free breakfast (local cuisine), free WiFi in public areas, and free self parking are also provided. Additionally, dry cleaning, laundry facilities, and a 24-hour front desk are onsite. All 12 rooms offer free WiFi, room service, and LED TVs with cable channels. Rainfall showerheads, electric kettles, and free bottled water are among the other amenities available to guests. 
Pamper yourself with onsite massages or enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool. Additional features at this bed & breakfast include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a picnic area.
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and laundry facilities. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.
24-hour airport shuttle service is available on request. Fees may apply. Contact the property in advance to make arrangements.
Make yourself at home in one of the 12 air-conditioned rooms featuring LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.
Enjoy a meal at Gopalan Borobudur, or stay in and take advantage of the bed & breakfast's room service (during limited hours). A complimentary local cuisine breakfast is served daily from 7:00 AM to 10:00 AM.

deskripsi:
Cozy hotel on convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations. Enjoys a commanding position in the culture, sightseeing hub of Yogyakarta. Gowongan Inn offers guests spacious air-conditioned rooms, 2 dining options and free parking. 
The hotel consists of 60 luxury rooms, the guests can choose from Superior, Deluxe, Suite, or Studio Rooms. Each room including king bed, free WiFi, LCD TV, AC, sofa, complimentary bottled water, telephone and coffee or tea maker. Luxury standing shower and hot & cold water are included in all en suite bathrooms. 
Guests can choose various food and beverages at Meranti Restaurant. This restaurant serves Indonesian and Western cuisine. 
Guests can refresh themselves by take a dip at the outdoor swimming pool.
The hotel offers wonderful recreational facilities such as garden, massage, spa to make your stay truly unforgettable. Guests also can enjoy 24 hours doctor on call, car rental, shopping arcade, business center and spacious car park area.

deskripsi:
This property located near TransMart Studio Mini. This smoke-free hotel features a restaurant, an outdoor pool, and a bar/lounge. Free WiFi in public areas, free self parking, and a free airport shuttle are also provided. Other amenities include a coffee shop/café, massage/treatment rooms, and 24-hour room service. All 193 rooms feature thoughtful touches like bathrobes and slippers, plus free WiFi and LCD TVs with digital channels. Other amenities available to guests include 24-hour room service, minibars, and premium bedding. 
Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a garden. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and an arcade/game room.
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is complimentary (available 24 hours).
24-hour airport shuttle service is available. Fees may apply. Contact the property in advance to get details.
Make yourself at home in one of the 193 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and bathrobes. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.
Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the coffee shop/café. The hotel also offers 24-hour room service. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6:00 AM to 9:30 AM for a fee.

deskripsi:
Grage Jogja Hotel & Restaurant is one of the hotels of Grage Group chain that spread in several places in Java and Sumatera, such as in Cirebon and Bengkulu. This hotel is located in Sosrowijayan, a legendary tourist village in Jogja, and it is very close to Malioboro as the famous tourism shopping center that can be reached only a five minute walk away from Sosrowijayan. The hotel features a comfortable ambiance, making it the ideal choice for business and leisure travelers. Guests are welcomed in the lobby with 24-hour reception and check-out services. Other amenities comprise a restaurant, room service, laundry service (for an additional fee) and a car park. 
The in-room amenities include air conditioning, satellite/ cable TV, a telephone and hot water in the en-suite bathroom with a shower and a bath. Further amenities comprise double or king-size beds, a safe, tea and coffee making facilities, as well as a balcony or terrace. 
The restaurant serves a continental breakfast buffet and à la carte and set menu for lunch and dinner. 
Guests are invited to take a refreshing dip in the outdoor swimming pool with sunbathing bench ready for use.

deskripsi:
This hotel will be seen directly as soon as you get in to Sosrowijayan street, in the eastern side of Malioboro. This three floors hotel has the most stunning and sophisticated construction compared to the surrounding hotels. This new hotel looks more eye catching because of its modern and functional architecture style and brilliant iridescence with its natural touch.
Cozy rooms at the Grage are equipped with cable TV and a tea/coffee maker. Each room has a private bathroom with shower facilities.
 The hotel’s coffee shop serves a variety of Indonesian and international dishes. Snacks and desserts can be enjoyed as well.
 Guests can enjoy Wi-Fi in public areas, currency exchange, newspapers, elevator, meeting facilities.
