deskripsi:
Grand Ambarrukmo Yogyakarta is a four-star hospitality brand, a subsidiary to the five-star hotel Royal Ambarrukmo Yogyakarta. Grand Ambarrukmo Yogyakarta is a classic-refined that bringing all the sweet and sentimental memory from the long history of Java in simplicity with a touch of modernity.
Grand Ambarrukmo Yogyakarta offers 142 guestrooms comprising of 88 Deluxe Rooms, 42 Grand Deluxe Rooms, 4 Grand Deluxe Premium, and 8 Suites Room. Standard facilities including; Hot & Cold Water, AC, Minibar, Wi-fi, International Direct Dialling call, TV, Laundry & Dry Cleaning. 
The Samara Restaurant located at the lobby level.The restaurant is designed in elegant yet cozy ambiance for casual dining. Open until 11.00 p.m. daily. It offers succulent menus from local favorites as well as international menu on buffet breakfast and a la carte menu throughout the day. Relax and enjoy the stylish, warm, fresh, relaxing and, entertaining atmosphere. Arcadaz Sky Lounge offers variety of beverage and finger food menus complemented by the songs of updated repertoire. 
Pool; Feel Yogyakarta morning spirit whilst swimming with city view at our swimming pool. Fitness Centre; Build your health, build your body, because strong minds come from strong body. Located in 5th floor, have your body fit using our fitness center with stunning view. The hotel also offers tour arrangement around the City of Yogyakarta and surrounding areas.

deskripsi:
As a brand new 5 star luxury hotel with an amazing 9-storey modern building overlooking the center of town and just steps to the main street of Yogyakarta, Grand Aston Yogyakarta features 141 newly furbished guest rooms and suites. High speed internet access in every thoughtfully designed space with some facilities such as Sky Lounge serves a variety of International cuisines, swimming pool, fitness center, spa and bar, as well as free parking lot. 
The hotel boasts some room and suite categories, namely Superior/ Twin, Deluxe Room, Suite Room King and President Suite. Fitted with floor-to-ceiling windows, the spacious rooms are decorated in soothing neutral colors. All the 141 rooms at this hotel are tailored to satisfy guests' needs. Each room includes in room safe, desk, a cable TV and minibar, as well as bathrooms equipped with a bathtub and hairdryer. 
To satisfy guests' appetite, main restaurant serves Indonesian and international cuisines, as well as Sky Lounge and Bar are also available in hotel. 
Guests can spoil themselves with body treatments at spa or sauna. In addition, for those who want to soak can visit the outdoor swimming pool or sunbath at the poolside, whilst for those who want to enjoy a work-out can visit gym/ fitness center.

deskripsi:
Grand Dafam Rohan Jogja is located on one of Yogyakarta's important main roads (in front of J.E.C), thus, provide a very easy access for the visiting guests.
The hotel offers a total number of 186 rooms, divided into various room types, including Deluxe Rooms, Executive Rooms, Family Rooms, Junior Suites, Honeymoon Suites, and Grand Rohan Suite. Room facilities including; LED/LCD TV (with international channel) Coffee/Tea Maker, Mini Bar, In-Room Safe
Wifi Internet Access, In-Room Entertainment, Connecting Room Available and Toiletries. 
Grandin; Indulge the tantalizing cuisine and exclusive embience as the cozy atmosphere and view in Grandin Restaurant. We serve exotic culinary delights of international and Asian dishes. including the aunthentic of Indonesia dishes. Lobby Lounge; perfect spot to enjoy the exclusive ambience of the hotel while savoring freshening beverages and light snacks, along with your relatives, colleagues and friends. Premium Sky Lounge; An ideal place for rendezvous and escape form the bustle to enjoying freshening beverages and delicious light snacks. 
Women Spa; Naura Muslimah Care Center feature dedicated spa facilities where you can indulge with inspired treatment that use a combination of high quality oils and aromatherapy delivered by skilled therapists. Pool and fitness centre; keep fit during your travel; explore our exclusive collection of gym equipment with swimming pools.

deskripsi:
Featuring classic but modern design Inna Garuda Hotel & Convention & Business is ideal for those travelling for pleasure or business, and offers a total of 223 rooms spread over 7 floors. Facilities include lobby with 24-hour reception, hotel safe, currency exchange, lift access, cafe, bar, restaurant as well as WLAN/ internet access (for an additional fee). In addition, there are conference rooms, shopping arcade, and for an extra charge laundry and room services available. The hotel also provides wide parking spaces. Other support amenities include airlines ticket agent, taxi service and souvenir shop, as well as beauty salon. 
The modern and elegant accommodation, which faces on to Malioboro Street features a classical style and come equipped with all the contemporary amenities. Facilities include en-suite bathroom, double beds, individually adjustable air conditioning, minibar, direct dial telephone and satellite television with a video program. 
To satisfy guests' appetite, the hotel boasts some fine dining venues, which are Coffee Shop Malioboro, Function Restaurant Sasana Handrawina, Lounge Mataram and Function Restaurant Sekar Kedaton, these restaurants serve Indonesian, Japanese as well as Chinese specialties. Guests can enjoy a cup of steaming coffee at the cafe. A breakfast buffet is provided every morning. 
Guests can enjoy a refreshing dip in the swimming pool or sunbath at the poolside. 
Formerly Inna Garuda Yogyakarta

deskripsi:
This property located near Gadjah Mada University. Along with 2 restaurants, this hotel has an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Free WiFi in public areas and free valet parking are also provided. Additionally, a bar/lounge, a rooftop terrace, and a conference center are onsite. All 177 individually decorated rooms feature free WiFi and 24-hour room service. For a bit of entertainment, guests will find LCD TVs with cable channels, and other amenities include minibars and electric kettles. 
Don't miss out on recreational opportunities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the area shuttle (surcharge).
Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Depok? This hotel has facilities measuring 4306 square feet (400 square meters), including a conference center. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free valet parking is available onsite.
 Airport shuttle service is available on request from 7:30 AM to 9:00 PM. Fees may apply. Contact the property in advance to make arrangements.
Make yourself at home in one of the 177 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.
Enjoy local and international cuisine at SRI MANGANTI, one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6 AM to 10 AM for a fee.

deskripsi:
The 2-star Grand Marto Hotel offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Yogyakarta. This property is 1 minute walk from the beach. Offering a 24-hour front desk and 24-hour Indonesian food room service, Grand Marto is located a 10-minute drive from Malioboro Street. Free WiFi access is available.
Each air-conditioned room here will provide you with a flat-screen TV, a seating area and a wardobe. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with free toiletries. You can enjoy garden view from the room.
Relaxing massage can be arranged upon request. 
At Grand Marto you will find a garden, a shared pantry and a terrace. The friendly staff can assist with car hire, bike rental and airport transfers at additional charges. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge, dry cleaning and laundry facilities. The property offers free parking. Guests enjoy a free welcome drink for 2 persons.

deskripsi:
Grand Mercure Yogyakarta Adi Sucipto, located in the east of Yogyakarta, very close to the airport, is combining rich Javanese traditions with renowned French touches to deliver a fresh perspective on world-class service. Savour enticing flavours of foods in our restaurant. Relax with unlimited tapas & exotic drinks in our lounge. 
RoomsThere are wide range of rooms available at this hotel; from Superior Room to Deluxe Suite with Hollywood King Size Bed. Each room have safe deposit box, 40" LED TV, satellite channels, rain shower, mini fridge, press reader, kettle jug, free WIFI, high-speed Internet access. Smoking room available upon request.
Brekfast served daily. Purple Restaurant; Speciality on Brazilian Grill with a wide range of international dishes and the best selection of Indonesian cuisine. Feel the experience of our comfort ambience and personalised service. Eighty Eight Bar; Enjoy a relaxing time at our cozy and comfort lounge & bar, with wide array of lights delicacies, cocktails and mocktails.
Enjoy the beautiful sunset view from our large outdoor pool. We provide reliable Wi-Fi connection to fulfill the essential needs of business and leisure travellers. This hotel also offers a fully equipped gym.

deskripsi:
This property located near TransMart Studio Mini. Along with a restaurant, this smoke-free hotel has a fitness center and concierge services. Free WiFi in public areas and free self parking are also provided. Additionally, dry cleaning, laundry facilities, and a 24-hour front desk are onsite. All 178 soundproofed rooms feature free WiFi and room service. For a bit of entertainment, guests will find LCD TVs with cable channels, and other amenities include coffee makers and electric kettles. 
Enjoy recreation amenities such as a fitness center or take in the view from a garden. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.
Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-in, and dry cleaning/laundry services. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.
 Airport shuttle service is available on request during limited hours. Fees may apply. Contact the property in advance to make arrangements.
Make yourself at home in one of the 178 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and slippers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.
Satisfy your appetite for lunch, dinner, or brunch at Restaurant, a restaurant which specializes in Asian cuisine, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6 AM to 10 AM for a fee.

deskripsi:
Grand Puri Saron Boutique Hotel Yogyakarta is the ideal accommodation, offering a comfortable and convenient accommodation, accompanied with a number of modern facilities and excellent services. With an affordable rate, this accommodation is suitable for both business travelers and those seeking for vacation and leisure.
This accommodation offers clean and modern rooms and suites, along with thoughtfully designed facilities. Each unit is specifically designed to make your staying experience enjoyable and unforgettable. 
Room amenities in each unit are including twin or double bedding options, air-conditioner, TV with satellite/cable channels, free Wi-Fi connection, writing desk, and coffee and tea making facilities. The en-suite bathroom comes with hot/cold water shower, bathtub, and toiletries.
An on-site restaurant is available, exclusively serving to the guests with delicious Indonesian cuisines.

deskripsi:
Featuring Javanese style merged into modern style, Grand Quality Yogyakarta boasts a total of 192 guest rooms on offer. Known as GQ Yogyakarta, Grand Quality Yogyakarta provides an array of utmost amenities including air-conditioned, and guests are welcomed in a lobby with lift access to the upper floors. There are a newspaper stand, a children's playground on site, internet access and room service also available. It is well equipped with business facilities, such as conference and banquet services. Those guests who are arriving by car may leave their vehicle in the hotel's car park. 
The hotel features room categories, namely Deluxe Room, Executive Floor Rooms, Studio Suite Room, Honeymoon Suites, Junior Suites, Executive Suite Rooms, Business Suite Room and a Presidential Suite. Each room has an en-suite bathroom with a shower and a bath. Rooms are furnished with double beds, and amenities include a direct dial telephone, satellite/cable TV, an internet access and air conditioning. 
The hotel provides some fine dining venues, which are Nagoya Japanese Resto that caters authentic Japanese cuisines and Serayu Chinese Restaurant which caters tasty seafood and Chinese cuisines. Furthermore, 24-hour coffee shop is also available to satisfy guests' appetite. 
Guests can take a refreshing dip in the outdoor swimming pool. They can also join in an aerobics class and work out in the gym then relax in the sauna, steam room or with a massage or spa treatment. Table tennis facilities are also available. For those who want to play golf can visit Cangkringan Merapi golf course reached within a 30-minute drive from hotel.

deskripsi:
As an Oriental budget accommodation comprising 43 rooms, Grand Rosela boasts an array of amenities including air conditioning, a hotel safe and lift access to upper floors. Guests can unwind in the TV lounge, enjoy a fresh beverages at the cafe or dine in the restaurant. Room and laundry services are available, while those arriving by car can park their vehicles in the hotel car parking. Other amenities include free hot spot, laundry service, safe deposit box, a car rental, drugstore and business center, as well as free transfer to/ from railway station and airport. 
The accommodation is divided into three categories, namely Moderate Room, Standard Room and Deluxe Room. All the rooms are overlooking a spacious swimming pool and lush tropical gardens. They come en suite with a shower, a bath and a hairdryer. Further room facilities include air conditioning, hot water, tea and coffee maker (for Deluxe and Super Deluxe), complete bathroom amenities and a satellite TV/ cable TV. 
Guests will be indulged by free evening snacks, and they can also have food and beverages in the hotel restaurant. 
Guests can enjoy a refreshing dip in the hotel's very nice outdoor swimming pool. Guests may also take part in an aerobics session, and pamper themselves with a range of spa treatments. Furthermore, the hotel provides an entertainment program for children.

deskripsi:
This property located near Gadjah Mada University. This hotel features a restaurant, a bar/lounge, and a business center. Free WiFi in public areas and free valet parking are also provided. Additionally, concierge services, dry cleaning, and laundry facilities are onsite. All 100 rooms offer free WiFi, room service, and plasma TVs with cable channels. Free bottled water, ceiling fans, and desks are among the other amenities that guests will find. 
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).
Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free valet parking is available onsite.
 24-hour airport shuttle service is available on request. Fees may apply. Contact the property in advance to make arrangements.
 
Make yourself at home in one of the 100 air-conditioned rooms featuring plasma televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and slippers. Conveniences include desks and complimentary bottled water, and housekeeping is provided daily.
Satisfy your appetite for lunch or dinner at the hotel's restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge.

deskripsi:
Welcome to Grand Serela Yogyakarta, the new Islamic-based Hotel experience available in the great city of Yogyakarta. Inspired by the spirit of warmth and togetherness of Islam, Grand Serela Yogyakarta welcomes each and every guest as if they are a part of our family, ensuring them a comfortable, enjoyable stay from the moment they enter our door, up until they enjoy our collection of 78 fantastic guest rooms/facilities, and until they depart. Ahlan wa Sahlan, please come to our Hotel, and please enjoy your stay. 
Grand Serela Yogyakarta features a collection of 78 guest rooms divided into 2 different types: Superior and Deluxe, with each designed with the utmost care to become the perfect sanctuary whenever you wish for a relaxing Hotel experience. Amenities including; Arabian Style Interior Design, Comfort Beds, High Quality Linen & Towel, Flat LED TV, Safe Deposit Box, Praying Kit Set In Room, Welcoming Food & Drink Arabian Style, Writing Desk, Bath Amenities, TV Cable Channel, Hair Dryer, Coffee & Tea Making Set, Mini Refrigerator.
Grand Serela Yogyakarta; Delectable, delicious, and of course Halal: these are the core elements of our Restaurant. Providing guests a good selection of food and beverage menus that are prepared and presented by a team of highly trained chefs, there is always something here to enjoy. Lounge; The modern and exclusive lounge of Grand Serela Yogyakarta is the perfect place to unwind, or even perhaps have business meetings with clients, inside more relaxed, casual atmosphere. Light meals and beverages are available for you to enjoy, and when combined with the friendly services from our staff, you can be ensured of a good, relaxing time. 
Do you require venues to hold your meetings or events in Yogyakarta? With a collection of six meeting rooms with different configurations and a modern ballroom capable of housing up to 800 individuals, you just cannot go wrong with Grand Serela Yogyakarta hotel. Featuring modernly designed venues complemented with comprehensive selection of facilities supported by a team of professional staff, we are always ready to make your meetings or events in Yogyakarta a great success.

deskripsi:
Just a 10-minute drive from Taman Sari Water Palace, Grand Surya Hotel Yogyakarta offers massage services and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel has a restaurant and provides free parking.
The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a TV, seating area and wardrobe. The en suite bathroom is equipped with free toiletries. Certain rooms come with windows, while others have a balcony.
Local and international dishes are served at the restaurant, which also offers room service.
Car and bicycle rental services are also available. Staff can provide laundry and dry cleaning services. Luggage storage is available at the front desk.

deskripsi:
Offering quality accommodations in the business, restaurants, culture district of Yogyakarta, Grand Tjokro Yogyakarta is a popular pick for both business and leisure travelers. Set from the excitement of the city, this 4-star hotel commands an excellent location and provides access to the city's biggest attractions. 
The hotel features a numerous collection of 107 guest rooms spread across 8 floors and divided into 3 different types for your convenience: Superior, Deluxe, and Suite. Boasting large windows and fine bedding, each room is fully air-conditioned. In-room comforts include a flat-screen satellite TV, seating area and an electric kettle. A hairdryer and a shower are provided in the attached bathroom.
Tjokro Restaurant offers a selection of Indonesian dishes. Meals can also be enjoyed in the privacy of guests’ rooms.
The hotel offers an excellent variety of recreational facilities, including karaoke, pool (kids), outdoor pool, fitness center, spa. 
The hotel houses a meeting room and a business centre for guests’ professional needs. Those who wish to explore the area can make use of the car rental service. Guests also enjoy convenience of on-site laundry and airport shuttle services.

deskripsi:
Grand Zuri Malioboro Yogyakarta is perfectly located in the heart of Yogyakarta's bustling Malioboro Road and the city's icon Tugu Monument. The neighbourhood area provides easy access to Beringharjo traditional market, Malioboro shopping street and Tugu railway station. Designed for both business and leisure travellers, Grand Zuri Malioboro Yogyakarta promises a distinct level of service and facilities. 
138 contemporary designed rooms and suites occupy a 7 storey building. All rooms are modern in design, combining modern minimalist look with exceptional comfort. All suites feature a separate living area, a spacious work desk and a large bathroom with bathtub and are complemented with WIFI, 32 inch LCD TV and minibar. Guests will sleep easy on customized Zuri Dream by Kingkoil bedding with a plush pillow and duvet blanket.
Located on 2nd floor, CERENTI Restaurant offers a wide selection of Indonesian and International dishes, also serving buffet breakfast daily. Besides, guests also can enjoy ZURI lounge, an ideal venue to meet guests or friends whilst enjoying our cocktails, fine wines, champagnes, coffees, teas and other delicacies. Outdoor area facing the street is a favorite spot for some ‘people watching’.
 The hotel offers wonderful recreational facilities such as spa, outdoor pool, fitness center, massage to make your stay truly unforgettable. 
Top features of the hotel include car park, tours, elevator, laundry service, smoking area.

deskripsi:
Hotel was constructed in 2014. There are a total of 96 rooms on the premises. The property consists of 96 double rooms. This popular hotel provides the ideal base for exploring the area. The Hotel is situated at the heart of the city. Guests can easily walk to the main bus and train stations. There are multiple public transport links within easy reach. The Hotel is a quick drive from the airport. The main entertainment areas of the city are within easy reach of the Hotel . Guests can find the nearest golf course only a short drive from the property. The Hotel is just a stone's throw away from the beach. The on-site car park may be useful to those arriving by car.
 The air-conditioned rooms at Greenhost Boutique Hotel Prawirotaman are all tastefully decorated featuring wardrobe, seating area, and a smart TV with cable channels. The en suite bathroom comes with hot and cold shower facility complete with towel and free toiletries. Guests can enjoy a city view from the room.
As for dining options the on-site Kitchen Gallery Restaurant serves Indonesian and Western dishes, whilst the Rooftop Bar and Lounge offers refreshing beverages.
Guests can also indulge in relaxing massages at the on-site spa and wellness centre at an additional charge. Also take a dip in the swimming pool.
 A 24-hour front desk is available to assist guests with laundry and dry cleaning requests, airport shuttle service, as well as arrange car hires, all at additional charges.

deskripsi:
Take advantage of a wealth of unrivaled services and amenities at Griya Jogja hotel. Griya Jogja Hotel provides a most conducive spot for you to take a break from your busy days. The hotel also offers many access to the city's landmarks.
Griya Jogja Hotel is designed to give a good and elegant impression which has air conditioned rooms are also equipped with heating, cable/satellite channels and sofa. The private bathroom comes with a shower.
 
The hotel's restaurant serves seafood, Indonesian and Italian cuisine. The concept of the restaurant is made unique and with full music. Room service is also available at this hotel. 
The hotel provides body treatments, a sauna and a beauty centre. Besides, You can also go to Kranggan Market, Tugu Yogyakarta, and Malioboro street which easy to access from this hotel.
 Another facilities the hotel offers including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, 24-hour front desk, Wi-Fi in public areas, safe box, family room, car park, bicycle rental, and car rental.

Guests will also find premium bedding, free bottled water, and showers.

namahotel: Griya Persada Convention Hotel and Resort Kaliurang
deskripsi:
This property located near Ullen Sentalu Museum. This resort features 4 restaurants, an indoor pool, and an outdoor pool. Free WiFi in public areas, free self parking, and a free manager's reception are also provided. Other amenities include 2 bars/lounges, a fitness center, and 3 coffee shops/cafés. All 117 rooms boast fireplaces and offer free WiFi and Select Comfort beds. Other amenities available to guests include free wired Internet, living rooms, and dining areas. 
Relax and unwind with body treatments and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool, an indoor pool, and a steam room. This Art Deco resort also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and an arcade/game room. The shuttle (surcharge) will take you to the nearby beach or shopping center.
Featured amenities include wired Internet access (surcharge), a business center, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Event facilities at this resort consist of a conference center and a meeting room. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available on request) and a train station pick-up service.
 Airport shuttle service is available on request. Fees may apply. Contact the property in advance to make arrangements.
Make yourself at home in one of the 117 air-conditioned rooms featuring fireplaces. Your Select Comfort bed comes with Frette Italian sheets. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Conveniences include desks and separate sitting areas, as well as phones with free local calls.
Enjoy Indonesian cuisine at kendali sada, one of the resort's 4 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Snacks are also available at the 3 coffee shops/cafés. Mingle with other guests at the complimentary reception, held daily. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. A complimentary breakfast is included.
 Nearby Attractions

deskripsi:
Griya Persada Convention Hotel & Resort was thoughtfully designed to ensure every moment you treasure, leave the unforgettable memory in mind. Our great services and facilities will support all of your activities, whether it’s your family vacation, business or social events. It is our pleasure to help you and your loved one to enjoy your precious time to the fullest. Griya Persada Convention Hotel & Resort was deliberately established to give a new way of doing your business with ultimate relaxation of true nature and luxurious comfort. We provide well-integrated facilities for business and more than adequate amenities to complete your blissfulness stay.
This hotel provides well-furnished rooms reflect the atmosphere of true nature and luxurious comfort for our guests. Each guest room has true comfort bed, an ensuite bathroom with bathtub / shower, IDD telephone, color flatscreen TV, mini bar, tea & coffee making facilities and 24-hour room service. The range start from the standard room up to a villa for 6 people.
There are four restaurants at this hotel, Kendalisada Lounge & Cafe; Turgo Resto – Chinese Restaurant; Rama Shinta – Javanese Cuisine; and Oo BaksoO.
This hotel offers many kinds of activities to choose, from the swimming pool, Intan Pranawa Library, Pranajiwa Fitness Center & Aerobic, Karaoke Room, Playground, Business Center, Salon & Spa, Silver Shop, Jogja Corner Shop, and Outbound Area.

There are four restaurants at this hotel, Kendalisada Lounge & Cafe; Turgo Resto – Chinese Restaurant; Rama Shinta – Javanese Cuisine; and Oo BaksoO.
This hotel offers many kinds of activities to choose, from the swimming pool, Intan Pranawa Library, Pranajiwa Fitness Center & Aerobic, Karaoke Room, Playground, Business Center, Salon & Spa, Silver Shop, Jogja Corner Shop, and Outbound Area.

deskripsi:
Located right next to Galeria Mall in Yogyakarta, H Boutique Hotel Jogjakarta offers a modern and cosy accommodation featuring an on-site restaurant, free WiFi access in all rooms and free on-site public parking for guests who drive. The hotel also offers free shuttle service to the famed Malioboro Street.
The rooms at H Boutique Hotel Jogjakarta are all air-conditioned and each one is fitted with a wardrobe, flat-screen cable TV, minibar, a fridge, and an electric kettle. The en suite bathroom has bath or shower facility complete with towels and free toiletries.
As for dining option, the on-site restaurant serves hearty Indonesian dishes. Room service is also available for guests' convenience.

deskripsi:
Habitat at Hyarta, a perfect accommodation for travelers to get experience the legendary javanese tradition, warm welcome from local people of Yogyakarta, with their kindness, modesty and smiles, will give lots of memorable experience. An elegant contemporary style villas with a touch of Yogyakarta cultural heritage, Habitat@Hyarta offers lush green and peaceful ambience during your stay, in a sophisticated and relaxing atmosphere. Our friendly local staff, will help you feel at home during your stay in Yogyakarta. We also provide free Wi-Fi in each villa, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, and private check in/check out. 
 Each villa has three spacious bedrooms with three bathrooms that comes with an intimate dining room, comfortable living room and kitchen, equipment with a refrigerator and kitchenware. All guestrooms feature a variety of comforts, certain rooms even provide Internet access, air conditioning, a desk, and cable TV to please the most discerning guest. 
We are serving room services, various menu from International and Traditional Javanese cuisine such as ; Burger, Sandwiches, Nasi Ayam Rempah, Bakmi Godog and Tempe Kemul, etc.
Whether you're a fitness enthusiast or are just looking for a way to unwind after a hard day, you will be entertained by top-class features such as a fitness center, outdoor pool, and children's playground for your kids.

deskripsi:
This property located near Palace of Yogyakarta. Along with a 24-hour front desk, this smoke-free hostel has tour/ticket assistance and a garden. WiFi in public areas is free. All 8 rooms offer free WiFi, room service, and showers. 
Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access.
There is no front desk at this property. To make arrangements for check-in please contact the property ahead of time using the information on the booking confirmation.

deskripsi:
Hotel was built in 2014. The property consists of 25 single rooms, 90 double rooms, 11 junior suites and 5 suites. Set in the city centre, the Hotel offers easy access to the city and all it has to offer. The Hotel is within easy reach of the city's main bus and train stations. The Hotel is situated a few minutes away from the harbour.
 The smartly decorated rooms are fitted with air conditioning, flat-screen satellite TV and safety deposit box. Complete with a minibar, the soundproofed room also has an electric kettle and desk. The en suite bathroom is equipped with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries.
 A selection of Asian and Western cuisine can be sampled in Rustik Restaurant.
 Relaxing massage can be enjoyed at the spa and wellness centre. Guests are also welcomed to take a dip in the outdoor pool 
A 24-hour front desk will be happy to assist with laundry/ironing services and luggage storage space. Harper Mangkubumi also offers concierge service, meeting facilities and a business centre. Airport transfer can be arranged at an additional charge.

Enjoy recreation amenities such as bicycles to rent or take in the view from a terrace. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

deskripsi:
Just 5 minutes’ walk from Tugu Train Station and Malioboro Street, Horison Ultima Riss Malioboro Yogyakarta offers a convenient staying space in the middle of Yogyakarta, a cultural, social, and historical heritage city.
 The air-conditioned rooms here will provide guests with either a double bed or twin bed setting, a flat-screen satellite TV, safety deposit box and a seating area with sofa. Complete with a refrigerator, the dining area also has an electric kettle. The private bathrooms also come with a shower, free toiletries and slippers. Laundry and ironing services are offered at a charge.
 Daily breakfast is served at the hotel’s restaurant with room service possible.
Horison Ultima Riss Malioboro Yogyakarta offers an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a spa and wellness centre.

deskripsi:
Right in the heart of Yogyakarta's backpacker's mecca Sosrowijayan area 1001 malam hotel stands like no other.Situated in gang dua 1001 malam hotel will immediately strike you with its original architecture traditional Javanese artist fantasy down to the smallest detail romantic garden environment and the serene sound of the waterfall.Step inside see the arts on the walls the tiles on the ground the bricks on the walls the windows the chairs the stones the rooms the paintings the terrace the garden the fish pond the waterfall. 
Each of the 16 signature rooms comes with a unique warm wall painting, private terrace, antique furniture, air conditioning, safe box, wifi connection, private bathroom with hot and cold water, and home atmosphere.
Sit and enjoy any of our homemade Indonesian or western dishes in the comfort of your private balcony or in the terrace, or just have a walk outside and choose from an endless variety of local restaurants that offer anything from local Yogyakarta food to hamburgers and pizzas and western dishes.
tThe hotel is perfect as your base for interesting side trips around central java. 1001 malam hotel also provides tour arrangement for you to some places inside and outside Yogyakarta. You can visit Borobudur temple Prambanan, Dieng plateau, ijen, Bromo mountain. Or simply have a city tour to see the nearby Sultan Palace, Taman Sari water castle and many more.

deskripsi:
Stay at Bugis Asri Hotel to discover the wonders of Yogyakarta. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and services to ensure you have a great time. This hotel is just 500 m from Tamansari (water castle) and the Yogyakarta Royal Palace. Wi-Fi in public areas, airport transfer, car park, laundry service, family room are provided for guest who stay. 
The guestrooms feature television, wardrobe, air conditioning, desk, complimentary bottled water, Wi-Fi, a safe and shower at the bathroom.
You can rent a car and go sightseeing to many city's attractions like Malioboro Street’s popular shopping outlets. Car rental is available at this property.

deskripsi:
Hotel Graha Kinasih Kotabaru is a popular choice amongst travelers in Yogyakarta, whether exploring or just passing through. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. A 15-minute drive from the royal palace of Yogyakarta, Hotel Graha Kinasih Kotabaru offer rooms with private terraces. 24 hours front desk, tour desk and free parking spaces are available on site. Free Wi-Fi is accessible in public areas.
All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home. The guestrooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, desk, internet access wireless, air conditioning. The rooms also come with dark wood and the bathroom here feature a shower. 
Breakfast is served in the hotel’s dining area. Room service is also available. With exploring the hotel area about 5 minutes, you can find various dining options like Cafe Arta and Bakso Daging Sapi Fadhil.

deskripsi:
Hotel Indah Palace features the rich traditions of Javanese culture merged into unique Joglo-style architecture and exquisite gardens, creating a relaxing little oasis in the city. It offers comfort and convenience with tastefully fitted interiors using traditional Javanese architectural styles and modern amenities. The air-conditioned business hotel offers 25 guest rooms in total, and facilities include a lobby with 24-hour check-out service, a hotel safe, cafe, restaurant and free hot spot. Room service and a laundry service are offered for additional fees. Further amenities include a car rental, safe deposit box and business center. 
The accommodation is divided into two categories, namely Superior Room and Super Deluxe Room. Guest rooms come complete with air conditioning, an International Direct Dial (IDD) telephone, tea and coffee making facilities, as well as an in-room safe. Other in-room amenities comprise a minibar, snack bar, satellite TV/ cable TV and a private bathroom with shower. Internet access is also available in the guest rooms. 
Breakfast is served each morning, and set menu options are available for lunch and dinner. 
Guests can soak in the outdoor swimming pool or sunbath at the poolside. For those who want to rejuvenate their body and mind can try a massage or spa treatment.

deskripsi:
Welcome to Hotel Kirana travelers, a place to lay your weary head. Well-known for its family-friendly environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Kirana Hotel makes it easy to enjoy the best of Yogyakarta Region. Prepare yourself to find the most exciting places and moments nearby with your friends or family. This comfortable hotel in Yogyakarta offers complimentary wireless internet, as well as a 24-hour reception and an express check-in and check-out feature. It also features luggage storage, free parking on-site, and a concierge
Our rooms were quite dated but clean and bed was large and comfort. You can sleep soundly in the night to refresh yourself in a tiring day. 
 Kirana Hotel is sure to make your visit to Yogyakarta Region one worth remembering. While you stay, you'll have many interesting place options to visit such as Malioboro Street, Taman Sari, The Yogyakarta Fortress Museum, Kraton Yogyakarta, and Alun-Alun Yogyakarta.

Welcome to Hotel Lilik, where you can have a restful night and an unforgettable trip in Yogyakarta. Situated in Gedong Tengen, from this hotel you just need 5 minutes on feet to Malioboro Mall and 10 minutes on feet to the city center of Yogyakarta where you can find entertainments, shopping places, eateries and many more. Hotel Lilik provides many facilities and services for guest who stay, 24 hours front desk, laundry, express check in/out, Wi-Fi in public areas, and parking area for guest who drive are provided. 
Hotel Lilik has modern design guestrooms with a number of facilities such as air conditioner, seating area, minibar, climate control, TV, private bathroom feature shower and toiletries. 
A complimentary breakfast is served at dining area. Explore the hotel area with 2 to 5 minutes on feet, you'll find various restaurants.

deskripsi:
Located in the touristic area of Yogyakarta City Center, Hotel Mataram 2 is in front of the Tugu Railway Station and taking 25 minutes from Adisucipto Airport. This Javanese building architecture provides a variety of facilities and services.
19 rooms in here are divided by 3 types of room. Twin room, Superior room, and Pavilium room are equipped with AC, telephone, TV, hot and cool water, personal bathroom and shower. You can enjoy the other facility such as free Internet Hotspot. 
 You can have various cuisine at the hotel's restaurant or you can get through room service. 
During stay in hotel, you can go on to many other interesting places in Jogjakarta, such as Vredeburg Fortress, Jogjakarta Sultan Palace, Taman Sari Water Castle and many more. This accommodation is also close with Malioboro Street where you can do shopping, there are beautiful souvenirs and exotic handicrafts. This hotel offers meeting room for your business activities and garden party space, is available for birthday party and etc. Wi-Fi in public areas and free parking are available at this property.

deskripsi:
Hotel Mawar Asri is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Yogyakarta. Mawar Asri Hotel aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year. Hotel Mawar Asri Yogyakarta is situated a 5-minute walk from Sultan Palace and a 10-minute walk from shopping options at the popular Malioboro Street. It houses a restaurant and offers rooms with free Wi-Fi access. For travelers arriving by car, free parking is available.
 Fitted with tiled flooring, air-conditioned rooms at Mawar Asri feature warm shades, unique, modern and eco-friendly room. The rooms also feature writing desk, 32’’ LED TV with local and international channels, universal electrical outlet, free high speed Wifi. Pamper yourself in bathroom with hot & cool rain shower and amenities
Guests can enjoy free breakfast and an on-site restaurant during their stay. You can also find nearby restaurants include Pendopo Ndalem Resto, Gulai Kepala Ikan Bank Jo, and Oseng Mercon Bu Narti.

deskripsi:
Hotel Neo Malioboro, located in Yogyakarta City Center, Yogyakarta, is a popular choice for travelers. Only 5 Km from the city center, the hotel's strategic location ensures that guests can quickly and easily reach many local points of interest. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.
Each air-conditioned room comes with a flat-screen satellite TV, safety deposit box and tea/coffee-making facilities. Shower facilities are available in the private bathrooms. Extras include slippers and free toiletries.
The hotel offers wonderful recreational facilities such as outdoor pool to make your stay truly unforgettable.
The hotel offers access to a vast array of services, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service.

deskripsi:
Hotel Novatel Yogyakarta, a perfect accommodation for business purposes and family getaway in the heart of Yogyakarta, Surrounded by offices, hospitals, and shopping center. We define the harmonious combination of business and leisure with child friendly benefits - free accommodation and breakfast for children under 16 years.
This property features 25 rooms, each bedroom is fitted with a flat screen TV, air conditioning, seating area, and an en suite bathroom with hot and cold shower facility.
 While stay at this strategic hotel, it's an opportunity for you to see what's Yogyakarta has to offer, discover the coolness of nature, white sandy beaches & Mount Merapi. Dive into the cultural history at the Sultan's Palace, or buy souvenirs of batik-one of the unique heritage at Malioboro Street.

deskripsi:
Do you have no idea which hotel you will stay comfortly with an affordable price in the center of The City of Students? If you do, you can select us, Paramitha Hotel, as your best option. Our hotel stands right nearby Affandi Street (Gejayan), Kepuh, Gondokusuman III/936, Malioboro Mall, and also close to Bringharjo Market. Our hotel keeps the uniqueness of Javanese interior with a little modern touch. Our lobby and the rooms are still using shiny brown woods.
There are twenty rooms provided in our hotel. They are consisted in various types: standard, superior and deluxe. Every room is equipped with a clean rest room, air conditioner, cable tv and a shower in the bathroom. Certain facilities differentiate every type of the rooms, for example: the superior provides hot and cold water, plus a mini bar.

deskripsi:
Hotel Star 88 is placed 3.3 km from Bringharjo Market. This Sleman hotel provides comfort whether you're on business or holiday in Yogyakarta, the hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities like 24-hour security, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas are just some of the facilities on offered. 
 The rooms at Hotel Star 88 feature Wi-Fi, climate control, a laptop safe, TV, and ironing facilities. The private bathroom come with shower, bath sheets, and toiletries. The rooms in here are non smoking.
There's a restaurant available at this hotel. The accommodation is also surrounded by many dining options.
 For your business needs, this hotel has already provided meeting room with photocopy. You can go sightseeing to many places like monuments and museum, and for shopping enthusiast, can go shopping at the Malioboro Mall and and Galleria Mall are located 4 km from the hotel.

deskripsi:
Taken from Javanese culture, the word “tentrem” refers to a feeling of peacefulness and tranquility–a broader meaning of “tentrem” embraces the concept of harmony between the universe and mankind, concocting a most perfect serenity. Taking a different path than most, Hotel Tentrem is proud to be an independent hotel and we are focus on who we will become. Our culture guides our action toward our service. We believe that every individual is unique, thus we value every expression and aspiration as a contribution to better serve you. Whether you are on business or leisure, our luxurious suites, inspired interior, state of the art facilities, and thoughtful amenities will create an unforgettable experience of living in harmony. Designed by the most creative minds in profession, built by the finest people in the industry, and manage by the most passionate hoteliers, we have finally begun our journey to serve you.
Hotel Tentrem Yogyakarta offers 273 heavenly accommodation with a combination of modern and traditional Javanese style ranging from 40 - 273 square meter. There are two types of room; Deluxe and Premiere. And four types of Suites; Executive, Prambanan, Kraton and Wijaya Kusuma Suite.
Tentrem’s Eboni Bar and Lounge offers snacks, and a large selection of specialty coffees and teas in a casual, yet cutting-edge atmosphere. Its elegant setting is great for meetings, business or personal. Be sure to try our finest gourmet coffee while you are there. The Grand Duck King Chinese Restaurant, extraordinary dining experience, impeccably delicious dishes. Evolving biggest chain of Chinese Restaurants named Duck King offering 400 variety oriental culinary which best meets your taste.
Guests are free to use the swimming pool and gym. Or try to rejuvenate themselves at the Gaharu Spa. This hotel also hosts the Lumpang Art Gallery, and there's a playground available for the younger guests.

deskripsi:
Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Depok, Hotel Vala Yogyakarta promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one.
All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning, television, shower. 
A halal breakfast is served every morning at the accommodation. 
To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as garden. 
Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Yogyakarta has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Hotel Vala Yogyakarta.

deskripsi:
This property located near Malioboro Street. This smoke-free guesthouse features a microwave in a common area, a refrigerator in a common area, and laundry facilities. Free WiFi in public areas and free self parking are also provided. Additionally, a 24-hour front desk and a garden are onsite. All 6 rooms provide conveniences like washing machines and refrigerators, plus free WiFi and LED TVs. Guests will also find microwaves, stovetops, and electric kettles. 
Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access.
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite.
There is no front desk at this property. If you are planning to arrive after midnight please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation.
Make yourself at home in one of the 6 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LED televisions. Prepare your meals in the shared/communal kitchen. deskripsi:
Huiz de Rico Hotel is a popular choice amongst travelers in Yogyakarta, whether exploring or just passing through. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. 
Desk, separate shower and tub, television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless can be found in selected guestrooms.
Set on a leafy road near shops and eateries, this humble hotel is a 10-minute walk from Affandi Museum and 3 km from Gembira Loka Zoo.
All the necessary facilities, including bicycle rental, smoking area, airport transfer, room service, laundry service, are at hand. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Yogyakarta has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Huiz de Rico Hotel.

deskripsi:
As a 5-star hotel in Yogyakarta, Hyatt Regency Yogyakarta boasts a total of 269 guest rooms with an array of utmost amenities. Guests are welcomed friendly into a lobby with 24-hour reception and check-out service, as well as a hotel safe. On-site facilities include a games room, a TV lounge, a bar, a restaurant and conference facilities. Internet access, room and laundry services are also provided for an additional charge. Guests arriving by car can leave their vehicles in the nearby car park. The hotel also offers a complimentary shuttle service to the city center. 
The guest rooms feature views of the exquisite gardens and come with an en-suite bathroom with a black marble bath, a shower and a hairdryer. Furthermore, the rooms feature a separate work area, double/ king-size beds, a direct dial telephone and satellite/ cable TV. Guests can enjoy amenities including a morning newspaper, high-speed internet access, a safe, tea and coffee making facilities, as well as a minibar. Additional facilities include individually regulated air conditioning and a balcony or terrace. 
Guests can have a daily continental breakfast buffet, and the restaurant also serves à la carte and set menu for lunch and dinner. An additional buffet is served in the evenings, and the restaurant features an open show kitchen with a wood-burning pizza oven. 
Guests can take a refreshing dip in the outdoor swimming pool with children swimming pool or sunbath at the poolside. They can also work out in the gym or play tennis, then unwind in sauna, hot tub or with a massage or spa treatment. Furthermore, poolside bar is also available for those who want to purchase the refreshments for an additional fee. Those who are staying can enjoy golf at the local golf course. For children can enjoy the hotel entertainment program where there are plenty of time games, a playroom and a napping room.

deskripsi:
Ibis Malioboro caters for business travelers as well as tourists who want to enjoy and discover the cultural treasures of Central Java. The services are complete with a business center and meeting rooms which are equipped with broadband internet access. With a total of 148 guest rooms, the air-conditioned hotel welcomes its guests in a lobby with 24-hour reception and check-out services, a hotel safe, currency exchange facilities and lift access. Guests may also enjoy use of the TV lounge, bar and restaurant. For an additional fee, guests may take advantage of the room and laundry services. Those arriving by car may leave their vehicles in the car park. 
All the rooms feature a modern, spacious, comfortable and bright design with cozy double or king-size beds and a functional private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. International-standard amenities guarantee guests' satisfaction during their stay. Each room is fitted with a direct dial telephone, satellite/cable TV, tea and coffee making facilities, as well as a minibar. The air conditioning is individually regulated to ensure guests' comfort. 
Breakfast is served every day in the form of a buffet, while buffet or à la carte is available for lunch dinner. 
Guest can take a refreshing dip in the main outdoor swimming pool or sunbath at the poolside, while for those who want to keep their body in shape can enjoy a workout at the hotel gym. The hotel also provides a children's swimming area and a poolside snack bar. Furthermore, they can pamper themselves with a massage, spa treatment, or sauna.

deskripsi:
Ibis Styles Yogyakarta is ideally located in Malioboro district within walking distance. Designed with colorful and pop concept makes it a haven for the leisure, but also great for business travelers who fancy to have a different ambience of hospitality.Also visit the famous Sultan's Palace and more Yogyakarta's heritage around the palace which is just 5 minutes away from the hotel. 
The hotel offers 112 rooms that consist of 109 Superior rooms and 3 Family rooms. Warm, welcoming and modern, with a comfortable bed and a practical bathroom, all rooms bring the coziness and comfort with free WIFI, Internet free, 32" LCD TV with cable channels, iPod dock, safety box, tea and coffee maker.
From 6:30 to 10AM, and up to 11AM on weekends, the ibis Styles breakfast will give you the energy needed to start your day off on the right foot. Colours Restaurant : providing a cool and colorful dining experience, including Indonesian favorites as well as international dishes; the buffet breakfast is available from 6AM until 10PM. Lobby Bar; Serving a range of spirits, beer, wine and cool cocktails as well as refreshments and snacks and decorated with colorful contemporary and modern art, the lobby bar is the perfect venue for a casual gathering. Sky Bar; With a cozy atmosphere, colorful modern decoration and contemporary furniture and a view of the beautiful Yogyakarta skyline, the Sky Bar provides a perfect experience, day or night.
Directions, How to get thereFrom the Adi Sucipto airport,go to the city centre heading straight on to Jalan Jend. Sudirman from Jalan Solo. Turn left to Jalan Pangeran Mangkubumi follow the road until heading to Jalan Malioboro at cross roads to Jalan Ahmad Yani turn right to JalanPajeksan and turn right to Jalan Jogonegaraan.

deskripsi:
Ibis Yogyakarta Adi Sucipto, close to the airport, shopping malls and most famous tourist attractions, is a new hotel ideal for your getaway to Yogyakarta. 
Enjoy the lavish and modern standard rooms equipped with new ibis bedding king size, 32 inch LED TV, in room safe, bathroom with shower, hairdryer and free wifi. Each room features a flat screen TV with a wide choices of channels and a comfy Sweet BedTM, the innovative ibis bedding to ensure great night sleep. 
Kitchen Wok offers all-you-can-eat breakfast and tasty meals. 
The hotel has complete facilities: gym, spa and meeting rooms. It takes only 5 minutes to walk to the nearest shopping mall, where you can watch movies at the cinema. Borobudur temple is accessible within 45 minutes and Prambanan temple, 30 minutes. You can also enjoy various street food stalls spread in Adi Sucipto street.

deskripsi:
Whether it be for one night or an extended stay, every guest needs a home away from home. Indies Heritage Hotel – Prawirotaman Jogjakarta provides that and much more. Offering a modern heritage concept, the hotel is set within one of the city’s most recognizable historic areas, Prawirotaman, an iconic spot for foreigners just around the corner of this property.
Spacious rooms are set in tandem with modern amenities, such as LED cable TV, individually-controlled air conditioner, mini-bar, free Wi-Fi, coffee and tea making facilities, IDD telephone, in-room safe deposit box, hairdryer, and en-suite bathroom with shower facilities. Laundry service is available upon request.
Experience the full course of meals for your breakfast, lunch, and dinner at Indies Heritage Hotel Restaurant.
An outdoor swimming pool is available in this hotel.

deskripsi:
Indoluxe Hotel Jogjakarta is ” The One And Only True Business Hotel”. A warm atmosphere, where the modern environment and facilities provide a pleasant accommodation for anyone who is looking for peace and rest after a long flight or a busy day’s work. 
Decorated in warm colours, the air-conditioned rooms here are fitted with a flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box and a desk. A minibar and refrigerator are provided. The en suite bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and slippers. Guests enjoy city, pool and mountain views.
Gandhiva Restaurant serves a fine selection of Western, Indonesian and Chinese food. Light snacks and refreshing beverages can be enjoyed at Nirvana Sky Lounge, Amerta Lounge and Panoramic Lounge. Alternatively, guests can find various dining options within a 5-minute walk from the hotel.
The hotel also features a sky pool. Guests can workout at the gym or enjoy relaxing treatments at the spa and wellness centre.
The friendly staff at Indoluxe Hotel Jogjakarta will be happy to assist for airport transfer at an additional charge.

deskripsi:
This property located near Hartono Mall. This hotel features a restaurant, an outdoor pool, and a 24-hour front desk. Self parking is free. All 100 rooms offer free WiFi, room service, and flat-screen TVs with cable channels. Other amenities available to guests include electric kettles, free bottled water, and showers. 
This hotel offers designated smoking areas.
This hotel has 2 meeting rooms available for events. Free self parking is available onsite.
 This property doesn't offer after-hours check-in. Guests arriving late won't be able to check in until the next morning.
Make yourself at home in one of the 100 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include desks and electric kettles, and housekeeping is provided daily.
 Restaurant & Food
Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Local cuisine breakfasts are available daily from 6:30 AM to 10 AM for a fee.

deskripsi:
This property located near Sambisari Temple. 2 restaurants, an outdoor pool, and 2 bars/lounges are available at this smoke-free hotel. Free WiFi in public areas and free self parking are also provided. Additionally, a fitness center, a poolside bar, and a coffee shop/café are onsite. All 242 rooms provide free WiFi, 24-hour room service, and LED TVs. Refrigerators, minibars, and free bottled water are among the other amenities available to guests. 
Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services.
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available 24 hours) and a train station pick-up service.
 24-hour airport shuttle service is available on request. Fees may apply. Contact the property in advance to make arrangements. The credit card used to book the reservation must be presented by the cardholder at check-in along with matching photo identification. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking.
Make yourself at home in one of the 242 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Snacks are also available at the coffee shop/café. Relax with a refreshing drink from the poolside bar or one of the 2 bars/lounges. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6:00 AM to 10:00 AM for a fee.

deskripsi:
Designed with an open air dining and living area, Ipienk House promise a wonderful stay for guests. Featuring precisely seven rooms, each of its distinctive from any other, private swimming pool and sitting area with wide range of books collection which ready to accompany your loosen time. A supreme level of warmth and hospitality personal services are ready to serve you in 24 hours every day
There are rooms with free wireless internet, an in-room safe, cable TV with on-demand movies, an iron with ironing board and a sofa in Ipienk House Guest House apartment. The rooms have elegant furniture and marble floor. An en suite bathroom offers a hairdryer, free toiletries and bath sheets.
The on-site restaurant serves a selection of Western and Indonesian food. Kitchen amenities feature an electric kettle and a fridge are also available.
At Ipienk House you will find a library and terrace for relaxing. The friendly staff can help arrange for car hire. Other facilities offered at the property include a concierge service, luggage storage and laundry facilities. Laundry and dry cleaning services are available at additional charges. The property offers free parking.

deskripsi:
Featuring Javanese atmosphere, Istana Batik Ratna Yogyakarta boasts hotel staffs who are ready to assist its guests throughout your stay at the hotel. As one of the comfortable 2 star hotels in Yogyakarta, Istana Batik Ratna hotel rooms are furnished with practical room amenities that meet the 2 star rating hotel standard. Indonesia is one of the popular destinations in Asia thanks to there are many interesting venues for tourists such as historical sites and natural attractions. Situated in Yogyakarta as one of the famous attractions of Indonesia, Hotel Istana Batik Ratna Yogyakarta offers for the travelers to have a great time during their holidays here. 
Hotel Istana Batik Ratna boasts some rooms and suites types, which are Deluxe and Super Deluxe. The rooms feature Balinese style furnishings, which are fitted with a private bathroom with a shower/ bathtub and a hairdryer. Besides, they are equipped with cable TV, internet access, a minibar and individually regulated air conditioning. 
Breakfast is served each morning, and the midday and evening meals may be enjoyed as a set menu. 
This hotel features an outdoor swimming pool for guests who want to soak or sunbath at the poolside.

deskripsi:
Jambuluwuk Malioboro Boutique Hotel is a unique boutique Hotel, with 144 lavish and spacious rooms offering modern concept mix with traditional touch. The hotel’s 5 Star services and facilities is perfectly suit for busy travelers as well as group gathering for extensive conference and meetings. In preserving Environment, the hotel also supports green hotel concept featuring hotel facilities that support recycle and green lifestyle.
Modern rooms are fitted with a flat-screen cable TV, personal safe and tea/coffee-making facilities. En suite bathrooms come with toiletries and a hairdryer.
Jambuluwuk Coffee Shop and Batik Lounge is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. It serves Indonesian and international food.
The hotel provides recreational facilities to ensure that guests can relax and unwind during the stay. To name those facilities, there are a swimming pool, spa, gym, library, karaoke, and J-Store.

deskripsi:
Java Land Hotel is a hotel that boasts its convenience, comfort, and Javanese style of hospitality in Yogyakarta, a city rich with culture and diversity. It offers modern comfort with a 24-hour front desk and free on-site parking. Wi-Fi is accessible for free in all areas.
Each room is decorated with the combination of Javanese wooden architecture and modern minimalist furnishing. Fully air-conditioned, each room in Java Land Hotel comes fitted with a cable TV, coffee and tea making facilities, and a refrigerated mini-bar. A seating area and a desk are also included. En-suite bathroom offers shower facilities. Laundry service is available upon request.
Breakfast is served each morning, serving Indonesian buffet.

deskripsi:
This property located near Sleman City Hall. This hotel features a restaurant, an outdoor pool, and a seasonal outdoor pool. Free WiFi in public areas and free self parking are also provided. Additionally, free use of bicycles, a 24-hour front desk, and express check-in are onsite. All 88 rooms offer free WiFi, balconies or patios, and LED TVs with cable channels. Room service, electric kettles, and free bottled water are among the other amenities available to guests. 
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and a fireplace in the lobby.
Featured amenities include express check-in, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. This hotel has 5 meeting rooms available for events. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.
 If you are planning to arrive after midnight please contact the property at least 24 hours in advance using the information on the booking confirmation. 24-hour airport shuttle service is available on request. Fees may apply. Contact the property in advance to make arrangements.
Make yourself at home in one of the 88 air-conditioned rooms featuring LED televisions. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.
Enjoy a satisfying meal at Jaerung serving guests of Java Village Resort. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily from 6 AM to 10 AM for a fee.

deskripsi:
Welcome to Java Villas Hotel, flawlessly combines Colonial Elegance with Traditional Java style
plus is perfectly located on the central of the tourists’ village; Prawirotama. Regularly praised for its impeccable service, elegantly appointed rooms and vibrant atmosphere, guests are invited to enjoy the spectacular views in unique hotel interior. 
 Each of our rooms feature a spacious layout to meet the needs of our busy and well-traveled guests, hand-picked modern yet comfortable furniture, and a selection from our private antique collection. Designer furniture and intimate lighting that offers balance and well-being. Spacious bathrooms lined with complete amenities.
 Complimentary Continental Breakfast is served every morning. Our quiet interior makes an excellent locale for a business meeting or a romantic dinner at our restaurant. You can also enjoy your ninghtlife at our bar.
 Enjoy your time at our comfort and private swimming pool.

deskripsi:
Hotel Jentra Dagen is the perfect choice for your family getaway in the historical city Jogjakarta, where the culture and traditional attraction mingle in unique way. Hotel Jentra Dagen incorporate the dynamic and modern architecture with the friendly service. With several supporting facilities, Hotel Jentra Dagen is strategically located in the heart of Jogjakarta where you can easily find the shopping attractions, culture tourism and the food festival. 
The accommodation in this hotel boasts some room categories, namely Superior, Deluxe, Family and Executive. Hardwood flooring and floor-to-ceiling windows feature throughout the modern guestrooms design while resting your body on a king-size or twin bed. All rooms are equipped with a mini bar, free Wi-Fi, TV with cable channels, phone line, coffee and tea maker, electronic key card, newspaper, and bathroom with hot and cold water setting and their amenities. Upgraded rooms add safety deposit boxes and extra beds. Room service is available.
Jentra Ragen offers a continental breakfast or all-day meals at their restaurant, or a refreshing drink at the lobby lounge.

Room service, electric kettles, and free bottled water are among the other amenities available to guests.

This property located in Pakem. A full-service spa, a restaurant, and an outdoor pool are available at this resort. Free WiFi in public areas, free self parking, and a free airport shuttle are also provided. Other amenities include a bar/lounge, a coffee shop/café, and WiFi in public areas. All 23 rooms boast deep soaking tubs and offer free WiFi and balconies or patios. Room service and coffee makers are standard, as are LCD TVs with cable channels. 
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages and body treatments. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find an outdoor pool and bicycles to rent. This resort also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.
Featured amenities include wired Internet access (surcharge), limo/town car service, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. A roundtrip airport shuttle is complimentary (available on request).
 Airport shuttle service is available on request. Fees may apply. Contact the property in advance to make arrangements. Early check-in and late check-out are available on request but subject to availability.
Make yourself at home in one of the 23 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries.
Enjoy international cuisine at Joglo Plawang Restaurant, a restaurant which features a bar and a garden view. You can also stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). A complimentary breakfast is included.

This property located in Pakem. A full-service spa, a restaurant, and an outdoor pool are available at this resort. deskripsi:
Kampung Labasan Tropical Resort offers unique traditional Javanese wooden houses. The hotel offers tour packages and interesting activities like batik painting or traditional cuisine cooking class.
 The accommodation at Kampung Labasan are fitted with a flat screen TV, a seating area, an outdoor dining area, and an en suite bathroom featuring free toiletries and slippers. There is also a terrace where guests can enjoy the lush garden view. Interconnecting rooms are also available at this property.
As for dining option, the on-site Kampung Labasa Resto serves traditional Javanese dishes and other Indonesian, Oriental and Western cuisine. For more dining option, the culinary centre at Pakem Market can be found just a 10-minute walk from the property. 
The staff can also arrange for activities like hiking, cycling, fishing, or village tour all at additional costs. Massage treatments are also available upon requests and with extra charges. Layanan perawatan pijat juga tersedia berdasarkan permintaan dan dengan biaya tambahan.
Free grocery deliveries, free use of the BBQ facility, and a 24-hour front desk are offered at Kampung Labasan.

deskripsi:
In the heart of downtown Yogyakarta, Indonesia, directly facing the trendy Prawirotaman District, one of the city’s newest 4-star hotels offers a landmark blend of luxury, style and value. KJ Hotel Yogyakarta is one of the most recommended hotels in Yogyakarta features 123 guest rooms and 11 suites steeped in contemporary elegance and style. The modern architecture and interiors are infused with the urban energy of its central location, just steps from the best Yogyakarta has to offer.
At KJ Hotel Yogyakarta, each of 123 guest rooms and 11 suites offers you a refined haven in the heart of downtown Yogyakarta, Indonesia. From beautifully appointed Deluxe Rooms to resplendent KJ Suites and Family rooms with room for up to four guests. This accommodation has the perfect hotel accommodation for guests booking business or holiday travel in Yogyakarta.
All accommodation feature a private balcony with city or pool views, along with thoughtful luxuries like air-conditioner, TV with international channels, free Wi-Fi, 24-hour room service, safe deposit box, coffee and tea making facilities, mini-fridge, and mini-bar. The en-suite bathroom comes with rain shower, quality toiletries, hairdryer, bathrobe, and slippers.
Start your day with a sumptuous hot breakfast at Ila Kitchen Restaurant, or unwind over cocktails and appetisers at the Pool Bar.
With the AYAARTTA Massage & Reflexology Spa, KJ Hotel Yogyakarta offers guests a tranquil spa retreat for relaxation and replenishment. AYAAARTA invites you to take time from your busy schedule and indulge yourself with an array of massages, body treatments, beauty services and more. deskripsi:
Laxston Hotel Jogja by Front One (founded 2014) is strategically located adjacent to the city center of Yogyakarta, a city famous with their cultural, social, and historical heritage. Laxston Hotel will ensure your stay as easy and simple as possible as well as valuable, while offering comfort and quality for a very attractive price. Whether you’re in business travelling or in a medium group, Laxston Hotel’s spacious rooms will comfortably meet your needs.
This modern hotel maintains 42 chic rooms with 18 Superior rooms, 18 deluxe rooms, 2 Junior Suite rooms and 4 Suite rooms, with a modern and spacious layout, each room will comfortably accommodate two persons. The room at Laxston Hotel is completed with a charger socket, free WiFi for all rooms, a 32” flat-screen satellite TV, and a bathroom with hairdryer.
 The Laxston restaurant serves Indonesian, and international cuisine.
At Laxston Hotel guests will find a 24-hour front desk which can assist with laundry and dry cleaning at an extra charge.

deskripsi:
Whether you're a tourist or traveling on business, Le Krasak Boutique Hotel is a great choice for accommodation when visiting Yogyakarta and its surroundings. A haven of rest and relaxation, the hotel will offer total renewal just steps away from the city's numerous attractions such as Kridisono Stadium, Kotabaru Village, Mesjid Agung Suhada. Le Krasak Boutique Hotel offers impeccable service and all the essential amenities to invigorate travelers. Wi-Fi is accessible for free in public areas.
Rooms Guests can choose from 24 rooms, all of which exude an atmosphere of total peace and harmony. Coffee and tea maker, LCD TV, and AC are standard across all rooms in Le Krasak Boutique Hotel. Select rooms feature a minibar and a seating area with a sofa. Bath and shower facilities are included in all en suite bathrooms. Luggage storage and newspapers are available at the 24-hour front desk.
A coffee shop and restaurant is available all day for your convenience.
An indoor pool and garden is available for your recreational need.
The hotel offers 24/7 front desk and room service, free Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, and laundry and dry cleaning service.

Additionally, tour/ticket assistance, a garden, and a front-desk safe are onsite. Rooms feature free WiFi and free wired Internet, plus room service and coffee makers. Guests will also find showers and desks. 
Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access.
Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.
 Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access is available. Bathrooms with showers are provided. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

deskripsi:
This property located near Gadjah Mada University. This hotel features a restaurant, a spa tub, and 24-hour room service. Free WiFi in public areas, free self parking, and free train station pick-up are also provided. Additionally, concierge services, dry cleaning, and free newspapers are onsite. All 50 rooms provide free WiFi, 24-hour room service, and TVs. Guests will also find premium bedding, free bottled water, and safes. 
Pamper yourself with onsite massages or enjoy recreation amenities such as a spa tub. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services.
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby and dry cleaning/laundry services. A train station pick-up service is provided at no charge, and free self parking is available onsite.
 
Make yourself at home in one of the 50 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and complimentary bottled water.

deskripsi:
This property located near Gadjah Mada University. A restaurant, an outdoor pool, and a bar/lounge are available at this hotel. Free WiFi in public areas and free self parking are also provided. Other amenities include an outdoor tennis court, a spa tub, and 24-hour room service. All 45 rooms feature thoughtful touches like bathrobes and slippers, plus free WiFi and LCD TVs with cable channels. Other amenities available to guests include 24-hour room service, minibars, and premium bedding. 
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and an outdoor tennis court. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services.
Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite.
 Make yourself at home in one of the 45 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature bathrobes and slippers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and coffee/tea makers.
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's poolside restaurant, where you can dine alfresco. Or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary breakfast is included.
