deskripsi:
Lynn Hotel by Horison is an ideal spot from which to discover Yogyakarta. Set 2.5 km from the excitement of the city, this 3-star hotel commands an excellent location and provides access to the city's biggest attractions. With its convenient location and a host of amenities including 24-hour reception desk, luggage storage, and Wi-Fi in all areas, will make your stay at Yogyakarta is perfect.
Comprises of 112 rooms and suites with modern and elegant design, each room on this hotel is decorated in neutral colors to give the true sense of tranquility and relaxation. Facilities available in this hotel including cable TV, AC, high speed Wi-Fi, IDD telephone, seating area, mini-bar, and coffee and tea making facilities. Its en-suite bathroom comes with a shower, slippers, and towels.
A selection of Indonesian and western dishes are available at Malabar Restaurant.
Guests can approach friendly staff at LYNN Hotel by Horison to arrange for airport shuttle. Other facilities offered include meeting rooms, outdoor swimming pool, garden, and in-room massages.

deskripsi:
Located in Prawirotaman, Maharani Guest House is a perfect point to explore Yogyakarta. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Car park, laundry service, Wi-Fi in public areas are just some of the facilities on offer. Discover all Yogyakarta by making Maharani Guest House your base. 
With tiled flooring, the air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a private bathroom which offers shower facilities and free toiletries. They are furnished with satellite TV, a minibar and a desk. 
The guesthouse has a snack bar, and provides room service. Alternatively, a restaurant serving local Indonesian delights is available just a 5-minute walk away.
The hotel offers recreational facilities including outdoor pool and massage. Car rental services are available. Guests can also rest at Maharani’s outdoor patio or simply enjoy the sight of its lush gardens.

deskripsi:
This property located near Malioboro Street. This hotel features a restaurant, 24-hour room service, and concierge services. WiFi in public areas is free. Additionally, dry cleaning, laundry facilities, and a 24-hour front desk are onsite. All 48 rooms offer free WiFi, 24-hour room service, and LED TVs with satellite channels. Free bottled water, showers, and desks are among the other amenities that guests will find. 
Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access.
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.
 This property doesn't offer after-hours check-in. Guests arriving late won't be able to check in until the next morning.
Make yourself at home in one of the 48 air-conditioned rooms featuring LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms with showers are provided. Conveniences include desks and complimentary bottled water, and housekeeping is provided daily.
Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6:30 AM to 9 AM for a fee.

deskripsi:
Malioboro Inn Hotel provides luggage storage at the 24-hour front desk. The hotel also assists guests with ticketing services and taxi hires.The hotel runs a 24-hour restaurant which serves a variety of Indonesian and international cuisine.
Guest rooms are spacious and are fitted with a private balcony. Each room has tea/coffee making facilities and a flat-screen Television with cable channels. The attached bathroom comes with hot shower facilities.
Directions, How to get therehe hotel is a short 100 metres from the famous Malioboro Street, which offers unique Javanese souvenirs. Malioboro Inn is a 5-minute drive from Pasar Beringharjo, the Sultan Palace and the railway station.

deskripsi:
Set in a prime location of Yogyakarta, Mangotree Dipudjo Homestay is quietly tucked in the Pujokusuman Heritage District, just next to the Pujokusuman Heritage Palace. Mango Tree Dipudjo Homestay puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The Mango Tree Dipudjo Homestay offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Yogyakarta. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Take advantage of the hotel's free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park. Friendly staff, great facilities and ideal location in Yogyakarta are three great reasons you should stay at Mango Tree Dipudjo Homestay.
 All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with WIFI Internet Connection, TV/DVD Player, Fridge, toaster, water dispenser, kitchen utensils, BBQ Set are provided in our common guests area for public use. You may find towels and shower amenities in the shower area. Upon request, Hair dryer can be borrowed from the Reception.
Indonesian or Western breakfast is served in the shared dining area every morning. In-room breakfast is also possible. 
 Entering the guestshouse, you will find a spacious yard with a gazebo that boasts an outdoor common area where you can relax and enjoy the lush green garden with a charming lotus pond. You can do hiking and ask the hotel's staff to make tour itinerary from the hotel.

deskripsi:
Maranatha Grand Hotel is located in the popular Pathuk area. Maranatha Grand Hotel is 1.8 km from Water Castle, features a safety deposit box, a car park, free Wi-Fi, and parking area. From here, Malioboro street where you can find entertainment, dining options, shopping places, and many more just a few hundred meters away. The accommodation also has on-site a laundry room, housekeeping service and newspaper service available to all hotel guests.
With 28 rooms, all rooms at Maranatha Grand Hotel provide a minibar, a fridge, and TV with DVD player as well as an en suite bathroom. 
 Have your nice breakfast, lunch, and dinner at the on site restaurant.

deskripsi:
Whether you are visiting Indonesia for business or leisure, our Yogyakarta Marriott Hotel will happily meet your needs. Each luxury accommodation features a chic decor with Javanese-inspired accents and inviting views. 
Premium amenities fill each room, including marble bathrooms, mini-refrigerators, sofa beds and 24-hour room service. Business travelers can stay connected with our free Wi-Fi and convenient workstations. Suites with generous layouts and Club Rooms offer exclusive access to the perks of our M Club Lounge. 
Savor the delicious international cuisine at Yogyakarta Kitchen. This bright and vibrant restaurant offers a hearty buffet, as well as delectable a-la-carte items, including local favorites. Make a reservation at our hotel's Taman Sari Bar & Grill restaurant to sample tantalizing Mediterranean fare. This chic, yet casual dining spot also offers an inviting outdoor seating area which showcases the sights and sounds of Yogyakarta. Plan to dine on tasty international fare and tempting libations at The Lounge in Yogyakarta Marriott Hotel. It's an ideal place to relax with friends or solo after a busy day.
The hotel offers fitness centre and swimming pool for guests who wanted to stay healthy during their trip. Spa; Yogyakarta Marriott Hotel's Quan Spa offers guests an oasis away from work and the bustling city. Schedule an appointment for a rejuvenating massage or other body treatments to feel renewed and re-energized.

namahotel: Marry Ind Vila and Guest House Gunung Kawi Malang
deskripsi:
This property located in Wonosari. An outdoor pool, a fitness center, and tour/ticket assistance are available at this bed & breakfast. Free breakfast (local cuisine), free WiFi in public areas, and free self parking are also provided. Other amenities include a garden. All 12 rooms provide conveniences like living rooms and dining areas, plus free WiFi and refrigerators. Other amenities available to guests include stovetops, minibars (stocked with some free items), and rice cookers. 
Don't miss out on recreational opportunities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Additional features at this bed & breakfast include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.
The front desk is staffed during limited hours. Free self parking is available onsite.
The front desk is open daily from 8 AM - 10 PM. 
This property doesn't offer after-hours check-in. Guests arriving late won't be able to check in until the next morning. To make arrangements for check-in please contact the property at least 48 hours before arrival using the information on the booking confirmation.
Make yourself at home in one of the 12 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and minibars (stocked with some free items). Prepare your meals in the shared/communal kitchen. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include separate sitting areas and rice cookers, and housekeeping is provided daily.
A complimentary local cuisine breakfast is served daily from 7 AM to 9 AM.

deskripsi:
Hotel Matahari Yogyakarta services is professional and helpful, creating a very comfortable atmosphere, so guests can experience a memorable holiday in Yogyakarta. As one of the popular 2 star hotels in Yogyakarta, Matahari hotel offers generous hotel rooms. Being a famous tourist destination in Asia, Indonesia offers various tourist attractions and fun activities.
Tourists often travel to Yogyakarta to visit the city's highlights. Hotel Matahari allows you to unwind during your vacation in Yogyakarta. The good-natured staffs at Matahari Hotel are looking forward to helping you through out your holiday stay at the hotel. Bed rooms at Matahari Hotel are well designed to provide comfort for guests. This Yogyakarta hotel owns fine guest rooms and suites with 1 room types such as, STANDARD. Travelers can seek total relaxation in cozy guestrooms and benefit from essential room facilities.
With 64 elegance traditional rooms including 2 deluxe rooms, and 1 family suite. Each room is air conditioned and is equipped with private bath room, running hot and cold water and private terrace or balcony.
Directions, How to get thereLocated strategically in the down town area and offer easy access to various tourist attactions, such as: Sultan Palace, Parangtritis Beach.

deskripsi:
Featuring rich tradition of Javanese culture, Melia Purosani Hotel Yogyakarta boasts an array of utmost amenities. This five-star hotel is built in landscaped gardens and lagoons to create a relaxing oasis in the city. Melia Purosani Hotel Yogyakarta offers its guests an excellent choice of guest rooms and suites, each carefully conceives for comfort and convenience. Guests of Melia Purosani Hotel Yogyakarta can enjoy excellent choice of Asian and international cuisines at a number of restaurant. Within the beautiful gardens, guests can enjoy a large lagoon-style swimming pool with waterfall and water slide. 
The accommodation in this hotel is divided into some categories, which are Deluxe Room, Grand Room, The Level Room, Duplex Suite, Executive Suite and Presidential Suite. The modern rooms are furnished with king-size beds, a direct dial telephone, satellite/cable TV, Internet access, a safety deposit box, tea and coffee making facilities, as well as a minibar. Individually regulated air conditioning also features, as well as a balcony or terrace. 
To satisfy guests' appetite, Melia Purosani Hotel Yogyakarta boasts some fine dining venues, which are El Patio coffee shop caters Asian and International cuisines as well as the Ching San Chinese restaurant caters Cantonese and Szechuan cuisine. For cocktails and entertainment there is the Soka Lounge, while the Pub Med offers live bands nightly with Mediterranean atmosphere. 
Guests can enjoy a refreshing dip in the outdoor swimming pool while having a drink from the poolside snack bar or sunbath at the poolside. They can enjoy a work-out at the gym/ fitness center, and the sauna is the perfect place for those who want pamper themselves. For an additional fee, guests can enjoy massage and spa treatments. For children guests, there is regular entertainment program offered at the hotel.

namahotel: Mettaloka Guest House and Art Space
deskripsi:
Mettaloka launched on 22nd December 2014 and is located at Wanurejo Tourist Village only 1.7 km from Borobudur Temple. Mettaloka Guest House and Art Space is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Magelang. Our guesthouse open for guest with simple needs and interested with ideas of back to nature to reduce global warming effects and concern for human civilization welfare. Metta means compassion and Loka means place/space. So, we want to share love, awareness, and peace from Mettaloka to the world. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and services to assure you have a great time. Wi-Fi, car park, room service, laundry service are offered at this property. Mettaloka consists of 1 main house (owner's house) as a front office, 8 guest rooms in line, 3 traditional wood cabin, 1 Java Traditional Patio for breakfast and sitting area, 1600 m2 of tropical garden and few unique spots. 
 Comfortable guestrooms here will make you have a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as internet access wireless complimentary, air conditioning, and LED TV. You can also find a shower at the private bathroom. 
A complimentary breakfast is provided in the morning. We also provide simple food and beverages to help visitors have their meals. 
 Rental for bike and scooter and also pedicab, horse carriage and car taxi are the options for guest who want to go an adventure. Our guesthouse is surrounded by village, greenfield, and Menoreh Hill.

deskripsi:
This property located near Gadjah Mada University. Along with a restaurant, this smoke-free hotel has a bar/lounge and a coffee shop/café. Free WiFi in public areas and free self parking are also provided. Other amenities include 24-hour room service, concierge services, and dry cleaning. All 138 rooms provide conveniences like refrigerators and coffee makers, plus free WiFi and LED TVs with cable channels. 24-hour room service, rainfall showerheads, and free bottled water are among the other amenities available to guests. 
Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access. Additional amenities at this hotel include concierge services and a fireplace in the lobby.
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Free self parking is available onsite.
 
Make yourself at home in one of the 138 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and coffee/tea makers.
 
Enjoy local cuisine at Pringgondani, a restaurant where you can enjoy drinks at the bar and dine alfresco. Or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Continental breakfasts are available daily from 7:00 AM to 10:00 AM for a fee.

deskripsi:
Conveniently located in Yogyakarta, nDalem Bantul Hotel is a great base from which to explore this vibrant city. From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all that the lively city has to offer. Visitors to the hotel can take pleasure in touring the city's top attractions, including Gereja Abdi Ngadinegaraan, Kraton Jogja, Taman Sari Yogya, and The Water Castle.
 Guests can make use of the wide range of in-room conveniences, including coffee/tea maker, air conditioning, bathtub, bathrobes, and television. 
Indonesian dishes are served at the restaurant in the guest house.
The onsite recreational facilities include a garden, massage services, spa, and outdoor pool, all ideal for both fitness enthusiasts and travellers looking to unwind after a hard day. 
 For the comfort and convenience of guests, the hotel offers smoking area, meeting facilities, Wi-Fi in public areas, airport transfer, tours.

deskripsi:
The land included the houses of nDalem Gamelan is about 800 square meters. Main house consists of two parts that is a big room that has stair with crowded-motif-floor and another side signed with plain-yellow-floor. The floor made from antique cement tile produced by an old factory that still keep the production process original, the same since Dutch times. Almost whole wall of main house is still original, as well as the doors and teak pillars.
In the first part which has crowded-motif-floor, there are two bedrooms face right to the dining room and a smaller room without door called “senthong” between two bedrooms that actually the main part of the house. In this dining room, there used to be the place for welcoming guests of high social level. Another part with plain-yellow-floor used to be the room for welcoming guests of lower social level. From this room, there is a door face right to the road that is the access to straightly interact with the lifebeat of Jero Beteng.
 The rooms at nDalem Gamelan include slippers, a seating area and a private bathroom. All feature bottled water, a DVD player and ironing facilities. 
 Each morning, guests can sit down to breakfast provided by nDalem Gamelan Hotel Yogyakarta before venturing out to see what the surrounding region has to offer. There is also the added convenience of an on-site restaurant. 
 The hotel offers bicycle rentals, a terrace and massage services.

deskripsi:
Designed in modern architecture combined Java architecture that provides a classic but comfortable atmosphere and beautiful for guests who stay at Ndalem Padma Asri.
We have 4 type of rooms such as, Standard, Superior, Deluxe, and Suite Rooms. Equipped with air conditioning, LCD TV 32”, hot & cold water.
The guesthouse offers Indonesian and American choices for breakfast. Indonesian specialty menu also available at the restaurant, and guests can also order room service.
Further facilities including free hot spot, car rental & bike rental, laundry service and taxi service. Ndalem Padma Asri is located in the north of Yogyakarta in Jalan Padma No. 23 Palagan Tentara Pelajar. The location is not far from downtown Yogyakarta, enough 15 minutes was able to achieve such Malioboro, Sultan Palace, Railway Station, Airport Adisucipto, and Traditional Market BERINGHARJO. Ndalem Padma Asri is located in North Jogja closer to leading tourist attractions like Kaliurang, Prambanan, Borobudur and Boko temple, or Baron Parangtritis beach tourism and others.

deskripsi:
Yogyakarta or Jogja is a very peaceful city with its history and Javanese culture being a source of inspiration to many artists through the centuries. The proximity of the world famous Borobudur Temple and Prambanan Temple, as well as numerous other temples dating back to the 10th century has brought thousands of visitors to this city. The active volcano Merapi and popular beaches make a good one-day excursion. This hotel is furnished with business center, safe deposit box, batik shop and doctor on call. 
The hotel's conveniently and luxuriously designed rooms are complete with air conditioning units, a satellite TV, tea and coffee making facilities, as well as a minibar. A seating area and work desk are also provided. The bathroom is fitted with a bathtub and shower. Further standard in-room amenities include an International Direct Dial (IDD) telephone and internet access, as well as a non smoking room. 
Breakfast is served each morning at the hotel, and various menu options are served for lunch and dinner. The hotel boasts two fine dining venues, which are Promenade Cafe and Mirah Lounge. 
There is an outdoor swimming pool in the hotel grounds for those who want soak or sunbath at the poolside. Further features include a tennis court, gymnasium for guests who want to enjoy sport, and reflexology, traditional massages, aromatherapy and a Lulur scrub facility to pamper its guests during staying in this hotel.

deskripsi:
This property offers modern facilities to discerning business or leisure visitors, and features executive lounge with internet access, email and fax facilities as well as computer and secretarial services. For families, this property offers safe play areas and balanced menus. With a total of 200 guest rooms, this air-conditioned establishment welcomes guests in a lobby with 24-hour reception and check-out services, a hotel safe, lift access and newspaper stand. Younger guests will surely enjoy the children's playground and kids' club, while the café, bar and restaurant serves tasty food and beverages. The conference facilities may be of use for its business guests, and for an additional fees room and laundry services are also available. Those arriving by car may leave their vehicle in the car park or garage. Bicycles can be hired on site. 
Featuring contemporary in design, rooms are traditional Javanese-style decoration in a warm and light ambiance using local material. The en-suite rooms are equipped with a shower, bathtub and a hairdryer, as well as double or king-size bed. Further amenities include a direct dial telephone, a satellite/cable TV, an internet access, a safe, a minibar, tea and coffee making facilities, as well as individually regulated air conditioning units. 
Guests will find a perfect mix of Asian delicacies and the best of French cuisine at the restaurant, which caters tasty cuisines for breakfast, lunch and dinner. 
Guest can relax at the outdoor landscaped pool or sunbath at the poolside while having cocktail and snacks at the poolside bar. Guests can join an aerobics class or work out in the gym. Massage and spa treatments are available for additional fees or relax in the sauna for those who want to pamper themselves. Guests may also play billiard and mini golf. Entertainment program are provided for both children and adults (fees apply).

deskripsi:
Housing a restaurant, Nueve Hotel is conveniently situated a 10-minute walk from the lively Malioboro Street. It features modern rooms with air conditioning and en suite bathrooms. Free Wi-Fi is accessible in all areas.
Rooms in Nueve Hotel are well appointed with a flat-screen satellite TV, desk and towels. Some rooms feature a coffee machine and a safety deposit box, while each en suite bathroom provides shower facilities and free toiletries.
Songo Restaurant serves Indonesian cuisine and provides room service.
Operating a 24-hour front desk, the hotel offers luggage storage facilities, concierge and laundry services. Airport transfers, area shuttles and car rental can be arranged on site.

Each air-conditioned room at Oasis Jogja is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Private bathrooms come with a hot and cold shower. Rooms include a shared balcony.
 Breakfast is served at the restaurant, which also offers room service. More dining options are within walking distance of Oasis Hotel Jogja.
The hotel offers wonderful recreational facilities such as garden to make your stay truly unforgettable.
 For the comfort and convenience of guests, the hotel offers 24-hour room service, room service, safety deposit boxes, Wi-Fi in public areas, free Wi-Fi in all rooms.

deskripsi:
Located in Yogyakarta, Oasis Studio Hotel Dua is a perfect accommodation to explore many places. The hotel is close with restaurants, universities, shoping places, and many more. The hotel provides many facilities and services to cater your needs, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, and parking are available. Guests can also rent bicycles and cars to explore the local area.
Many rooms at Oasis Studio Hotel Dua provide television LCD / plasma screen, internet access - wireless (complimentary), air conditioning, desk for guest. 
 Surrounded by restaurants and cafe like Analog Coffee Jogja, Kronology Coffee and Bites, Kitchicken, Warunk Uplevel and many more, you'll find dining options easily while stay here.

deskripsi:
Oasis Studio Hotel Satu is close with Gadjah Mada University and Adi Sucipto Airport, from here you just need 20 minutes drive to reach the airport. The hotel combine modern touch and elegant furniture at this beautiful building. All the necessary facilities and services such as concierge, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, shared kitchen feature refrigerator are provided by Oasis Studio Satu. 
We realize comfortable room is one of the things to make sure a restful night, that's why our guestroom come with air conditioning. The rooms also have desk, wardrobe, TV, and private bathroom with shower. Mountain view can be enjoyed from the room.
Explore all Yogyakarta has to offer by drive or cycling, car and bicycle rental are available at this property. For shopping enthusiast, Malioboro Mall is just 4 km away.

deskripsi:
Spend your holiday at Omah Garengpoeng Guest House where you can find memorable moments to feel the traditional environment and know more about Indonesia tradition and make you want to stay at the guesthouse forever. Get your journey into the history of Indonesian culture ! The place is quaint, stunning, and beautiful. 
Get sleep in an old Indonesian wooden house, the guesthouse has traditional interior which really reflect the local area (Javanese style). A comfort place to stay with its quite surrounding if that what you're looking for is a peaceful atmosphere. At the rooms you can see private bathroom with shower facilities. 
 Traditional breakfast is provided at this property. Don't miss the chance to have some tasty local food that you haven't found anywhere else.
 Activity you can do is off road car or biking to the Manoreh hill. You'll get a really nice mountain view in one of the biking or off-road spot. This accommodation is also a few minutes drive from Borobudur Temple.

deskripsi:
Omah Pari Boutique hotel with classical building nuance that gives you comfort stay and easy access in the middle of Yogyakarta. It has the advantage of a quiet location undisturbed by the noise. Comfortable and clean rooms with the standard of a 3 star hotel.
The air-conditioned rooms have a wardrobe and a writing desk. Each room has a private bathroom with a cold shower.
Breakfast is served in the hotel's dining area. An Indonesian menu is available for room service.
Staff can arrange car and motorbike rentals, traditional massages and traditional Becak transportation.

deskripsi:
Welcome to Omah Qu, a well decorated accommodation with practical and stylish furniture. The building and furniture itself is beautiful. Omah Qu operates a 24-hour front desk and offers laundry, ironing and free on-site parking.
We have 3 types of room, Standard, Superior, and Deluxe Room. All cosy furnished bedrooms are air-conditioned fitted with a flat-screen cable TV and wardrobe. Select rooms have a fridge with a minibar, and en suite bathrooms with hot shower facilities.
Room service is available at this property. Guests can have breakfast in the lobby’s restaurant or in the room by request. This hotel is also close with restaurants that are a short walk away including The House of Raminten, Roaster and Bear, and Canting Restaurant. 
 When you're here, Yogyakarta Palace is known as a popular attraction that is within walking distance from the guesthouse. For those who interested in visiting other popular landmarks while in the Yogyakarta Region, Omah Qu offers car rental services.

deskripsi:
Located in a sensational area on the northern slopes of Yogyakarta Omkara Resort Yogyakarta is 10 minutes from the Hotel Hyatt, Marlioboro Street and a myriad of restaurants. Set on over 6,000 meters of pristine village land, it offers a rare fusion of a private luxury 2-bedroom villa and 2-bedroom pavilion amid sensuous architecture, stunning natural environment, a private pool and oversize deck overlooking the river.
The bedrooms at our private vacation home are particularly spacious, with ensuite bathrooms, wide covered terraces, plentiful chest of drawer space, and generous indoor and outdoor seating areas. Polished reclaimed Carrera marble flooring, designer furniture, fascinating artifacts and thoughtful lighting create delightfully individual interiors, and plush American Pillow beds dressed with 100% cotton bed linen ensure a good night’s sleep. The rooms are cool at night due to the altitude but those who prefer can opt to turn on the ceiling fans.
Upper Bedroom: faces north with expansive views of the garden, rice fields and swimming pool with a mountain backdrop. The room has a chest of drawers, an antique writing table with 32” flat screen TV and DVD player.
Lower Bedroom: faces the babbling river with views through the riverside trees to the farmland beyond. The room has a chest of drawers, large old teak writing desk, 32” flat screen TV.
Two additional bedrooms: faces east with expansive views of the garden and swimming pool with a river backdrop. The room has a chest of drawers, an writing table with 32” flat screen TV and DVD player.
Six deluxe room: faces the babbling river with views through the riverside trees to the farmland beyond. The room has a chest of drawers, large old teak writing desk, 32” flat screen TV.
The in-house chef can prepare a wide range of local and Western specialties as well as special diet menus upon request. Alternatively, there are a number of traditional Javanese restaurants within a 5-minute drive of the property.
Guests can go for fishing and cycling trips or relax with a traditional Javanese massage in the villa. This hotel also features a private pool with the backdrop of rice fields and mountains.
Offering valet parking and car rental services, the non-smoking property provides free WiFi in all areas.

At Orlen Hotel, every effort is made to make guests feel comfortable. To do so, the hotel provides the best in services and amenities. 
 The non-smoking rooms at Orlen come with modern interiors and bright lighting. Each is equipped with AC, safe deposit box, TV, refrigerator and tea/coffee maker. Shower facilities and toiletries are in the en suite bathroom.
Available for breakfast, the cosy restaurant serves a fine selection of local dishes and beverages. Room service is also available upon request.
The hotel offers wonderful recreational facilities such as garden to make your stay truly unforgettable.
 With a 24-hour front desk, the hotel provides airport shuttle and car rental services. Laundry and dry cleaning services are also provided.

deskripsi:
Pandanaran Hotel Yogyakarta offers a modern and cozy stay featuring an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi access in all areas, and free on-site private parking for guests who drive.
Panandaran Hotel offers three different room packages: Budget, Standard, and Superior Room. Each rooms at Pandanaran Hotel Yogyakarta are all air-conditioned and each one is fitted with flat-screen cable TV, telephone, free Wi-Fi for 24 hours, and a private bathroom featuring shower facility.
 As for dining options, the hotel offers its two on-site dining outlets. Kedung Roso Restaurant serves Indonesian buffet breakfast, while Seruni Sky Lounge serves light snacks and tasty treats. Alternatively guests can explore the surrounding area where various eateries and restaurants can be found just a 2-minute walk away from the hotel.
For relaxation guests can enjoy relaxing massages at the on-site spa and wellness centre and also do workout at fitness centre. Flamboyan Sky Pool also offers a superb swimming experience. Several meeting rooms and conference spaces are available for business or wedding purposes.
The hotel offers pickup service from airport and train stations at an additional cost.

When you are in Yogyakarta, come and enjoy the comfortable of our rooms, you should prove by yourself that our hotel are real home away from home. Perwita Sari Hotel is perfect located in the heart of Javanese Culture. It's not too far from the Sultan's Palace, Water Castle "Taman Sari", Silver Industry "Kotagede", Batik Centre, Parangtritis Beach.
The ambiance of Perwita Sari Hotel is reflected in every guestroom. television LCD/plasma screen, desk, shower, television, complimentary bottled water are just some of the facilities that can be found throughout the property. 
 The complete list of recreational facilities is available at the hotel, including outdoor pool.
 While lodging at this wonderful property, guests can enjoy room service, coffee shop, meeting facilities, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, restaurant.

deskripsi:
Located in central Yogyakarta, this 3-star hotel is the ideal base to discover the charm of Yogyakarta cultural life whether you are on a business trip or leisure breaks
Offering more comfort, less conformity concept with 71 Superior Room, 66 Superior Panorama Room, and 4 Suites, each room is fitted with one double bed or two single beds with the new King Koil bedding, safety deposit box, wardrobe with hangers, minibar, Coffee-tea making facilities, 32" LCD screen TV with cable channels, working desk, and free Wi-Fi Internet access. Room for people with disabilities is also provided.
Come dine with us and find the Chef’s offers of original and varied culinary experience with subtle flavors at the on-site restaurant. In-room dining options can also be offered.
Rejuvenate and refresh your body and mind with the on-site fitness center and spa.
Directions, How to get thereThe hotel also offers car hire and airport transfer with additional charges. Yogyakarta Presidential Palace is 300 m from Pesonna Malioboro, while Fort Vredeburg is 400 m away. Adisucipto Airport is 8 km from the property.

deskripsi:
Pesonna Tugu Yogyakarta is one of the best place to enjoy the perfect combination of modern lifestyle, with warm welcome and rich cultural heritage of Yogyakarta.
Enjoy all the comfort of home when you settle into one of 106 Deluxe Rooms, 30 Deluxe Panorama Rooms, and 2 Pesonna Suites. Each room in this hotel is fitted with 32" LCD TV with local and international channels, Air conditioning, Safe deposit box, Mini-bar, Coffee and tea making facilities, work desk with telephone, and free Wi-Fi Internet access. All bathrooms are en-suite bathroom with shower.
Have a comfort dine and atmosphere at Pesonna Tugu Coffee Shop, with vintage concept and friendly services and great food and beverages, surely the coffee shop will give you a best moment.

deskripsi:
This hotel enjoys a great setting at the heart of Jogja City. The hotel is located just a 5 minutes' driving distance from Tugu railway station. The airport is conveniently situated just a 25 minutes' driving distance away. The hotel is located just a short distance away from a host of shopping opportunities, dining options and entertainment venues. This wonderful hotel greets guests with the promise of comfort and convenience. The guest rooms are tastefully designed, offering a relaxing setting in which to unwind. The rooms are well equipped with modern amenities. Guests can enjoy delectable dining in the relaxing surroundings of the restaurant.
At The PETI MAS HOTEL, you are warmly welcome with Javanese courtesy. Besides, you may enjoy a wide range of facilities at this hotel, such as large rooms with other comforts, like AC, TV, Fan, personal bathroom, hot and cool water, and shower.
 For dining options, guests can head to the restaurant, which offers all-day Indonesian dining.
 A large, clean swimming pool invites you to swim. 
 While lodging at this wonderful property, guests can enjoy tours, car park, family room, restaurant, room service.

deskripsi:
Featuring Javanese style, PLataran Borobudur assures a true experience of Borobudur. PLataran Borobudur is equipped with various excellent facilities, among them are the Stupa Lounge & Restaurant which offers a variety of fine dining international and Indonesia cuisine as well as the Padma Spa & Yoga Club with its concept of detoxification. Luxurious Villas are furnished with private pools and the resort also boasts a monastic retreat, ideal for serene contemplation and meditation, an escape from stress and worry and the madding crowd, with the Borobudur Cultural Heritage Theater and Menoreh open-air deck surrounded by lush teak forests. Guests are welcomed in a medium lobby, and other amenities comprising business center, car rental, public internet, laundry and room service. 
The property offers various types of accommodation units, which are Pool Villa, Grand Garden Villa, Paddy Cabana and Grand Pool Villa. The accommodation is furnished with private garden, an International Direct Dial (IDD) telephone, minibar, safe deposit box, tea and coffee maker facilities, as well as umbrella. 
Stupa Lounge & Restaurant is located across lobby with 17.8 x 17 square meters land area, which is able to accommodate approximately twenty eight people and offers a variety of international and Indonesia cuisine. 
The hotel boasts an outdoor swimming pool for guests who want to soak or sunbath at the poolside. They can pamper themselves with spa and massage treatment or unwind in sauna. Bicycle rental is also provided to explore surrounding area.
facility:
Featuring Javanese style, PLataran Borobudur assures a true experience of Borobudur. PLataran Borobudur is equipped with various excellent facilities, among them are the Stupa Lounge & Restaurant which offers a variety of fine dining international and Indonesia cuisine as well as the Padma Spa & Yoga Club with its concept of detoxification. Luxurious Villas are furnished with private pools and the resort also boasts a monastic retreat, ideal for serene contemplation and meditation, an escape from stress and worry and the madding crowd, with the Borobudur Cultural Heritage Theater and Menoreh open-air deck surrounded by lush teak forests. Guests are welcomed in a medium lobby, and other amenities comprising business center, car rental, public internet, laundry and room service. 
The property offers various types of accommodation units, which are Pool Villa, Grand Garden Villa, Paddy Cabana and Grand Pool Villa. The accommodation is furnished with private garden, an International Direct Dial (IDD) telephone, minibar, safe deposit box, tea and coffee maker facilities, as well as umbrella. 
Stupa Lounge & Restaurant is located across lobby with 17.8 x 17 square meters land area, which is able to accommodate approximately twenty eight people and offers a variety of international and Indonesia cuisine. 
The hotel boasts an outdoor swimming pool for guests who want to soak or sunbath at the poolside. They can pamper themselves with spa and massage treatment or unwind in sauna. Bicycle rental is also provided to explore surrounding area.
nearbyattraction: none

namahotel: Plataran Herigate Borobudur Hotel and Convention
deskripsi:
Cultivated elegance meets colonial charm for a uniquely enchanting stay at Plataran Heritage Borobudur Hotel & Convention Center, set amid the rice terraces of Kretek village in Magelang, Central Java, with Borobudur Temple at your doorstep and the legendary Menoreh Hills as your backdrop. 
Deluxe and Deluxe Premier Rooms are equipped for your absolute comfort with a king-size or twin-size beds, bathroom with rain shower, and a private outdoor terrace or balcony. Suite Room; Featuring an elegant blend of colonial-inspired interiors and a palette of natural tones, the Suites are soothing havens designed for unparalleled relaxation.
Menoreh restaurant satisfies all palates with breakfast, lunch and dinner buffets packed with the flavours of international, Indonesian and pan-Asian fare. The Langit Menoreh Bar & Lounge invites guests to dine and relax. Take a break from the tropical heat to enjoy light bites and refreshing drinks. Indulge in an authentic taste of Indonesia at Stupa Restaurant, whose menu of Indonesian specialties takes guests on a mouth-watering culinary journey across the archipelago. 
Pool; Enjoy the quiet oasis of the 30-metre outdoor lap pool, where one can refresh with a dip or bathe in the warmth of the sun on poolside loungers and sunbeds. Fitness Centre; A well-equipped gym and children’s activity centre provide space for more energetic pursuits. Spa; Enter the peaceful sanctuary of Padma Spa located on the top floor of the hotel with a stunning view of the Menoreh hills and rice paddies. Let the therapist’s intuitive touch rejuvenate and restore long-forgotten energy under the mystic sky of Borobudur.

deskripsi:
This property located near Adisucipto Golf Course. Along with a restaurant, this smoke-free hotel has an outdoor pool and 2 bars/lounges. Free WiFi in public areas, free valet parking, and a free airport shuttle are also provided. Additionally, a fitness center, a coffee shop/café, and a 24-hour business center are onsite. All 152 rooms offer free WiFi, 24-hour room service, and LED TVs with cable channels. Other amenities available to guests include minibars, premium bedding, and coffee makers. 
Treat yourself with massages and body treatments. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find an outdoor pool and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a television in a common area. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the complimentary area shuttle.
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Depok? This hotel has facilities measuring 5479 square feet (509 square meters), including conference space. A roundtrip airport shuttle is complimentary (available 24 hours).
 24-hour airport shuttle service is available. Fees may apply. Contact the property in advance to get details.
Make yourself at home in one of the 152 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.
Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the coffee shop/café. The hotel also offers 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6 AM to 10 AM for a fee.

This property located near Prambanan Temple. Along with 2 outdoor pools, this smoke-free hotel has a restaurant and a coffee shop/café. Free WiFi in public areas and free valet parking are also provided. Additionally, a meeting room, a children's pool, and dry cleaning are onsite. All 20 rooms provide conveniences like dining areas and sitting areas, plus free WiFi and balconies. TVs, room service, and free bottled water are among the other amenities available to guests.

Set in a prime location of Yogyakarta, Hotel Poncowinatan puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services.
Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities such as TV with international channels, bathroom with shower amenities, and tea/coffee making facilities. 
Wi-Fi in public areas, laundry service, car hire, tours, room service are just some of the facilities on offer. . Hotel Poncowinatan combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Yogyakarta unforgettable.

deskripsi:
Stay at Pondok Gajah Homestay to discover the wonders of Yogyakarta. This homestay combines traditional building and modern furniture. Come with spacious greenery, this accommodation is suitable for you whether you're on business trip or leisure. 
Guestrooms at Pondok Gajah Homestay are equipped with desk, air conditioning, complimentary bottled water, satellite/cable TV, seating area.
Guest who stay at this homestay can enjoy a unique dining experience at the on-site restaurant.
Situated in Kasihan Yogyakarta, from here guests who love historical site or art enthusiast have easy access to visit museums and art galleries. The exciting of city center is just 6 km if you want to go shopping or sightseeing. At the homestay, there's an outdoor pool with pool chair at the pool side, a nice place for guests to relax or rest after traveling around.

deskripsi:
POP! Hotel Gandekan Yogyakarta is strategically located in the iconic Malioboro district, Yogyakarta. Tugu train station and Malioboro Street are within walking distance, along with some of Yogyakarta's most historical sites, tourist attractions, traditional markets and shopping mall.
The hotel comprises of 103 rooms with facilities such as complimentary Morning Bites, free WIFI in rooms and public areas, LCD TV with international TV channels, hot water shower and in room safe deposit box.
As for dining option, simple breakfast is served daily at the breakfast area. Alternatively guests can explore the surrounding area where various restaurants can be found just a 10-minute walk away.
Guests staying at this hotel can get assistance from the friendly staff at the 24-hour front desk to organize luggage storage service. Newspapers are available at the shared lounge/tv area.

deskripsi:
Located in the centre of the city of Yogyakarta, POP! Hotel Sangaji Yogyakarta offers eco-friendly and convenient accommodation both for business and leisure.
Pop! Hotel Sangaji offers its “Pop!” room with their double or twin bed room with their signature features, a modern room feature a bright and colorful pop decor. Each room includes a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, free Wi-Fi, in-room safe box, and free breakfast. All rooms have a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries.
Pop! Hotel Sangaji offers a restaurant and coffee shop with delighting all-day meals for all guests.
Meeting rooms are available with facilities including high speed internet, projector and screen, sound system, and meeting kit.
 Free parking is available at POP! Hotel Sangaji Yogyakarta.

deskripsi:
Pose In Hotel Jogja is the only smart hotel in jogja that provide bigger room, it is new and imaginative select service hotels for smart business and leisure travelers who appreciate style, functionality and a good value. It’s really uncomplicated and straight forward guest services.
These friendly rooms are equipped with LG LCD TV’s, remote controlled AC’s, modern bathroom with standing showers and offers free WiFi connections throughout. Every room has an easy to use security key card locking system for peace of mind as well as deal the business.
Wave Restaurant serves a variety of Asian and Western dishes, and is available for all-day dining. 
sTop features of the hotel include shuttle service, valet parking, car hire, tours, concierge.
Directions, How to get there Yogyakarta is served by Adisucipto International Airport. There are two train stations: Lempuyangan and Yogyakarta. Yogyakarta is considered as one of the major hub that links the west-east main railway route in Java island. To the south, in the Bantul region, is the Giwangan bus station, the largest bus station in Indonesia. The centre of metropolitan Yogyakarta is surrounded by a ring road. Since 2008, the Province of Yogyakarta launched bus rapid transit system, the Trans Jogja, which connects many places in the province including the airport.

deskripsi:
PRIMA SR Hotel & Convention is an international business hotel located in the city of Sleman Yogyakarta district. The property features distinctive architecture, which a sense of blended with modern facilities.The hotel has 82 room, 2 group rooms,10 business room, 21 superior rooms, 46 deluxe rooms, 2 suite rooms and 3 family rooms. The hotel houses a grand ballroom, 4 meeting rooms, restaurant, lounge, business center, art shop, tour & travel and with spacious parking lot. PRIMA SR Hotel & Convention Yogyakarta is an ideal destination for both pleasure and business. 
PRIMA SR Hotel & Convention Yogyakarta presents 82 well appointed rooms, which blend modern furnishings and interior design. Each guest room has individually controlled air conditioning units, an en suite bathroom with shower, IDD/NDD telephone, colour flat screen TV with satellite receiver, hair dryer by requested, tea & coffee making facilities and 24-hour room service.
TAMANSARI Restaurant is the main restaurant of PRIMA SR Hotel & Convention Yogyakarta. Located on the ground right parking area with capacity 75 seats and offers a wide selection of Indonesian and Western dishes in a casual atmosphere, one private room is available. Available for breakfast every day, room service, a variety of menu choices for lunch and dinner. 
The hotel offers tour & travel assistance, art shop, beauty salon, and wedding services.

deskripsi:
This property located near Lippo Plaza Jogja. This smoke-free hotel features 2 restaurants, an outdoor pool, and a health club. Free WiFi in public areas, free self parking, and a free shopping center shuttle are also provided. Additionally, a bar/lounge, a poolside bar, and a coffee shop/café are onsite. All 177 soundproofed rooms feature free WiFi and 24-hour room service. For a bit of entertainment, LCD TVs come with cable channels, and guests can also appreciate conveniences like refrigerators and coffee makers. 
Relax and unwind with massages and body treatments. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as a health club, an outdoor pool, and an outdoor tennis court. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands. Guests can get to nearby shops on the complimentary shuttle.
Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Depok? This hotel has facilities measuring 947 square feet (88 square meters), including conference space. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.
 24-hour airport shuttle service is available on request. Fees may apply. Contact the property in advance to make arrangements.
Make yourself at home in one of the 177 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature hair dryers and slippers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.
Grab a bite at Colombo Pool Terrace, one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Snacks are also available at the coffee shop/café. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are served on weekdays from 6:00 AM to 10:00 AM and on weekends from 6:00 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee.

deskripsi:
Decorated with Javanese and Balinese artworks, This 4 star standard hotel in Yogyakarta provides practical in-room facilities suitable for everyone. Puri Artha Yogyakarta hotel staffs are eager to service its guests during their stay at the hotel. Tourists visit Indonesia for its unique charms and popular attractions. Known as one of the popular tourist attractions of Indonesia, Yogyakarta permits voyagers to take pleasure in its famous venues and local food market. Staying at Puri Artha Yogyakarta can give a comfort for guests' Yogyakarta holidays. The hotel offers comfortable rooms suitable for all travelers. The hotel features practical guestrooms and suites. 
The property boasts spacious rooms with traditional furniture, and divided into four categories which are Superior Room, Deluxe Special Room, Puri Special Room and Family Room. All rooms contain an en-suite bathroom with shower, bathtub and a wash basin with hot and cold water, as well as an International Direct Dial (IDD) telephone. Other in-room amenities include a color TV with satellite/cable channels, individually controlled air conditioning and a minibar. Each room also features a double or king-size bed, an internet access, a safe, tea and coffee making facilities and a veranda facing a beautiful garden to create a nice atmosphere.
The restaurant serves a continental breakfast, and lunch and dinner à la carte or from set menus. 
The property boasts an outdoor swimming pool for those who want to soak or sunbath at poolside while having cocktail and juices at snack poolside bar (for an additional fee). Guests may also relax with a massage or spa treatment (fees apply to both).

deskripsi:
Puri Pangeran Hotel is a popular choice amongst travelers, Puri Pangeran Hotel is located within close distance to the city centre of Yogyakarta. While stay here, you're just in minutes walk to the city center and close to Malioboro Street, Gedung Agung the Presidential Palace, Benteng Vredeburg, Keraton Sultan Palace, Traditional Market Bringharjo and culinary center of Yogyakarta. Puri Pangeran Hotel also offers easy access to public transportation for travelers who want to see what's Yogyakarta has to offer. This hotel not only offer the great location but also provide a variety of facilities and services, our 24-hour front desk is always welcome you for any inquiries or late check-ins, the hotel also can arrange your city tour for sightseeing. 
 Every room here offers individually air-condition control, hot shower, free Internet Wifi, LCD TV with international and local channels, ensuite bathrooms, terraces/ private balconies and free basic toiletries.
Puri Pangeran is surrounded by many dining options such as Sultan Agung Cuisine, Kedai Mongondow, and Nagoya Fusion Pakualaman. If you want to stay at the hotel, you can visit the on-site restaurant and taste Indonesian cuisine with finest ingredients.
An outdoor pool and a sunbathing terrace are a perfect place to refresh yourself after traveling around Yogyakarta in a tiring day.

deskripsi:
We are a small family run homestay located in the heart of Yogyakarta's prestigious university district and conveniently located to explore this historical city. Our homestay come with modern Indonesia décor. Staff at the 24 hour front desk can arrange for airport shuttle and car rental services.
A TV, a kitchen and shower facilities are included. The Homestay are fitted with 2 bedrooms (double and twin beds) and a separate living area. Up to two older children or adults stay free of charge for extra beds. 
Guests can relax on the terrace or take a stroll in the landscaped garden. 
A selection of top-class facilities such as smoking area, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, family room can be enjoyed at the hotel.

namahotel: Queen of the South Beach Resort
deskripsi:
Conveniently located in secluded Parangtritis - Yogyakarta, Queen of The South Resort is a great base from which to explore this beautiful secluded Parangtritis Beach. Situated 28 km from the city center, the hotel offers easy access to the Parangtritis Beach. This Yogyakarta hotel is located in an area that can only be described as breath takingly beautiful.
Steeped in Javanese tradition and culture the Queen of the South is well kept secret. A spiritual retreat that beckons the senses and leaves one fascinated and wanting more of what Yogyakarta has to offer.
A boutique style resort, perched on the edge of a cliff with magnificent views over the Indian Ocean and direct beach access. This is the perfect hideaway for total relaxation but still within easy distance of Yogyakarta's main attractions.
Guests can choose from 60 rooms, all of which exude an atmosphere of total peace and harmony with sea and garden views and direct beach access, entice the visitor to stay and experience Yogyakarta, away from the bustle of the busy city. All cottages and suites are air conditioned with Satellite TV, 220V sockets, mini bar and telephone.
Throughout the day, you can enjoy the relaxing atmosphere of the yoga room, private beach, outdoor pool, fishing, and spa. Nothing will beat an exciting beach sporting activities at Parangtritis, including water ski, volley beach, and many more.
At Queen of the South, one special room set aside for the Nyai Roro Kidul (hence the name of this resort derived from). We also have a meditation room adjoining the Queens room for those who wish to pay homage to Ratu Kidul. Our Resident Protocol is a specialist in these spiritual traditions and is always available to talk with and escort the guest to Ratu Kidul room.
 Queen of The South Resort also offers impeccable service and all the essential amenities to invigorate travelers. The hotel offers access to a vast array of services, including 24-hour security, a fax machine, 24-hour front desk, express check-in/check-out, and luggage storage.

deskripsi:
Quin Colombo Hotel is one of the three-star hotels located quite strategic, just 5 minutes away from those 10th century's cultural sites. Likewise the journey to Adisucipto International Airport and the city center.
Quin Colombo Hotel with modern minimalist design concept provides some facilities consisting of 69 rooms, all equipped with Five Stars King Koil bed & Accessories, Air Conditioner, LCD TV, Free internet access, Coffee & Tea Maker, Hot & Cool Water, Refrigerator (Deluxe & Suite Room), Safe Deposit Box (Deluxe & Suite Room), Sprinkler & Heat Detector.
Roro Jonggrang Restaurant, opens daily from 6 AM to 11 PM. Serves breakfast for all hotel's guests and offering local and western cuisines.
The magnificence of the high-value of masterpiece sites can be enjoyed in Yogyakarta, one of them is the Prambanan Temple including the other temples in the vicinity such as Kalasan Temple, Ratu Boko Temple, Ijo Temple, Banyunibo Temples and Barong Temple.

deskripsi:
This property located in Pakem. Dry cleaning, laundry facilities, and a 24-hour front desk are available at this smoke-free guesthouse. Free WiFi in public areas and free self parking are also provided. Additionally, free newspapers and a garden are onsite. All 3 rooms offer free WiFi, room service, and LCD TVs with satellite channels. Desks and free toiletries are also available to guests. 
Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access.
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.
If you are planning to arrive after 10 PM please contact the property at least 24 hours in advance using the information on the booking confirmation. 24-hour airport shuttle service is available. Fees may apply. Contact the property in advance to get details.
Make yourself at home in one of the 3 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and slippers. Conveniences include desks, housekeeping is provided daily, and irons/ironing boards can be requested.
Take advantage of the guesthouse's room service (during limited hours). Breakfast is available for a fee.

The hotel provides Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, airport transfer. This area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at Rajasa Hotel. A tour desk can give you many information about the area.

Located in Tugu Jogja, Rene Hotel is a perfect starting point from which to explore Yogyakarta. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. 24-hour front desk, Wi-Fi in public areas, express check-in/check-out, laundry service, car hire are just some of the facilities on offer.
Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer shower, balcony/terrace, complimentary bottled water, bathtub, internet access – wireless to ensure a restful night.
Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including massage, spa, sauna.

deskripsi:
Roemah Canting is comfortable, quite, clean, simple interaction with neighbourhood and beautiful homestay in the center of Yogyakarta city with a strategic location which has become a suitable choice of accommodation while visiting in Yogyakarta. Roemah Canting is also close to shopping center, offices, traditional markets and hospitals.
There are four types of room available here. Standard facilities at each room including individual control air-conditioned, LCD screen television, large bathroom with hot – cold shower that impressively appointed to welcome you with fully comfortable during your stay. 
 In-room breakfast is available for the guests. 
Guests can make use of the safety deposit boxes and luggage storage facilities available by the front desk, while staff can arrange vehicle rental, airport transfers and area shuttles at additional fees. Laundry service is provided upon request.

deskripsi:
The only four star luxurious Hotel at South of Yogyakarta with friendly services. Enjoy the ease of doing business with easy access to the Adi Sucipto Airport, Giwangan Bus Station and Tugu Railway Station. Few minutes drive to Kasongan Ceramic Industry, Gabusan Art Market and Manding Leather Handycraft Market and also Malioboro Street. Have a wonderfull holiday with family and enjoy unforgettable moment on sand of Parang Tritis Beach. The hotel offers luxuriously appointed rooms. Services and amenities include internet access, LCD TV, swimming pool and fitness centre.
 Rooms at Ros-In are fitted with cable TV, an in-room safe and a tea/coffee maker. Each room has a private bathroom with shower facilities.
Samas Lobby Lounge, located at the level Lobby area, cozy ambience it offer view in the main street with rich selection of drink and cakes. Also a rich variety of tea flavour with wade section of snacks, served daily from 3 – 5 pm.
 The hotel offers an excellent variety of recreational facilities, including fitness center, outdoor pool, sauna, spa, pool (kids), massage. 
 While lodging at this wonderful property, guests can enjoy shuttle service, facilities for disabled guests, car park, business center, family room.

deskripsi:
Rosalia Indah Hotel Yogyakarta is the only hotel, best in their quality and hospitality in their service.
Rooms
The hotel features 38 beautifully appointed guest rooms under a modern-minimalist design, each including AC, LCD TV with satellite and cable channels, telephone, interconnecting room(s) per request, and high speed internet access – wireless.
A garden restaurant is available in this hotel.
The hotel provides room service, taxi reservation service, laundry service, rental car, and meeting room at additional but highly competitive rate. Free parking is provided for every guest.

deskripsi:
As a five star hotel, Royal Ambarrukmo Hotel Yogyakarta previously known as Ambarrukmo Palace Hotel boasts an array of fabulous amenities to ensure guests' satisfaction. The hotel has been undergoing a great transformation to bring back the glamour of the past merged 21st century technology that embraces both its historic heritage and the modern comforts. Besides its historic grandeur, the hotel is also preferred due to its central location. The hotel is also furnished with meeting rooms to suit every functions, major credit card accepted, airport transfer, business center, car hire, ticket service, concierge service, laundry and dry cleaning. 
Redesigned and decorated with stylish furnishings, the newly renovated rooms feature extra spacious balconies with panoramic views of pool garden or surrounding countryside. Other special features include complimentary wireless internet access, LCD televisions, coffee and tea maker and a laptop-sized in room safe. Furthermore, the rooms feature minibar, cable TV/ satellite TV, safe deposit box, an International Direct Dial (IDD) telephone, bathrooms amenities, tea and coffee maker, as well as slippers. 
To satisfy guests' appetite, the hotel boasts some fine dining venues, which are a restaurant serving cuisines made of traditional local ingredients with international cooking techniques and Lobby Lounge is set to become a popular meeting point for locals and travelers a like. 
Guests can take part in activities like Kedaton Heritage walk tour, and for those who want to take a refreshing dip can visit swimming pools with children swimming pool. In addition, they can pamper themselves with sauna, or enjoy a work-out at gym/ fitness center.

deskripsi:
Situated in Borobudur, Rumah Boedi Private Residence Villa is in a rural location and close to Borobudur Temple. Additional regional attractions include Borobudur Golf Country Club and Diponegoro Museum.
 The 16 air-conditioned guestrooms at Rumah Boedi Private Residence Villa include complimentary bottled water. Complimentary wireless high-speed Internet access is provided. Rooms are equipped with LCD TVs.
The restaurant serves a variety of local, Italian and Chinese dishes. Grilled barbecue food is also provided.
Guests can take a stroll in the gardens, or make sightseeing arrangements at the tour desk. Other activities including biking across the rice fields can be arranged for an additional fee. 
Car park, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, laundry service, airport transfer, 24-hour front desk are just a few of the facilities that set Rumah Boedi Private Residence Borobudur apart from other hotels in the city. 
<

deskripsi:
The Rumah Eyang Guest House offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Yogyakarta. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Facilities like 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, family room are readily available for you to enjoy. For reliable service and professional staff, Rumah Eyang Guest House caters to your needs. 
At the guest house, the rooms are equipped with a desk, a TV and a private bathroom. Certain rooms come with a kitchen with a fridge. At Rumah Eyang Guesthouse each room is equipped with a seating area.
There's a shared kitchen available to use at this guesthouse.
The old-culture enthusiast will love the hotel's location, Sultan's Palace is 2.4 km from the accommodation, while Fort Vredeburg is 2.7 km away.

deskripsi:
Rumah Ibu Guest House comes with 4 bed rooms and all the house’s facilities, aiming to maximize your experience with homey atmosphere and boutique services on your trip to Jogjakarta.
Each room is designed with minimalistic style. Guesthouse has either 2 twin or 1 king-size beds in each bedroom with Japanese cotton bedcover to make your night more comfortable. Facilities available in this hotel including individually-controlled air conditioner, dining room with complete kitchen and fridge, living room with 29” cable TV, mini home theater, couch, telephone, Wi-Fi access, and en-suite bathroom with bathroom amenities and water heater.
Guests can book a touring service around Jogjakarta and Solo.

deskripsi:
Rumah Mertua Boutique Hotel & Restaurant offers cosy boutique rooms within a tropical garden. From here, guests just need 15 minutes to center of Jogjakarta. 
Rooms Rumah Mertua combines the luxury of a good hotel with the environment of a traditonal Javanese house. Featuring 11 rooms from 4 Standard rooms, 2 Superior rooms, 1 Family rooms, and 4 Deluxe rooms. All Air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a cable TV and wooden furnishings. Attached bathrooms have hot and cold water showers. Minibar is available in all rooms.
 Rumah Mertua Garden Restaurant serves authentic Indonesian cuisine in a romantic garden setting. The restaurant open 10:00 AM-09:30 PM.
Rumah Mertua is the ideal place to discover Java´s natural beaches, mountains, volcanoes. The Hotel also provides exclusive tour arrangements to places inside and around Jogjakarta. You can visit Borobudur and Prambanan Temples, Dieng Plateau or have a city tour to Jl. Malioboro, The Sultan´s Palace, Taman Sari Water Castle and many more attractions. Cycling tour to Prambanan and Borobudur is also available, you can look numerous plantations of corn, tobaccos, chilli and salak along the trip, you can witness the local neighborhoods typical traditional houses along the tour, and enjoy the sensation countryside of Java. Large group tours are also available daily or you may prefer to rent our car for a very reasonable cost (fee includes gasoline and driver). After a day out, guests can request for a traditional Javanese oil massage. There's also an outdoor pool lined with sun loungers.

deskripsi:
Rumah palagan is located in the comfortable and cool place and near luxurious settlements or merapi view and more. Rumah Palagan is also not so far from jogja kembali monument (The Monument for reminisce about Yogyakarta people to defend the country). To reach this hotel, we will pass street and palagan street.
Rumah Palagan brings the patriotism nuance in the interior decoration. Ten of photographs reproduction from Indonesia freedom struggle are displayed on the room’s wall. Some ornaments of Javanese and Balinese also decorate the hotel’s lobby and beautiful garden is in front of all rooms.
 Rumah Palagan provides 14 rooms with AC, television and modern bath room. The rooms at Rumah Palagan Guest House have a refrigerator, bottled water and tea and coffee making facilities. Bathrobes are also provided for extra comfort. 
A satisfying breakfast is available each morning at Rumah Palagan Guest House, and there are numerous restaurants and cafés nearby. There is also the added convenience of an in-house restaurant. 
The clean swimming pool can be the perfect place to enjoy in the afternoon and evening.
 The guest house features a ticket service, a 24-hour reception and a laundry service. Wireless internet is provided within the building, ensuring guests have no issues staying connected during their trip.

deskripsi:
The Rumah Sleman Private Boutique Hotel in Yogyakarta is an exceptional accommodation of the city. The hotel building itself reflects sophistication and luxury. The wide portico at the entrance to the hotel gives it a majestic look. The hotel is an ideal holiday retreat. This boutique styled accommodation assures the guests with utmost comfort and luxury. This summer if you want have a vacation different from the usual way drop in this exotic boutique hotel to fulfill your desire. The hotel is known to be one of the most lavish Hotels in Yogyakarta in Indonesia.
The air-conditioned rooms at Rumah Sleman come with hardwood furnishings. Each room has a seating area and TV. Hot shower facilities are in the en suite bathroom.
Western and local dishes are served at the restaurant. Indoor and outdoor dining options are offered.
 The complete list of recreational facilities is available at the hotel, including garden, children's playground, massage, spa. 
Guests of the hotel can enjoy on-site features like airport transfer, car park, meeting facilities, shuttle service, Wi-Fi in public areas.

deskripsi:
Located in Yogyakarta, 1.1 km from Tugu Monument, Sabana Homestay features a terrace and views of the garden. Free private parking is available on site. By an ideal location, this accommodation is suitable for both business travelers and tourists. There are also shared lounge/TV area, family room, valet parking, business center, smoking area at this property. 
 With 2 types of room, both Standard Twin and Standard Double are equipped air conditioning, wardrobe, flat screen TV, and private bathroom feature shower and toiletries. 
A selection of Indonesian food can be sampled in Tojoyo Restaurant while Western food and baked goods may be sampled at Kobayashi Café, both located a 5-minute walk from the homestay. A local supermarket can be found also within a 5-minute walk away.
This homestay offers you bicycle rental, you can go cycling to city's highlight and attractions

deskripsi:
Sagan Hotel provides luxurious rooms, offers excellent service and hospitality at unbeatable price. Located at the center of Jogja, in famous Sagan area, just a few minutes from Tugu Jogja, Malioboro shopping district, Univerities complex. Featuring meeting rooms, this hotel show you it's an ideal accommodation for business, family trip and leisure. 
The hotel features 40 beautifully appointed guest rooms, there are Deluxe, Superior, and Business Room. The guestroom at Sagan Hotel are equipped with air conditioning, TV Cable, refrigerator, IDD call, tea & coffee maker, and the private bathroom with bath facilities. 
 Taste many selections of delicious International menu and Indonesian cuisines made by our professional chef at the on site restaurant. With cozy Merapi and garden view, this place is suitable for you to spend time with friends, family or business associates. This hotel also offers Garden Resto for you who want to feel romantic dining atmosphere.
 This hotel offers city leisure destination like Merapi Lava Tour, Malioboro Street, Goa Pindul, and Borobudur Temple.

deskripsi:
Being a 4 star hotel and considered as a Superior Tourist class property, Sahid Raya Yogyakarta features a modern building with Keraton or Palace interior concept. Surrounded by landscaped garden with a variety of flora and fauna, the hotel is a pioneer hotel in Yogyakarta that introduce a Keraton or Palace concept. Guests are welcomed in a lobby with Javanese decoration. Close to one of the Seven Wonder of the World, which are Borobudur Temple as well as other ancient temples. Hotel Sahid Yogyakarta boasts an array of utmost amenities including baby sitter, limousine service, 24 hour service, art shop and money changer. Other amenities comprise travel agency and 24 hours room service. 
All rooms in main tower and cottages are average in condition with simple decor and standard amenities. The accommodation is furnished with air conditioning, television, minibar, hairdryer, laundry and dry cleaning, as well as room internet access. 
The hotel boasts one restaurant that caters local and some selected international cuisines. 
Guests can take a refreshing dip in swimming pool with children swimming pool and snack bar for those who want to have cocktail and snack. They can enjoy playing tennis, billiard, table tennis and chess.
facility:

Guests are welcomed in a lobby with Javanese decoration. Close to one of the Seven Wonder of the World, which are Borobudur Temple as well as other ancient temples. deskripsi:
Whether you're a tourist or traveling on business, The Rich Jogja Hotel is a great choice for accommodation when visiting Yogyakarta. The Rich Jogja Hotel is only 5 kilometers away from the city center and provides accessibility to important town facilities.
The rooms are designed to give guests the highest degree of comfort and convenience. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, clothes rack, free welcome drink, linens and mirror. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms have designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Throughout the day, guests can enjoy the relaxing atmosphere of the fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, spa and massage.
At The Rich Jogja Hotel, every effort is made to make guests feel comfortable. Guests can enjoy on-site features like 24-hour room service, free Wi-fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, convenience store and gift/souvenir shop.

Sakanti Malioboro Hotel is offering a comfortable and convenient accommodation, accompanied with modern facilities and excellent services. The hotel comes with a number of facilities including meeting rooms and parking area.
The hotel consists of Superior, Deluxe, and Suite Rooms, each come with Wi-Fi access, cable TV, and telephone. Upgraded quarters will offer extra space for living room, and stunning city or pool views. Laundry service is available upon request.
A relaxing restaurant and coffee shop is serving next to the swimming pool. Room service is available upon request.
The hotel comes with an outdoor swimming pool and spacious lobby lounge.

deskripsi:
This popular property is situated in Yogyakarta . Hotel was built in 2010. There are a total of 43 rooms on the premises. Situated in the city centre, the hotel is convenient to the rest of the city. The hotel is a quick drive from the airport. There is an on-site car park.
Simply furnished rooms fit a flat-screen cable TV, safety deposit box and a seating area. A coffee maker is also provided. Each room has a private bathroom with shower facilities and free toiletries.
The hotel offers fantastic facilities, including massage, spa, golf course (within 3 km), garden, to help you unwind after an action-packed day in the city. 
The hotel provides the best in services and amenities. To name a few of the hotel's facilities, there are coffee shop, airport transfer, laundry service, bicycle rental, 24-hour front desk.

deskripsi:
Designed in modern-traditional Java architecture style, Hotel Santika Premiere Jogja boasts classic Javanese artistry and the city's rich cultural heritage. This iconic four-star property offers all the necessary facilities and conveniences that every modern traveler has come to expect. Transportation can easily be arranged to visit the Sultan's Palace and other historic sites of interest. Business and leisure guests alike will find this hotel a comfortable place to work, rest or play before moving on to explore Java and beyond. Guests are welcomed in a Lobby Lounge as a relaxing spot to chill-out with friends or business colleagues. Seating arrangements overlook the pool and parents can easily keep a watchful eye on children as they play or swim. The lounge offers a full menu of preferred beverages and fitted with WiFi and Hot Spot coverage, as well as Live entertainment is available. 
A smart and luxurious decor reflects in neutral shades of colors and modern conveniences to ensure a relaxing experience. All rooms are complete with marble en-suite bathrooms with bathtubs and showers, mini bars, tea and coffee makers, flat screen TVs with satellite channels and WiFi Internet access. 
For satisfying in-house guests, Hotel Santika Premiere Jogja offers Pandan Sari Restaurant, opened for 24-hour dining and celebrates the delicate beauty of classic Javanese artistry. It serves a delicious menu of Indonesian and European cuisine along with regular promotional dishes to tantalize the taste buds. For breakfast, Pandan Sari Restaurant provides a generous buffet featuring interactive food stations. 
The property has an outdoor swimming pool with sunbathing facilities. Guests may also work out in the gym or relax in the sauna or with a selection of spa and massage treatments.
