deskripsi:
Located in Borobudur, Saraswati Borobudur is minutes from Samudraraksa Museum and Borobudur Temple. This hotel is close to Candi Pawon and Candi Mendut. This hotel promises a wonderful stay, facilities such as a shuttle from the airport to the hotel is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and complimentary babysitting/childcare are ready for the guests to enjoy. 
 Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and coffee/tea makers.
Guests can enjoy their meals in Sarasvati Borobudur's restaurant.
Enjoy the recreational facilities including an outdoor pool and bicycles to rent.

deskripsi:
For travelers who want to take in the sights and sounds of Yogyakarta, Sari Homestay is the perfect choice. Peaceful environment will make you enjoy your trip as well as your stay. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Car park, laundry service, car hire, airport transfer, room service are on the list of things guests can enjoy.
Guestrooms at Sari Homestay are complete with air conditioning, desk, balcony/terrace, television with satellite/cable TV. 
From here, you will find public transportation easily like Trans Jogja, so you can explore Yogyakarta. There are many attractions you can visit such as Merapi, Prambanan Temple, Kali Biru, Kraton Yogyakarta, Upside Down World and many more.

deskripsi:
This property located near TransMart Studio Mini. This hotel features a restaurant, an outdoor pool, and a 24-hour fitness center. Free WiFi in public areas and free self parking are also provided. Additionally, a bar/lounge, a poolside bar, and a rooftop terrace are onsite. All 144 rooms provide conveniences like refrigerators and coffee makers, plus free WiFi and LED TVs with cable channels. Room service, premium bedding, and free bottled water are among the other amenities available to guests. 
Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and a 24-hour fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.
Featured amenities include a computer station, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.
24-hour airport shuttle service is available on request. Fees may apply. Contact the property in advance to make arrangements.
Make yourself at home in one of the 144 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.
Satisfy your appetite for lunch or dinner at Coriander, a restaurant which specializes in international cuisine, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6 AM to 10 AM for a fee.

deskripsi:
Satya Nugraha Hotel offers the highest quality and most advanced hotel services in Jogja. With clean and comfortable rooms, the hotel also has a lot of supporting facilities, such as meeting rooms (for 100 people), parking area, doctor on call, laundry service, car rental, and taxi call service.
The hotel comes with Anggrek, Melati, and Flamboyant package. Each room comes with AC, LCD TV, coffee and tea making facilities, and twin beds. Its en-suite bathroom comes with hot/cold water bath tub, sandal, dental kit, and towel.
A breakfast is served in this hotel. Room service is available for 24 hours.
Refresh your body and soul with the swimming pool and tropical garden after your long day of activities. Enjoy the billiard table and play along with friends. For those who want to swarm around the city, they can try the city touring package or car rental (with additional charge).

deskripsi:
Designed for both business and leisure travel, Savita Garden Inn is ideally situated in Ngaglik; one of the city's most popular locales. 
 Savita Garden Inn offers accommodation in 38 guestrooms complete with air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen cable TV, desk and a wardrobe, a personal safe, a sofa and a work desk. Bathrooms are appointed with a shower and toiletries. Guests can relax on the private terrace or balcony. En suite bathrooms come with shower facilities and toiletries.
 Sawo Kecik Restaurant serves a spread of Japanese, Chinese, Thai, Indonesian and seafood dishes. Meals may also be delivered to guests' rooms. 
Guests can make use of the billiards facilities. A kids' club, a play area and a pool are available for guests with children. Car rental and meeting facilities are also provided, can be arranged by staff.

Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature deep soaking bathtubs and rainfall showerheads.

facility:
This property located near TransMart Studio Mini. This resort features 2 restaurants, 3 outdoor pools, and a full-service spa. Free WiFi in public areas, free valet parking, and a free airport shuttle are also provided. Additionally, an indoor pool, 2 bars/lounges, and a fitness center are onsite. All 246 rooms boast deep soaking tubs and offer free WiFi and balconies. Free wired Internet and 24-hour room service are standard, as are LED TVs with satellite channels. 
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 3 outdoor swimming pools, 10 spa tubs, and outdoor tennis courts. Additional amenities at this resort include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and an arcade/game room.
Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Depok? This resort has facilities measuring 12917 square feet (1200 square meters), including conference space. A roundtrip airport shuttle is complimentary (available 24 hours).
 24-hour airport shuttle service is available. Fees may apply. Contact the property in advance to make arrangements.
Make yourself at home in one of the 246 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, while 32-inch LED televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature deep soaking bathtubs and rainfall showerheads.
Grab a bite at Androwino Bistro, one of the resort's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink from the poolside bar or one of the 2 bars/lounges.

 Room service is available for you to get foods and beverages.

Free continental breakfast and free WiFi in public areas are also provided. Other amenities include tour/ticket assistance and a garden. All 5 rooms provide conveniences like 3 bathrooms and refrigerators, plus free WiFi and stovetops. Other amenities available to guests include rice cookers, fans, and showers. Bathrooms are shared and housekeeping is available once per stay. 
Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access.
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours).
The front desk is open daily from 7:30 AM - 11:30 PM. 
If you are planning to arrive after 11:30 PM please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation. 24-hour airport shuttle service is available on request. Fees may apply. Contact the property in advance to make arrangements.
Make yourself at home in one of the 5 guestrooms. Prepare your meals in the shared/communal kitchen. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms with showers are provided.
Satisfy your appetite at the hostel's coffee shop/café. A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 10:30 AM.

Other amenities include dry cleaning and a 24-hour front desk. All 20 rooms feature thoughtful touches like free minibar items and slippers, plus free WiFi and flat-screen TVs with cable channels. Balconies or patios, electric kettles, and free bottled water are among the other amenities available to guests. 
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.
Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. This hotel has 2 meeting rooms available for events. Free valet parking is available onsite.

This property located near Plaza Ambarrukmo. A restaurant, an outdoor pool, and a fitness center are available at this aparthotel. Free WiFi in public areas and free self parking are also provided. Other amenities include a coffee shop/café, a rooftop terrace, and a business center. Each apartment features a kitchenette with a refrigerator and a stovetop, plus free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Added amenities include a balcony, room service, and premium bedding. 
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Additional features at this aparthotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, a television in a common area, and tour/ticket assistance.
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Free self parking is available onsite.
 
Make yourself at home in one of the 64 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and stovetops. Rooms have private balconies. Flat-screen televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and coffee/tea makers.
Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the coffee shop/café. The aparthotel also offers room service (during limited hours).

deskripsi:
Summer Season Hotel is located 0.6 miles from the center of Yogyakarta. Summer Season Boutique Hotel provides a comfortable setting when in Yogyakarta. It is close to Malioboro Street, eateries and shops, that's the reason of many guests continue to come back year after year. The property boasts free breakfast. If you are driving to Summer Season Boutique Hotel, free parking is available.
 There are 45 rooms with a perfect balance of comfort and style, at the first time you come and see, you'll feel the ambiance of “home away from home". All rooms feature a modern decor, air-conditioning, tea and coffee making facilities. 
While you stay, you can sit down to a unique dining experience at the on-site restaurant. Various options Indonesian cuisine are served.

deskripsi:
Swiss-Belhotel Yogyakarta is a new prestigious 5-star hotel in Yogyakarta that provides high quality standards of service and facilities for both business and leisure travellers. 
Swiss-Belhotel Yogyakarta features 121 guestrooms including Deluxe, Grand Deluxe, Business Suite, and Executive Suite. All of our great hotel rooms in Yogyakarta are equipped with LCD cable television and satellite international channels, IDD telephone, high-speed internet access via cable or Wi-Fi which can also be accessed in public areas, in-room safety deposit box, coffee and tea-making facilities, individually controlled air-conditioning, mini-bar and bathub or shower.
For a dining experience, our hotel offers delightful dining options for both international and local dishes. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are available in buffet and a la carte at Swiss Cafe Restaurant. Gendhis Bar a lobby lounge bar style is perfect for your leisure time while you enjoy the live instrumental pianist. Kahyangan Lounge is the perfect place to relax in a cozy ambience especially for Swiss-Belhotel members or those who overnight in a suite. Catch the sunset or overlook the city landscape each evening from Chadis Rooftop and Pool Bar. If you desire breakfast in bed, an intimate dinner, or a quick midnight snack, our in-room dining service is available 24 hours a day.
The hotel is completed with The Tamansari Puspa Spa and Gym, a modern and elegant rooftop pool, and refreshing artificial water fall at Segaran water fall. The hotel provides a modern, unique style, with prestigious accommodation and meeting facilities to ensure a truly welcoming and convenient feeling for business and leisure travelers alike. There are 8 meeting rooms, perfect for all business meetings, incentives, conferences and exhibitions.

deskripsi:
The Hotel has an International Hospitality industry combining traditional Indonesian charm and Indian touch with professional hospitality, an approachable style and spirited service with sincere values. The hotel maintains its cultural traditions and identity not only in design but also by heart.
Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Some rooms have a comfortable seating area for guests to relax in. You will find a kettle in the room for your convenience. The rooms have a private bathroom that is provided with slippers and toiletries.
The hotel offers multiple dining venue; guests may spend the night relaxing with friends or colleague at Sky Lounge Bar and RoofTop. There's also a 24 Hours Restaurant at this hotel.
The hotel offers The Fit Lab for guests who wanted to stay healthy during their vacation. And for those who seek for total relaxation might want to get a full massage treatment at Aromatic Spa & Sauna. Looking for some refreshing dip? The swimming pool is ready all day.
Directions, How to get thereThe hotel also offers car hire to explore Yogyakarta and its popular attractions. Guests interested in shopping and sightseeing can go to Malioboro Street, 2.8 km from Tara Hotel. The nearest airport is Adisucipto Airport, 8 km from the property.

deskripsi:
Tasik Jogja Hotel is a stylish blend of traditional architecture and modern minimalist with the style typical Jogja service with a friendly Smile and Sincere. Tasik Jogja Hotel is located approximately 500 m from Kraton Yogyakarta ( Sultan Palace ),5 minutes to the Pasar Satwa Dan Tanaman Hias/ Bird Market (PASTY). Tasik Jogja Hotel also closed to UMY ( Universitas Muhammadiyah Yogyakarta ), Universitas Terbuka UNY UPP II and SMKI. 15 minutes from Malioboro, Tugu Train Station, Vredeburg, Bringharjo Market, Taman Budaya, Taman Pintar and 25 minutes from Adisucipto Airport. 
A wardrobe and a flat-screen cable TV are a standard across all units. Each en suite bathroom comes fitted with shower facilities.
 The hotel's recreational facilities, which include massage are designed for escape and relaxation.
 Guests can store luggage at the 24-hour front desk, while airport transfers, car rental and day trips can be arranged at the tour desk. Featuring a meeting room, the hotel also offers laundry and room services at extra charges.

deskripsi:
Located in the eastern area of Malioboro Yogyakarta, You can reach Malioboro with 10 minutes walking from this Guest House. Tegal Panggung Guest House is the modification of an old 1908 building, was renovated in 2008, this old building components mixed with modern architecture. Some wooden boards decorated most of the front part of the house, windows, furnitures, and floor are giving the unique, warm, and comfortable impression.
Divided into main house and pavilion, Tegal Panggung consists of 6 large bedrooms equipped with Air Conditioning, lounge chair, and private bathroom with bathtub and shower. There is one very special bedroom with a very luxurious bathroom. A classic copper bathtub and sink blended with wooden floor and shower in a glass chamber. Tegal Panggung Guest House is also equipped with living room, meeting room, dining room, pantry, and terrace.

deskripsi:
If you want to enjoy the natural atmosphere of a simple village and feel the atmosphere of peace away from the noise of the city. If you want to enjoy authentic ancient Javanese food. Then you should enjoy the facilities at our Bale Inap. Our accommodation consists of 9 unit of Limasan Style ancient wooden houses beautiful landscaping and surrounded by organic rice farming area. Waroeng Dhahar Pulo Segaran (Our Restaurant) and Cozy swimming pool is the real pleasure for your body and soul. Museum Gallery House of Documentation Library and Pendopo (function room) makes Tembi Rumah Budaya as the one and only Guest House in Indonesia as a Resort based on Cultural Environment.
 Traditional Limasan-style bungalows at Tembi Rumah Budaya feature four poster beds with mosquito nets. They are fitted with seating areas. Private bathrooms have a hairdryer and hot shower facilities.
Views of paddy fields accompany authentic Indonesian dishes at Waroeng Dhahar Pulo Segaran Restaurant for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Outdoor dining and room service are available.
Guests can enjoy leisure activities such as hiking, cycling and fishing. 
Rumah Budayah has a business centre and 24-hour reception. Car hire and laundry services are available.

deskripsi:
THE 1O1 Yogyakarta Tugu is pioneering a Smart Stylish Experience hotel with a Yogyakarta touch. Suitable to both business and leisure travelers. The hotel is ideal for active, spirited travelers who love to experience and explore while also catering to the dynamic lifestyle of the modern professional. With a clean environment, fresh hospitality and easy booking, THE 1O1 Yogyakarta Tugu ‘Smart Stylish Experience' is all about smart living. Be the first to experience this new icon in the heart of Yogyakarta.
The stylish rooms are fitted with flat-screen cable TV, air conditioning and electric kettle. Equipped with a minibar, seating area and a safe. Attached bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries.
The on-site restaurant serves a selection of International and Indonesian food. Additionally room service is available for those wanting to dine in the room.
Guests are welcomed to take a dip in the outdoor pool and work out at the fitness centre. Relaxing massage can be arranged at an additional fee.
THE 1O1 Yogyakarta Tugu operates a 24-hour front desk that provides luggage storage, concierge and laundry services. Business centre, tour desk and meeting rooms are available. Airport transfer, car hire and shuttle services can also be arranged with an additional charge.

namahotel: The Alana Yogyakarta Hotel and Convention Center
deskripsi:
The Alana Hotel & Convention Center – Yogyakarta is within Mataram City, Yogyakarta’s most ambitious mixed-used development complex which consists of the Alana Hotel, its top notch Convention Centers and a lifestyle mall. Easy to access, the hotel is also conveniently close to Adisucipto International airport, Borobudur, Jalan Malioboro and the city center. The hotel lies on 2.5 hectares in hilly situation nearby Merapi Mt. 
 The hotel will feature 264 rooms and suites over four room types, each one adorned with a timeless contemporary design that captures an admiration for Javanese traditions. The air-conditioned rooms are elegantly decorated and fitted with 42” satellite TV, free WiFi, sofa, safe deposit box, electric kettle, daily-replenished fruit basket and minibar and a breakfast for 2. The en suite bathroom comes with a shower, bathtub and free amenities.
Western and Indonesian breakfast is served daily at Andrawina Coffee Shop, while refreshments can be enjoyed at Madukara Lobby Lounge. Alternatively, guests may find plenty of dining options within a 3-minute walk.
 For meeting planners and large scale event organizers, the convention facilities include 10 meeting rooms and a superb ballroom that can accommodate up to 3000 persons. For both business and pleasure, the hotel will also boast a coffee shop and a lounge, as well as an outdoor swimming pool, a spa and a gym for downtime.
The concierge service can assist guests with luggage storage and valet parking.

namahotel: The Amrta Borobudur by Haz Room
deskripsi:
This property located near Borobudur Temple. Along with a restaurant, this bed & breakfast has an outdoor pool and a meeting room. Free WiFi in public areas and free self parking are also provided. Additionally, dry cleaning, a 24-hour front desk, and free newspapers are onsite. All rooms are soundproofed and offer room service and free bottled water. For entertainment, guests will find LCD TVs with cable channels, and other amenities include free toiletries. 
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Additional amenities at this bed & breakfast include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Free self parking is available onsite.
 This property doesn't offer after-hours check-in. Guests arriving late won't be able to check in until the next morning.
Make yourself at home in one of the 11 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Cable television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and slippers. Conveniences include complimentary bottled water and a turndown service, and housekeeping is provided daily.
Enjoy Asian cuisine at Kofiorti, a poolside restaurant which features a garden view. You can also stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6:00 AM to 10:00 AM for a fee.
 Nearby Attractions

namahotel: The Atrium Hotel and Resort Yogyakarta
deskripsi:
A sanctuary for business and leisure travelers, The Atrium Hotel & Resort is a modern contemporary four-star hotel which provides an effortless comfortable atmosphere. This delightful hotel embodies the highest traditional values, offering the latest standard of services and facilities. The brand new The Atrium Hotel & Resort is the preferred relaxing point for travelers with a night or two in Yogyakarta. It is close enough to Adisucipto International Airport (20 min) to ensure you won’t be stuck in traffic like most travelers booking a hotel in the city center.
The hotel offers Deluxe Room, Resort Rooms, and Executive Suite with an option of twin or king-size bed. Each room is air conditioned, and comes with 43” LED TV with cable channels, coffee and tea making facilities, in-room safe deposit box, Wi-Fi, telephone, working desk, and mini-bar. The en-suite bathroom comes with shower and towels.
Guests can enjoy the luxurious experience of all-day dining at Lumbung Restaurant and Nirwana Bar, that serves various options of Indonesian and international dishes.
The hotel comes with the Telaga Warna Pool and Spa for the tranquil experience to rejuvenate the weary body.

deskripsi:
This property located near Gadjah Mada University. A TV in a common area and free WiFi in public areas are available at this guesthouse. All 10 rooms offer free WiFi, fans, and showers. Guests will also find desks and free toiletries. Housekeeping is available on request. 
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in a common area.
The front desk is staffed during limited hours.
The front desk is open daily from 7:00 AM - 10:00 PM. 
If you are planning to arrive after 10:00 PM please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation.
Make yourself at home in one of the 10 guestrooms. Prepare your meals in the shared/communal kitchen. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and complimentary toiletries.

deskripsi:
Well-positioned in Bantul, The Cube Hotel is the ideal point of departure for your excursions in Yogyakarta. The excitement of the city center is only 2.5 km away. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.
 Fitted with modern interiors, air-conditioned rooms come with a flat-screen cable TV, safe and a work space. They offer the comfort of in-room minibar, electric kettle and a fridge. En suite bathrooms each provide shower facilities.
Derijsttafel Restaurant specialises in Indonesian and Chinese cuisines, while Sky Lounge serves light meals. In-room dining is possible through room service. Alternatively, local dining options are reachable within a 5-minute stroll from the hotel.
Guests can check emails in the business centre, while airport transfers can be arranged at the 24-hour front desk. Staff can also assist with laundry requests and meeting rooms usage.

deskripsi:
The Edelweiss Hotel Yogyakarta is a three-star hotel with the luxuries design. Business and leisure travelers seeking comfort and luxury will find it at The Edelweiss Hotel Yogyakarta, where a modern amenities and world class services are combined with a uniqely Indonesian touch. 
Approached with modern design, the hotel features 95 superior and suites guest room which are carefully crafted to meet comfort, efficient and modern feeling. The focus of each room is an exemplary of good sleep with complete facilities such as hot-cold rain shower, coffee and tea making facilities, personal save deposit box, and LCD TV with more than 50 international channels including movies, music and news. Free WiFi access in the entire hotel's premises, is a complimentary that ease you to stay connected. 
Guests can visit The Edelweiss Hotel Yogyakarta’s restaurant which serves Asian dishes for dining time. 
Guests can refresh themselves by take a dip at the outdoor swimming pool. There is also pool for young guest who want to swim.
The Edelweiss Hotel also offers free Wi-Fi access throughout its premises and a business centre. Staff at the 24-hour front desk service can provide assistance with use of meeting rooms or the airport shuttle service. Complimentary parking is available for guests who drive.

deskripsi:
Having a concept of Roman style architecture, The Grand Palace Yogyakarta stands for guaranteed quality service and has set its mission to seek profitability not only for itself but also for hotel guests. All details of the hotel design are maintained in the Roman and Greek styles. A welcome drink will indulge its guests when check-in, and there is afternoon tea in the lobby and internet hot spots in public areas. Built in 2009, there are 62 rooms in total at this city hotel. Guests are welcomed in the lobby with 24-hour check-out service and a hotel safe. A cafe, room and laundry services (both for an additional fee) are also available. 
The accommodation in this hotel boasts some room categories, namely Superior Rooms, Deluxe Rooms, Executive Rooms and Presidential Rooms. The rooms are complete with an International Direct Dial (IDD) telephone, tea or coffee makers, a cable TV and a minibar. All are en suite with a shower and hairdryer, as well as individually regulated air conditioning. 
The hotel serves breakfast each morning, and various set menus are available for lunch and dinner. Cascade Restaurant serves a full menu, American breakfast and continental breakfast. 
Guests can take a refreshing dip in the outdoor swimming pool, or treat themselves with a massage or spa treatment.

deskripsi:
The Kharma Villas Yogyakarta is situated in the scenic outskirts of north-western Yogyakarta, elegantly set in 3,300 sqm of well design landscaped housing 6 luxurious villas with its own private swimming pool.
Featuring 6 individual 3 bedrooms’ villas, each villa has its own private swimming pool, carport, living and dining area, standard set-up kitchenette including family size refrigerator, microwave, blender, water heater jar and bread toaster. 
Each individual villa has 3 bedrooms; consisting of 1 master bedroom with king size bed and ensuite bathroom featuring bathtub and outdoor shower area on the first floor and 2 additional bedrooms with queen size bed upstairs accessible through staircase. All Air-Conditioned bedrooms are equipped with the LCD TV with Indonesian and Satellite Channels and Audio system, Wardrobe, Safe Deposit Box (Master bedroom) and Wi-Fi connection.
There's a dining table in the Living room of each villa. All villa have standard set-up of Kitchenette with exhaust system; induction stove, microwave, blender, bread toaster and full set up of chinaware.
Aside of private swimming pool, guests can enjoy a relaxing massage or spa treatment in the comfort of their villas. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can arrange airport transfers, car rentals, and laundry services.

deskripsi:
This historic and colonial-style hotel has been fully renovated and offers the facilities and comfort of a modern hotel, but still maintaining the traditions of the past. With seven meeting rooms with conference facilities available, this property becomes the perfect place to combine leisure and business. Offering a total of 144 guest rooms, the air-conditioned hotel welcomes guests in a lobby with 24-hour reception and check-out services, a hotel safe, currency exchange facilities, lift access and a newspaper stand. Guests may also make use of the hairdressing salon, TV lounge, cafe and restaurant. The hotel additionally provides WLAN Internet access (fees may apply) and room and laundry services (fees apply to both). Those arriving by car may leave their vehicle in the car park or garage. 
All rooms offer private balconies or terraces and feature in a modern style with local touches. They are en suite with a shower and hairdryer, and are equipped with stylish traditional furniture and décor in lovely colonial design. The spacious bedrooms have a double or king-size bed, and in-room amenities include a direct dial telephone, satellite/cable TV, Internet access, safe, minibar and tea and coffee making facilities. An ironing set is also provided, and individually regulated air conditioning ensures guests' comfort. 
The restaurant is an open-air courtyard and offers Indonesian, Chinese and Western cuisine. A continental breakfast buffet is served, while lunch and dinner are available in the form of buffet, à la carte or as a set menu. 
Guests can take a refreshing dip at the outdoor swimming pool at their leisure or sunbath at the poolside. The hotel also features separate children's swimming area. They can enjoy a work-out in the gym/ fitness center, or unwind in the sauna or take advantage of the massage and spa treatments (fees apply). Pool/snooker is another option for those who want to enjoy sports.

deskripsi:
This property located near Pantai Sadranan. Along with a rooftop terrace, this bed & breakfast has 24-hour room service and dry cleaning. Free WiFi in public areas and free self parking are also provided. Additionally, a 24-hour front desk, a garden, and barbecue grills are onsite. All 6 rooms offer 24-hour room service, LED TVs with cable channels, and free bottled water. Showers and free toiletries are also available to guests. Housekeeping is available on request. 
Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access. Additional amenities at this bed & breakfast include a television in a common area and barbecue grills.
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services and a 24-hour front desk. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.
If you are planning to arrive after 10 PM please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation. 24-hour airport shuttle service is available on request. Fees may apply. Contact the property in advance to get details.
Make yourself at home in one of the 6 air-conditioned rooms featuring LED televisions. Cable television is provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include complimentary bottled water, and housekeeping is provided on request.
Take advantage of the bed & breakfast's 24-hour room service. A complimentary breakfast is included.
Nearby Attractions

Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a garden. deskripsi:
The Westlake Resort Yogyakarta, the truly 4 stars unique hotel & resort in Yogyakarta, a perfect place both for business and leisure. Promising the perpetual serenity for you to runaway from the stressors.
Experience stylish décor of 125 guestrooms and suites, each with the Comfortable Bed, modern bathroom amenities, 42” LED TV and large private balcony with panoramic views of the lake and tropical garden with waterfalls.
An ultimate comfortable stay can be experienced in the spacious rooms and suites of 42 sqm to 289 sqm decorated elegantly in natural and traditional Javanese style with 24 hours complimentary hi-speed internet access in rooms and public areas. The 26 Premiere Rooms and 2 Suites provide a privacy, tranquility and balconies with direct view to the signature lake. One President Suite offers you a wide access to the privacy with more spacious rooms, living room with mini bar and private swimming pool.
The open-aired Kelapa Resto offers a fusion of authentic Javanese cuisine with contemporary flavors. Classical décor, natural light through large windows, and lake views create the athmosphere to enjoy mouth-watering food & beverages and shared moments. At the same level, Kaloka Lounge is a best spot to complete your day with a glass or two of our International selections Wine & cocktails. The lounge also offers a perfect wide-view to the lake.
If you desire breakfast in bed, an intimate dinner, or a quick midnight meal, the in-room dining team is available 24 hours a day to make it happen.
A pool with an elegant design overlooking the lake which will refresh your eyes while enjoying the pool water. Our 1.55 meter depth pool with the whirl pool inside will give you the greatest sensation to refresh your body and mind. Fishing; We offers some of the finest fishing opportunities in the lake surrounding the resort. Family fun awaits at our catch and release fishing lake. Our Concierge will be delighted to arrange an outing, upon request. Cycling; We understand the importance of a healthy and stress free lifestyle. We offers fun cycling activity around the resort.

deskripsi:
A 10-minute walk from Galeria Mall, Tickle Hotel houses a restaurant and modern minimalist-style rooms with air conditioning. It operates a 24-hour front desk with luggage storage. Free Wi-Fi is accessible in all areas.
Rooms Fitted with stylish lighting, each room comes with a desk, wardrobe and a flat-screen cable TV. Shower facilities are included in the private bathroom.
A selection of international favourites is served in Tickle Restaurant.
The hotel offers the conveniences of laundry, airport shuttle and car rental services at additional charges.

Additionally, a 24-hour front desk, tour/ticket assistance, and a garden are onsite. All rooms are individually decorated and offer free WiFi and free bottled water. For a bit of entertainment, LCD TVs come with cable channels, and guests will also find electric kettles and safes. 
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a rooftop terrace and a garden. This bed & breakfast also features complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite.
 Make yourself at home in one of the 20 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. deskripsi:
Tjokro Style ia a 3 star hotel plus with the concept of No Smoking Hotel, Young, Dynamic and Smart. The hotel was designed specifically for those who prioritize comfort while staying with a dynamic atmosphere full of color and equipped with a complete facilities.
There are three types of room at this hotel, the Standard Room of Tjokro Style is an ideal choice for everyone trying to enjoy a good-value Hotel offer in Yogyakarta. The Deluxe Room of Tjokro Style A good choice if you want a splash of luxury in your Hotel room in Klaten that you can enjoy with great value offer. The most exclusive type of guest room available in Tjokro Style, the Suite Room is everything that is best about Tjokro Style Yogyakarta converged and collection into one convenient guest room. All rooms comes with choice of twin or king bed, Hot n Cold Shower, Flat screen LED TV, Cable TV, WIFI, Air Conditioning, Toiletries, New Linen and Towel.
Citrus Restaurant; Spend your dining experiences at the best restaurants, combining a blend of the world's gourmet flavors. Light meals and coffee can be enjoyed at Apricot Coffee Bar. A selection of healthy beverages is served at Celery Juice Bar. Further dining options can be found within a 3-minute walk.
The outdoor swimming pool is a great choice to jump in-or as in this case, splash in-either alone or with friends/families and to have a good time. Situated just a 5-minute walk from XT Square, Tjokro Style Yogyakarta offers complimentary drop off service to Malioboro Street every day from 10:00 to 16:00.

deskripsi:
This property located in Yogyakarta (Central Yogyakarta). Along with a restaurant, this smoke-free hotel has an outdoor pool and a bar/lounge. Free WiFi in public areas, free valet parking, and a free area shuttle are also provided. Additionally, concierge services, dry cleaning, and laundry facilities are onsite. All 54 rooms offer free WiFi and free wired Internet, plus room service and LCD TVs with cable channels. Premium bedding, coffee makers, and free bottled water are among the other amenities available to guests. 
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the complimentary area shuttle.
Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available on request) and a train station pick-up service.
 Airport shuttle service is available on request during limited hours. Fees may apply. Contact the property in advance to make arrangements.
Make yourself at home in one of the 54 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and slippers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.
Satisfy your appetite for lunch or dinner at Orion, a restaurant which specializes in Indonesian cuisine, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Breakfast is available daily from 6 AM to 10 AM for a fee.

deskripsi:
Tune Hotels Yogyakarta is a hotel that located in Gedongkuning District, offering an affordable, comfortable and convenient accommodation, accompanied with modern facilities and excellent services. The hotel comes with a number of facilities including lobby with 24-hour reception, accessible rooms, car park, luggage storage, and praying room.
The hotel’s rooms are available in double and twin beds, and carefully decorated with clean white and red colors. Each room is equipped with modern facilities such as electronic key card, AC, TV, Wi-Fi, table and chair, in-room safe deposit box, and hairdryer, while the en-suite bathroom comes with hot/cold water shower, towel, and toiletries kit. Housekeeping services are available daily. Accessible rooms are also available.
Breakfast is served daily at this hotel.
The hotel comes with a swimming pool for guests who wanted to take a refreshing dip after a long day.

deskripsi:
University Club (UC) Hotel is a hotel with special atmosphere of academic surrounding since it is located within Gadjah Mada University, the oldest university in Indonesia. We offer you unforgettable satisfaction and experience while you’re staying in Yogyakarta, the city of education. As owned by Gadjah Mada University, the University Club Hotel since its founding in 1960 has always been used to serve many guests of the university from many institutions from entire Indonesia and abroad. Therefore, UC Hotel has historical value that cannot be forgotten by these institutions. Gadjah Mada University Club also offers many facilities to enrich your stay in Yogyakarta. Top features of the hotel include Wi-Fi in public areas, shops, room service, meeting facilities.
The ambiance of Gadjah Mada University Club is reflected in every guestroom. Coffee/tea maker, satellite/cable TV, refrigerator, hair dryer, internet access wireless are just some of the facilities at your disposal. Throughout the day you can enjoy the relaxing atmosphere of the garden, massage, steamroom. Gadjah Mada University Club is an ideal place of stay for travelers seeking charm, comfort and convenience in Yogyakarta.

deskripsi:
This property located near Adisucipto Golf Course. This smoke-free hotel features a restaurant, a fitness center, and a coffee shop/café. Free WiFi in public areas, free self parking, and a free airport shuttle are also provided. Other amenities include a meeting room, dry cleaning, and laundry facilities. All 79 rooms provide free WiFi, room service, and flat-screen TVs. Other amenities available to guests include premium bedding, rainfall showerheads, and coffee makers. 
Enjoy recreation amenities such as a fitness center or take in the view from a garden. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, a television in a common area, and tour/ticket assistance.
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. A roundtrip airport shuttle is complimentary (available 24 hours).
 24-hour airport shuttle service is available on request. Fees may apply. Contact the property in advance to make arrangements.
Make yourself at home in one of the 79 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. deskripsi:
Stretched over a 1,000 sqm land with 500++ sqm living area this newly built Private Villa is designed as a Holiday Getaway for the Owner themselves, this 2-story 4-bedroom Private Villa is an amazing destination for those who are looking for a piece of serenity within the natural surrounding equipped with sophisticated facilities and amenities for your comfort. With a complete privacy setting with the option to book by room for that perfect getaway with your loved one or having the whole property for your group, Villa Alcheringa is definitely a piece of paradise.
With the dedication to preserve the environment, Villa Alcheringa consistently implements Reduce, Reuse, Recycle, and Recover Policy by using environmental friendly system in the house, such as solar water heater, decentralized waste water treatment, and composting for solid waste management. Each villa also comes with low watt LED lighting, integrating water elements surrounding the living area to recude the consumption of AC.
A coffee shop is available inside this villa.
Numerous nearby activities can be done in this hotel includes horse back riding, kite flying, biking, ATV riding, sightseeing tour, trekking, and jogging.

deskripsi:
Welcome to Villa Alicia, a cosy and luxurious home for those who enjoy good quality of staying with affordable price. Located near the hearth of Seturan and Babarsari are the centres of educations as well as culinary. 
Standard Double and Family room feature work desk, wardrobe, terrace, flat screen TV, bathroom with shower and toiletries. Dining table and sofa bed you can find at Family room.
Villa Alicia offers a continental or Asian breakfast. You can order food from cafe. The hotel is situated where you can find easily many restaurants and "side walk" serving Indonesian and westerns/oriental food are available here with relatively cheap price. 
If you want to explore Yogyakarta, the easiest way is to rent a motorbike right at the Villa. You can go to many interesting places like Prambanan Temple, Jungle Paintball Jogja, Upside Down World Jogja, and Malioboro Street.

deskripsi:
Villa Borobudur Resort offers traditional Indonesian accommodation with free WiFi, free laundry services and complimentary airport transfer. Relaxing massage can be enjoyed by the outdoor pool or at the spa.
Each villa features a private pool and a terrace to relax. The rooms are housed in a spacious Joglo (traditional house), featuring artwork and antique furnishings from Central Java. All rooms have a flat-screen TV, DVD player and a minibar. En suite bathrooms have a bathtub and shower facilities.
ull-board Indonesian meals are provided at the villa's dining room. Snacks and non-alcoholic beverages are provided.
Car rentals, day trips and airport shuttles can be arranged at the tour desk. The villa also provides laundry and concierge services. All villas are private with private pool and private staff. The Borobudur and Siddharta suites have a shared restaurant facility and pool.

deskripsi:
Villa Padi Cangkringan provides an interesting panorama with the cool air of the Kaliurang area, private-living, as well as a rural atmosphere with a beautiful panorama of Mount Merapi clad in the green area of ??rice fields that will impress you. The villa is designed with a minimalist concept and surrounded by a charming tropical garden. Eco-living is also be a part of our design, the entire irrigation system at the villa using the water from the mountains. Spend your holiday here, with an affordable budget you can enjoy luxury facilities like a five-star hotel. 
We have 2 villas with 4 rooms and 1 villa with 2 rooms, total 10 rooms. Each villa also provides living room and a kitchen with refrigerator, dispenser, and a kitchenette set with direct view to the swimming pool. The 10 bedrooms are equipped with air conditioning and flat TV with international channels. 
 Enjoy the beauty that Villa Padi presents with its tropical garden complete with swimming pool, gazebo with fireplace, and fish pond. The view spot is located behind the villa which the perfect place to chat with family or relatives. At the view spot you can get magnificent and beautiful view of volcano, river, rice field, and garden view.

deskripsi:
Villa Pondok Terra are constructed using local materials and typical Indonesian architectural designs, offers combination of a central location and a traditional Java style. Located in Prawirotaman, Villa Pondok Terra is a perfect starting point to explore Yogyakarta. Just a short drive from many restaurants, supermarkets, and art galleries. 
We have a number of types of villa like Diamond, Gold, Silver (Ruby), and Silver (Pearl). All of those villas are beautiful, spacious, luxurious, and peaceful. These villas feature beautiful tiled flooring and wooden door frames which open out to a private garden, swimming pool and sun loungers. All villas have a full kitchen, a flat-screen TV and DVD player. Bathrooms have either a bathtub or double shower facilities.
From here you can go sightseeing to many amazing attractions nearby such as Borobudur Temple, Sultan Palace & Water Castle, Bird Market, Malioboro, and Prambanan Temple, we have optional tours and rental. We also provides airport transfer and private pool with a traditional Javanese ambiance, it's a perfect spot for you to relax.

deskripsi:
Wake Up Homestay is a home away from home for backpackers and independent travellers, right in the heart of Yogyakarta. You will find us in Malioboro, perfectly placed for the best sights and sounds of the city. Featuring terrace at the rooftop, the others facilities are provided at the property including a shared lounge, daily housekeeping, express check-in/check-out, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park. Come and feel many things that will give you an unforgettable moment of journey. If you're looking for charming cultures, local cuisine, history site visit, and well-designed rooms with really great beds when you do need a break, you can get all of those experience with us. 
 We have several types of room like Double Pod, Female Single Pod, Single Pod which enough for 4 persons and Single Pod (Dormitory) which enough for 10 persons. Guestrooms at Wakeup Homestay are fitted with all the amenities you need. At the rooms you will find Personal reading lights, electricity sockets, pillows, locker, hanger, towel hanger, towel, Wi-Fi, and air conditioning. 
Indonesian breakfast will be served in the breakfast room and guests may find plenty of eateries within 5 minutes walk from the property.

deskripsi:
Whiz Hotel Yogyakarta offers well-equipped conference facilities for business guests to conduct their official events and conventions. Guests can use Internet access facility to stay connected with their friends. Friendly staff of this hotel is at guests' service throughout the stay. Cerme Cave Walisongo is also one of the famous tourist destinations, located within a short drive from this hotel.
All non-smoking rooms at Whiz Hotel Yogyakarta have wooden flooring, and some have soundproofed windows. Each room is simply furnished and features a small writing desk, top quality mattress and linen, AC, multiple TV channels, private key access system, hot water and power rain shower, free WiFi connection, and mineral drinking water.
The hotel serves light breakfast only at the restaurant, while a vending machine sells drinks.
This hotel provides 24-hour reception desk, meeting room, business center, concierge assistance, outdoor gardens for smoking area, luggage storage, currency exchange and laundry service. Free parking is also available.

deskripsi:
The Wijaya Imperial Hotel is a new and delightful hotel with the concept of beauty,warmth and comfort in a good value. The Wijaya Imperial Hotel is strategically located in the heart of Yogyakarta right in front of JEC (Jogja Expo Center). The location is strategic that allowing anyone to travel anywhere. It only takes 12 minutes to Yogyakarta International Airport, 20 minutes to Malioboro, a famous shopping place in Yogyakarta and 5 minute to the biggest shopping mall in Yogyakarta, Ambarukmo Plaza. 
 Rooms are brightly lit and fitted with a dressing table. Free toiletries, towels and free bottled water are also provided. En suite bathrooms come with hot shower facilities.
Offering room service, the on-site restaurant specialises in Indonesian and Chinese cuisines.
Wijaya Imperial Hotel features modern minimalist-style accommodation with a restaurant and a 24-hour front desk. It features air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen satellite TV, and provides free Wi-Fi access in public areas.

deskripsi:
Renovated in 2013, the Hotel Wisma Aji guarantees guests a pleasant stay whether in Yogyakarta for business or pleasure. With its location just 10 km from the city center and 3 km from the airport, this 2-star hotel attracts numerous travelers each year. A well-kempt environment and its proximity to Plaza Ambarukmo, Museum Affandi, Adisucipto International Airport give to this hotel a special charm.
Simply furnished rooms offer air-conditioning, a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. Private bathrooms include shower facilities and free toiletries. Select rooms come with a minibar.
The hotel offers a dining area for breakfast to be served. Room service is possible. 
Wisma Aji provides meeting/banqueting facilities, and can assist guests with car rentals services. Airport shuttle can also be arranged at an extra charge. Free public parking is available on site.
<

deskripsi:
Located to the south of the Sultan's Palace in the central area of Yogyakarta. Hotel "Wisma Ary's" is very strategically located for your stay and access to most of the city's attractions. All 17 rooms in the 2-storied red brick building are well-ventilated. You'll find a small fountain in the yard next to a stilted bamboo house where you can unwind on a lazy afternoon. You may also want to pick up a book in English or Japanese from the bookshelf in the lobby donated by previous guests. "Wisma Ary's" offers you a warm ethnic interior enhanced by Japanese-style care and attention. Wisma Ary's rooms are safe, clean and carry most affordable rates which explains why so many repeat and long-stay guests frequent Wisma Ary's. In the evening they usually gather in the lobby for a chat enjoying Yogya's pleasant atmosphere.
Unique rooms feature brick walls decorated with interesting pieces of art. A TV and safety deposit box is provided. En suite bathrooms offer a bathtub and hot shower facilities.
European delights can be enjoyed in the restaurant. Alternatively, 24-hour room service is available.
 Sightseeing arrangements can be made at the tour desk. Guests can also do their laundry in the guesthouse.

deskripsi:
Stay at Wisma Gajah Guest House to discover the wonders of Yogyakarta. With modern Java architecture, the hotel can be reached about 20 minutes drive from the nearest airport. 
The rooms at Wisma Gajah Guest House come with air conditioning, cable TV, free Wi-Fi, and private bathroom. 
Taste the local cuisine at the Wisma's restaurant. Western and Chinese food are also served for guests. 
From this accommodation, you'll get easy access to tourism site including Merapi Volcano with 15 minutes drive and Water castle with 15 minutes walk. Wisma Gajah Guest House also have an spacious outdoor pool.

deskripsi:
Ideal for fun and relaxation, the hotel is located in the UGM area of Yogyakarta. With its location just 2 km away from the city centre and 4 km from the airport, this 3-star hotel attracts numerous travellers each year. Also within easy reach are Mesjid Kampus UGM, Galeria Mall Yogyakarta and Stadion Kridosono. Guests can take advantage of a wealth of unrivalled services and amenities at this Yogyakarta hotel. Whatever guests' reason for visiting Yogyakarta, the Wisma MMUGM Hotel is the perfect venue for an exhilarating and exciting breakaway.
 It is home to 135 bedrooms, all tastefully furnished to provide comforts such as television, desk, shower and complimentary WIFI.
The hotel’s restaurant serves a variety of local dishes. The Malioboro area also offers multiple food and beverages options.
 The hotel offers an excellent variety of recreational facilities, including a garden. 
Guests of the hotel can enjoy on-site features like coffee shop, room service, bar/pub, laundry service/dry cleaning and meeting facilities.

deskripsi:
Wisma Sargede Hotel is a popular choice amongst travelers, whether you're on vacation or business trip. Established since 1995 in Yogyakarta, from here you just need 20 minutes to the city center. 
Wisma Sargede has dozens of rooms, 5 meeting rooms, a ballroom and a field. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and offer many facilities like complimentary bottled water, balcony/terrace, air conditioning, desk, and shower in the bathroom. 
 At this accommodation, you can get foods through room service. There are also several dining options around here such as Kantin Joglo, Warung Kabayang NBF1899, Saerah Cafe & Coworking Space and many more. 
Facilities like car park, room service, laundry service, Wi-Fi in public areas, meeting facilities are readily available for you to enjoy. For reliable service and professional staff, Wisma Sargede Hotel caters to your needs.

deskripsi:
Zest Hotel Yogyakarta is strategically located in the hustle bustle of Malioboro area, the hotel is within walking distance to the famous Bringharjo market for shopping and tourist district Malioboro street, Sultan palace, Tamansari water castle, Techno park, Culture park, Vrendeburg fort and Mirota Batik.
Zest Hotel Yogyakarta features 106 stylish zestrooms, comprising of 47 Double Zest rooms and 59 Single Zest rooms, including non-smoking rooms and a specially appointed rooms for the physically challenged. 
 Situated in the lobby level Citruz Restaurant can seat 50 guests in a casual dining setting. Serving a delightful international and Indonesian buffet breakfast, Citruz is open every day for breakfast from 6am to 10am.
The hotel offers an excellent variety of recreational facilities, including indoor pool, pool (kids). 
 While lodging at this wonderful property, guests can enjoy free Wi-Fi in all rooms, taxi service, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, fax machine.

deskripsi:
Zodiak @Cokro is the latest offer from KAGUM Hotels for a stylish and affordable Hotel in Yogyakarta that can net guests a particularly great-value staying experience where excellent hospitality can be enjoyed with especially friendly rates!
Simply furnished rooms fit a flat-screen cable TV, safety deposit box and a seating area. A coffee maker is also provided. Each room has a private bathroom with shower facilities and free toiletries.
 Orion Restaurant serves daily buffet breakfast as well as lunch and dinner, while Raven Sky Bar is a cosy place to relax while enjoying panoramic views of Yogyakarta. Other dining options are available within 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel.
Guests can take refreshing dip in the outdoor pool or lounge on the pool terrace.
